STM8 Device Headers
Open source device headers for the STM8 microcontroller family
  • stm8
  • stm8al
STM8AL.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /** \addtogroup STM8AL
2  * @{
3  */
4 
5 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
6  STM8AF_STM8S.h - Register Declarations for STMAF and STM8S families
7 
8  Copyright (C) 2019, Georg Icking-Konert
9 
10  This library is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
11  it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
12  the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
13  (at your option) any later version.
14 
15  This library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
16  but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
17  MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
18  GNU General Public License for more details.
19 
20  You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
21  along with this program. If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
22 
23  As a special exception, if you link this library with other files
24  to produce an executable, this library does not by itself cause the
25  resulting executable to be covered by the GNU General Public License.
26  This exception does not however invalidate any other reasons why the
27  executable file might be covered by the GNU General Public License.
28 -------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
29 
30 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
31  MODULE DEFINITION FOR MULTIPLE INCLUSION
32 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
33 #ifndef STM8AF_STM8S_H
34 #define STM8AF_STM8S_H
35 
36 /* Check the used compiler */
37 #if defined(__CSMC__)
38  #define _COSMIC_
39 #elif defined(__RCST7__)
40  #define _RAISONANCE_
41 #elif defined(__ICCSTM8__)
42  #define _IAR_
43 #elif defined(__SDCC)
44  #define _SDCC_
45  #define SDCC_VERSION (__SDCC_VERSION_MAJOR * 10000 \
46  + __SDCC_VERSION_MINOR * 100 \
47  + __SDCC_VERSION_PATCH)
48 #else
49  #error in 'STM8AF_STM8S.h': compiler not supported
50 #endif
51 
52 
53 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
54  MEMORY WIDTH
55 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
56 
57 // if memory sizes [B] are not given, assume smallest available in family
58 #if !defined(STM8_PFLASH_SIZE)
59  #warning undefined STM8_PFLASH_SIZE, assume minimum
60  #define STM8_PFLASH_SIZE 2*1024 ///< size of program flash [B]
61 #endif
62 #if !defined(STM8_RAM_SIZE)
63  #warning undefined STM8_RAM_SIZE, assume minimum
64  #define STM8_RAM_SIZE 1*1024 ///< size of RAM [B]
65 #endif
66 #if !defined(STM8_EEPROM_SIZE)
67  #warning undefined STM8_EEPROM_SIZE, assume minimum
68  #define STM8_EEPROM_SIZE 128 ///< size of data EEPROM [B]
69 #endif
70 
71 // memory start / end addresses
72 #define STM8_PFLASH_START 0x8000 ///< first address in program flash
73 #define STM8_PFLASH_END (STM8_PFLASH_START + STM8_PFLASH_SIZE - 1) ///< last address in program flash
74 #define STM8_RAM_START 0x0000 ///< first address in RAM
75 #define STM8_RAM_END (STM8_RAM_START + STM8_RAM_SIZE - 1) ///< last address in RAM
76 #define STM8_EEPROM_START 0x4000 ///< first address in EEPROM
77 #define STM8_EEPROM_END (STM8_EEPROM_START + STM8_EEPROM_SIZE - 1) ///< last address in EEPROM
78 
79 // address space width (>32kB flash exceeds 16bit, as flash starts at 0x8000)
80 #if (STM8_PFLASH_END <= 0xFFFF)
81  #define STM8_ADDR_WIDTH 16 ///< width of address space
82  #define STM8_MEM_POINTER_T uint16_t ///< address variable type
83 #else
84  #define STM8_ADDR_WIDTH 32 ///< width of address space
85  #define STM8_MEM_POINTER_T uint32_t ///< address variable type
86 #endif
87 
88 
89 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
90  COMPILER SPECIFIC SETTINGS
91 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
92 
93 // Cosmic compiler
94 #if defined(_COSMIC_)
95 
96  // macros to unify ISR declaration and implementation
97  #define ISR_HANDLER(func,irq) @far @interrupt void func(void) ///< handler for interrupt service routine
98  #define ISR_HANDLER_TRAP(func) void @far @interrupt func(void) ///< handler for trap service routine
99 
100  // common assembler instructions
101  #define NOP() _asm("nop") ///< perform a nop() operation (=minimum delay)
102  #define DISABLE_INTERRUPTS() _asm("sim") ///< disable interrupt handling
103  #define ENABLE_INTERRUPTS() _asm("rim") ///< enable interrupt handling
104  #define TRIGGER_TRAP _asm("trap") ///< trigger a trap (=soft interrupt) e.g. for EMC robustness (see AN1015)
105  #define WAIT_FOR_INTERRUPT() _asm("wfi") ///< stop code execution and wait for interrupt
106  #define ENTER_HALT() _asm("halt") ///< put controller to HALT mode
107  #define SW_RESET() (_WWDG_CR=0xBF) ///< reset controller via WWGD module
108 
109  // data type in bit fields
110  #define _BITS unsigned int ///< data type in bit structs (follow C90 standard)
111 
112 // Raisonance Compiler
113 #elif defined(_RAISONANCE_)
114 
115  // include intrinsic functions
116  #include <intrins.h>
117 
118  // macros to unify ISR declaration and implementation
119  #define ISR_HANDLER(func,irq) void func(void) interrupt irq ///< handler for interrupt service routine
120  #define ISR_HANDLER_TRAP(func) void func(void) trap ///< handler for trap service routine
121 
122  // common assembler instructions
123  #define NOP() _nop_() ///< perform a nop() operation (=minimum delay)
124  #define DISABLE_INTERRUPTS() _sim_() ///< disable interrupt handling
125  #define ENABLE_INTERRUPTS() _rim_() ///< enable interrupt handling
126  #define TRIGGER_TRAP _trap_() ///< trigger a trap (=soft interrupt) e.g. for EMC robustness (see AN1015)
127  #define WAIT_FOR_INTERRUPT() _wfi_() ///< stop code execution and wait for interrupt
128  #define ENTER_HALT() _halt_() ///< put controller to HALT mode
129  #define SW_RESET() (_WWDG_CR=0xBF) ///< reset controller via WWGD module
130 
131  // data type in bit fields
132  #define _BITS unsigned int ///< data type in bit structs (follow C90 standard)
133 
134 // IAR Compiler
135 #elif defined(_IAR_)
136 
137  // include intrinsic functions
138  #include <intrinsics.h>
139 
140  // macros to unify ISR declaration and implementation
141  #define ISR_HANDLER(func,irq) __interrupt void func(void) ///< handler for interrupt service routine
142  //#define ISR_HANDLER_TRAP(func) void func(void) trap ///< handler for trap service routine
143 
144  // common assembler instructions
145  #define NOP() __no_operation() ///< perform a nop() operation (=minimum delay)
146  #define DISABLE_INTERRUPTS() __disable_interrupt() ///< disable interrupt handling
147  #define ENABLE_INTERRUPTS() __enable_interrupt() ///< enable interrupt handling
148  #define TRIGGER_TRAP __trap() ///< trigger a trap (=soft interrupt) e.g. for EMC robustness (see AN1015)
149  #define WAIT_FOR_INTERRUPT() __wait_for_interrupt() ///< stop code execution and wait for interrupt
150  #define ENTER_HALT() __halt() ///< put controller to HALT mode
151  #define SW_RESET() (_WWDG_CR=0xBF) ///< reset controller via WWGD module
152 
153  // data type in bit fields
154  #define _BITS unsigned char ///< data type in bit structs (deviating from C90 standard)
155 
156 // SDCC compiler
157 #elif defined(_SDCC_)
158 
159  // macros to unify ISR declaration and implementation
160  #define ISR_HANDLER(func,irq) void func(void) __interrupt(irq) ///< handler for interrupt service routine
161  #if SDCC_VERSION >= 30403 // traps require >=v3.4.3
162  #define ISR_HANDLER_TRAP(func) void func() __trap ///< handler for trap service routine
163  #else
164  #error traps require SDCC >=3.4.3. Please update!
165  #endif
166 
167  // common assembler instructions
168  #define NOP() __asm__("nop") ///< perform a nop() operation (=minimum delay)
169  #define DISABLE_INTERRUPTS() __asm__("sim") ///< disable interrupt handling
170  #define ENABLE_INTERRUPTS() __asm__("rim") ///< enable interrupt handling
171  #define TRIGGER_TRAP __asm__("trap") ///< trigger a trap (=soft interrupt) e.g. for EMC robustness (see AN1015)
172  #define WAIT_FOR_INTERRUPT() __asm__("wfi") ///< stop code execution and wait for interrupt
173  #define ENTER_HALT() __asm__("halt") ///< put controller to HALT mode
174  #define SW_RESET() (_WWDG_CR=0xBF) ///< reset controller via WWGD module
175 
176  // data type in bit fields
177  #define _BITS unsigned int ///< data type in bit structs (follow C90 standard)
178 
179 #endif
180 
181 
182 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
183  DEFINITION OF GLOBAL MACROS/#DEFINES
184 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
185 
186 // general macros
187 #define _SFR(type, addr) (*((volatile type*) (addr))) ///< peripheral register
188 
189 
190 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
191  STANDARD DATA TYPES
192 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
193 #if defined(_COSMIC_) || defined(_RAISONANCE_) || defined(_IAR_)
194 
195  // skip if already defined
196  #ifndef INT8_MAX
197 
198  // compiler specific --> If possible, use <stdint.h> from compiler
199  typedef signed long int32_t;
200  typedef signed short int16_t;
201  typedef signed char int8_t;
202 
203  typedef unsigned long uint32_t;
204  typedef unsigned short uint16_t;
205  typedef unsigned char uint8_t;
206 
207 
208  // define min/max values
209  #define INT8_MAX 0x7f
210  #define INT8_MIN (-INT8_MAX - 1)
211 
212  #define UINT8_MAX 0xFF
213  #define UINT8_MIN 0
214 
215  #define INT16_MAX 0x7fff
216  #define INT16_MIN (-INT16_MAX - 1)
217 
218  #define UINT16_MAX 0xFFFF
219  #define UINT16_MIN 0
220 
221  #define INT32_MAX 0x7fffffffL
222  #define INT32_MIN (-INT32_MAX - 1L)
223 
224  #define UINT32_MAX 0xFFFFFFFF
225  #define UINT32_MIN 0
226 
227  #endif // INT8_MAX
228 
229 #elif defined(_SDCC_)
230 
231  // use compiler header
232  #include <stdint.h>
233 
234 #endif
235 
236 
237 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
238  ISR Vector Table (SDCC, Raisonance, IAR)
239  Note: IAR has an IRQ offset of +2 compared to STM8 datasheet (see below)
240 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
241 
242 #define __TLI_VECTOR__ 0 ///< irq0 - External Top Level interrupt (TLI) for pin PD7
243 #define __AWU_VECTOR__ 1 ///< irq1 - Auto Wake Up from Halt interrupt (AWU)
244 #define __CLK_VECTOR__ 2 /// irq2 - Clock Controller interrupt
245 #define __PORTA_VECTOR__ 3 /// irq3 - External interrupt 0 (GPIOA)
246 #define __PORTB_VECTOR__ 4 /// irq4 - External interrupt 1 (GPIOB)
247 #define __PORTC_VECTOR__ 5 /// irq5 - External interrupt 2 (GPIOC)
248 #define __PORTD_VECTOR__ 6 /// irq6 - External interrupt 3 (GPIOD)
249 #define __PORTE_VECTOR__ 7 /// irq7 - External interrupt 4 (GPIOE)
250 #if defined(CAN_AddressBase)
251  #define __CAN_RX_VECTOR__ 8 ///< irq8 - CAN receive interrupt (shared with \__PORTF_VECTOR__)
252 #endif
253 #if defined(PORTF_AddressBase)
254  #define __PORTF_VECTOR__ 8 ///< irq8 - External interrupt 5 (GPIOF, shared with \__CAN_RX_VECTOR__)
255 #endif
256 #if defined(CAN_AddressBase)
257  #define __CAN_TX_VECTOR__ 9 ///< irq9 - CAN transmit interrupt
258 #endif
259 #define __SPI_VECTOR__ 10 /// irq10 - SPI End of transfer interrupt
260 #define __TIM1_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__ 11 /// irq11 - TIM1 Update/Overflow/Trigger/Break interrupt
261 #define __TIM1_CAPCOM_VECTOR__ 12 /// irq12 - TIM1 Capture/Compare interrupt
262 #if defined(TIM2_AddressBase)
263  #define __TIM2_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__ 13 ///< irq13 - TIM2 Update/overflow interrupt (shared with \__TIM5_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__)
264 #endif
265 #if defined(TIM5_AddressBase)
266  #define __TIM5_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__ 13 ///< irq13 - TIM5 Update/overflow interrupt (shared with \__TIM2_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__)
267 #endif
268 #if defined(TIM2_AddressBase)
269  #define __TIM2_CAPCOM_VECTOR__ 14 ///< irq14 - TIM2 Capture/Compare interrupt (shared with \__TIM5_CAPCOM_VECTOR__)
270 #elif defined(TIM5_AddressBase)
271  #define __TIM5_CAPCOM_VECTOR__ 14 ///< irq14 - TIM5 Capture/Compare interrupt (shared with \__TIM2_CAPCOM_VECTOR__)
272 #endif
273 #if defined(TIM3_AddressBase)
274  #define __TIM3_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__ 15 ///< irq15 - TIM3 Update/overflow interrupt
275 #endif
276 #if defined(TIM3_AddressBase)
277  #define __TIM3_CAPCOM_VECTOR__ 16 ///< irq16 - TIM3 Capture/Compare interrupt
278 #endif
279 #if defined(UART1_AddressBase)
280  #define __UART1_TXE_VECTOR__ 17 ///< irq17 - USART/UART1 send (TX empty) interrupt
281 #endif
282 #if defined(UART1_AddressBase)
283  #define __UART1_RXF_VECTOR__ 18 ///< irq18 - USART/UART1 receive (RX full) interrupt
284 #endif
285 #define __I2C_VECTOR__ 19 ///< irq19 - I2C interrupt
286 #if defined(UART2_AddressBase)
287  #define __UART2_TXE_VECTOR__ 20 ///< irq20 - UART2 send (TX empty) interrupt (shared with \__UART3_TXE_VECTOR__ and \__UART4_TXE_VECTOR__)
288 #elif defined(UART3_AddressBase)
289  #define __UART3_TXE_VECTOR__ 20 ///< irq20 - UART3 send (TX empty) interrupt (shared with \__UART2_TXE_VECTOR__ and \__UART4_TXE_VECTOR__)
290 #elif defined(UART4_AddressBase)
291  #define __UART4_TXE_VECTOR__ 20 ///< irq20 - UART4 send (TX empty) interrupt (shared with \__UART2_TXE_VECTOR__ and \__UART3_TXE_VECTOR__)
292 #endif
293 #if defined(UART2_AddressBase)
294  #define __UART2_RXF_VECTOR__ 21 ///< irq21 - UART2 receive (RX full) interrupt (shared with \__UART3_RXF_VECTOR__ and \__UART4_RXF_VECTOR__)
295 #elif defined(UART3_AddressBase)
296  #define __UART3_RXF_VECTOR__ 21 ///< irq21 - UART3 receive (RX full) interrupt (shared with \__UART2_RXF_VECTOR__ and \__UART4_RXF_VECTOR__)
297 #elif defined(UART4_AddressBase)
298  #define __UART4_RXF_VECTOR__ 21 ///< irq21 - UART4 receive (RX full) interrupt (shared with \__UART2_RXF_VECTOR__ and \__UART3_RXF_VECTOR__)
299 #endif
300 #if defined(ADC1_AddressBase)
301  #define __ADC1_VECTOR__ 22 ///< irq22 - ADC1 end of conversion (shared with \__ADC2_VECTOR__)
302 #elif defined(ADC2_AddressBase)
303  #define __ADC2_VECTOR__ 22 ///< irq22 - ADC2 end of conversion & analog watchdog interrupts (shared with \__ADC1_VECTOR__)
304 #endif
305 #if defined(TIM4_AddressBase)
306  #define __TIM4_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__ 23 ///< irq23 - TIM4 Update/Overflow interrupt (shared with \__TIM6_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__)
307 #elif defined(TIM6_AddressBase)
308  #define __TIM6_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__ 23 ///< irq23 - TIM6 Update/Overflow interrupt (shared with \__TIM4_UPD_OVF_VECTOR__)
309 #endif
310 #define __FLASH_VECTOR__ 24 /// irq24 - flash interrupt
311 
312 
313 
314 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
315  DEFINITION OF STM8 PERIPHERAL REGISTERS
316 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
317 
318 //------------------------
319 // General purpose input/output pins (PORT)
320 //------------------------
321 #if defined(PORTA_AddressBase) || defined(PORTB_AddressBase) || defined(PORTC_AddressBase) || defined(PORTD_AddressBase) || defined(PORTE_AddressBase) || defined(PORTF_AddressBase) || defined(PORTG_AddressBase) || defined(PORTH_AddressBase) || defined(PORTI_AddressBase)
322 
323  /** @brief structure for controlling pins in PORT mode (PORTx, x=A..I) */
324  typedef struct {
325 
326  /** @brief Port x output data register (Px_ODR) */
327  struct {
328  _BITS PIN0 : 1; ///< pin 0 output control
329  _BITS PIN1 : 1; ///< pin 1 output control
330  _BITS PIN2 : 1; ///< pin 2 output control
331  _BITS PIN3 : 1; ///< pin 3 output control
332  _BITS PIN4 : 1; ///< pin 4 output control
333  _BITS PIN5 : 1; ///< pin 5 output control
334  _BITS PIN6 : 1; ///< pin 6 output control
335  _BITS PIN7 : 1; ///< pin 7 output control
336  } ODR;
337 
338  /** @brief Port x input data register (Px_IDR) */
339  struct {
340  _BITS PIN0 : 1; ///< pin 0 input control
341  _BITS PIN1 : 1; ///< pin 1 input control
342  _BITS PIN2 : 1; ///< pin 2 input control
343  _BITS PIN3 : 1; ///< pin 3 input control
344  _BITS PIN4 : 1; ///< pin 4 input control
345  _BITS PIN5 : 1; ///< pin 5 input control
346  _BITS PIN6 : 1; ///< pin 6 input control
347  _BITS PIN7 : 1; ///< pin 7 input control
348  } IDR;
349 
350  /** @brief Port x data direction data register (Px_DDR) */
351  struct {
352  _BITS PIN0 : 1; ///< pin 0 direction control
353  _BITS PIN1 : 1; ///< pin 1 direction control
354  _BITS PIN2 : 1; ///< pin 2 direction control
355  _BITS PIN3 : 1; ///< pin 3 direction control
356  _BITS PIN4 : 1; ///< pin 4 direction control
357  _BITS PIN5 : 1; ///< pin 5 direction control
358  _BITS PIN6 : 1; ///< pin 6 direction control
359  _BITS PIN7 : 1; ///< pin 7 direction control
360  } DDR;
361 
362  /** @brief Port x control register 1 (Px_CR1) */
363  struct {
364  _BITS PIN0 : 1; ///< pin 0 control register 1
365  _BITS PIN1 : 1; ///< pin 1 control register 1
366  _BITS PIN2 : 1; ///< pin 2 control register 1
367  _BITS PIN3 : 1; ///< pin 3 control register 1
368  _BITS PIN4 : 1; ///< pin 4 control register 1
369  _BITS PIN5 : 1; ///< pin 5 control register 1
370  _BITS PIN6 : 1; ///< pin 6 control register 1
371  _BITS PIN7 : 1; ///< pin 7 control register 1
372  } CR1;
373 
374  /** @brief Port x control register 1 (Px_CR2) */
375  struct {
376  _BITS PIN0 : 1; ///< pin 0 control register 2
377  _BITS PIN1 : 1; ///< pin 1 control register 2
378  _BITS PIN2 : 1; ///< pin 2 control register 2
379  _BITS PIN3 : 1; ///< pin 3 control register 2
380  _BITS PIN4 : 1; ///< pin 4 control register 2
381  _BITS PIN5 : 1; ///< pin 5 control register 2
382  _BITS PIN6 : 1; ///< pin 6 control register 2
383  _BITS PIN7 : 1; ///< pin 7 control register 2
384  } CR2;
385 
386  } PORT_t;
387 
388  /* Pointer to port A registers */
389  #if defined(PORTA_AddressBase)
390  #define _GPIOA _SFR(PORT_t, PORTA_AddressBase) ///< port A struct/bit access
391  #define _GPIOA_ODR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTA_AddressBase+0x00) ///< port A output register
392  #define _GPIOA_IDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTA_AddressBase+0x01) ///< port A input register
393  #define _GPIOA_DDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTA_AddressBase+0x02) ///< port A direction register
394  #define _GPIOA_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTA_AddressBase+0x03) ///< port A control register 1
395  #define _GPIOA_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTA_AddressBase+0x04) ///< port A control register 2
396  #endif
397 
398  /* Pointer to port B registers */
399  #if defined(PORTB_AddressBase)
400  #define _GPIOB _SFR(PORT_t, PORTB_AddressBase) ///< port B struct/bit access
401  #define _GPIOB_ODR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTB_AddressBase+0x00) ///< port B output register
402  #define _GPIOB_IDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTB_AddressBase+0x01) ///< port B input register
403  #define _GPIOB_DDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTB_AddressBase+0x02) ///< port B direction register
404  #define _GPIOB_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTB_AddressBase+0x03) ///< port B control register 1
405  #define _GPIOB_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTB_AddressBase+0x04) ///< port B control register 2
406  #endif
407 
408  /* Pointer to port C registers */
409  #if defined(PORTC_AddressBase)
410  #define _GPIOC _SFR(PORT_t, PORTC_AddressBase) ///< port C struct/bit access
411  #define _GPIOC_ODR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTC_AddressBase+0x00) ///< port C output register
412  #define _GPIOC_IDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTC_AddressBase+0x01) ///< port C input register
413  #define _GPIOC_DDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTC_AddressBase+0x02) ///< port C direction register
414  #define _GPIOC_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTC_AddressBase+0x03) ///< port C control register 1
415  #define _GPIOC_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTC_AddressBase+0x04) ///< port C control register 2
416  #endif
417 
418  /* Pointer to port D registers */
419  #if defined(PORTD_AddressBase)
420  #define _GPIOD _SFR(PORT_t, PORTD_AddressBase) ///< port D struct/bit access
421  #define _GPIOD_ODR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTD_AddressBase+0x00) ///< port D output register
422  #define _GPIOD_IDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTD_AddressBase+0x01) ///< port D input register
423  #define _GPIOD_DDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTD_AddressBase+0x02) ///< port D direction register
424  #define _GPIOD_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTD_AddressBase+0x03) ///< port D control register 1
425  #define _GPIOD_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTD_AddressBase+0x04) ///< port D control register 2
426  #endif
427 
428  /* Pointer to port E registers */
429  #if defined(PORTE_AddressBase)
430  #define _GPIOE _SFR(PORT_t, PORTE_AddressBase) ///< port E struct/bit access
431  #define _GPIOE_ODR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTE_AddressBase+0x00) ///< port E output register
432  #define _GPIOE_IDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTE_AddressBase+0x01) ///< port E input register
433  #define _GPIOE_DDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTE_AddressBase+0x02) ///< port E direction register
434  #define _GPIOE_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTE_AddressBase+0x03) ///< port E control register 1
435  #define _GPIOE_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTE_AddressBase+0x04) ///< port E control register 2
436  #endif
437 
438  /* Pointer to port F registers */
439  #if defined(PORTF_AddressBase)
440  #define _GPIOF _SFR(PORT_t, PORTF_AddressBase) ///< port F struct/bit access
441  #define _GPIOF_ODR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTF_AddressBase+0x00) ///< port F output register
442  #define _GPIOF_IDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTF_AddressBase+0x01) ///< port F input register
443  #define _GPIOF_DDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTF_AddressBase+0x02) ///< port F direction register
444  #define _GPIOF_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTF_AddressBase+0x03) ///< port F control register 1
445  #define _GPIOF_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTF_AddressBase+0x04) ///< port F control register 2
446  #endif
447 
448  /* Pointer to port G registers */
449  #if defined(PORTG_AddressBase)
450  #define _GPIOG _SFR(PORT_t, PORTG_AddressBase) ///< port G struct/bit access
451  #define _GPIOG_ODR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTG_AddressBase+0x00) ///< port G output register
452  #define _GPIOG_IDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTG_AddressBase+0x01) ///< port G input register
453  #define _GPIOG_DDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTG_AddressBase+0x02) ///< port G direction register
454  #define _GPIOG_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTG_AddressBase+0x03) ///< port G control register 1
455  #define _GPIOG_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTG_AddressBase+0x04) ///< port G control register 2
456  #endif
457 
458  /* Pointer to port H registers */
459  #if defined(PORTH_AddressBase)
460  #define _GPIOH _SFR(PORT_t, PORTH_AddressBase) ///< port H struct/bit access
461  #define _GPIOH_ODR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTH_AddressBase+0x00) ///< port H output register
462  #define _GPIOH_IDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTH_AddressBase+0x01) ///< port H input register
463  #define _GPIOH_DDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTH_AddressBase+0x02) ///< port H direction register
464  #define _GPIOH_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTH_AddressBase+0x03) ///< port H control register 1
465  #define _GPIOH_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTH_AddressBase+0x04) ///< port H control register 2
466  #endif
467 
468  /* Pointer to port I registers */
469  #if defined(PORTI_AddressBase)
470  #define _GPIOI _SFR(PORT_t, PORTI_AddressBase) ///< port I struct/bit access
471  #define _GPIOI_ODR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTI_AddressBase+0x00) ///< port I output register
472  #define _GPIOI_IDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTI_AddressBase+0x01) ///< port I input register
473  #define _GPIOI_DDR _SFR(uint8_t, PORTI_AddressBase+0x02) ///< port I direction register
474  #define _GPIOI_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTI_AddressBase+0x03) ///< port I control register 1
475  #define _GPIOI_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, PORTI_AddressBase+0x04) ///< port I control register 2
476  #endif
477 
478  /* PORT Module Reset Values (all ports) */
479  #define _GPIO_ODR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< port output register reset value
480  #define _GPIO_DDR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< port direction register reset value
481  #define _GPIO_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< port control register 1 reset value
482  #define _GPIO_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< port control register 2 reset value
483 
484  /* macro for accessing pin registers (all ports) */
485  #define _GPIO_PIN0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< port bit mask for pin 0 (in _GPIOI_ODR, _GPIOI_IDR, _GPIOI_DDR, _GPIOI_CR1, _GPIOI_CR2)
486  #define _GPIO_PIN1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< port bit mask for pin 1 (in _GPIOI_ODR, _GPIOI_IDR, _GPIOI_DDR, _GPIOI_CR1, _GPIOI_CR2)
487  #define _GPIO_PIN2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< port bit mask for pin 2 (in _GPIOI_ODR, _GPIOI_IDR, _GPIOI_DDR, _GPIOI_CR1, _GPIOI_CR2)
488  #define _GPIO_PIN3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< port bit mask for pin 3 (in _GPIOI_ODR, _GPIOI_IDR, _GPIOI_DDR, _GPIOI_CR1, _GPIOI_CR2)
489  #define _GPIO_PIN4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< port bit mask for pin 4 (in _GPIOI_ODR, _GPIOI_IDR, _GPIOI_DDR, _GPIOI_CR1, _GPIOI_CR2)
490  #define _GPIO_PIN5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< port bit mask for pin 5 (in _GPIOI_ODR, _GPIOI_IDR, _GPIOI_DDR, _GPIOI_CR1, _GPIOI_CR2)
491  #define _GPIO_PIN6 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< port bit mask for pin 6 (in _GPIOI_ODR, _GPIOI_IDR, _GPIOI_DDR, _GPIOI_CR1, _GPIOI_CR2)
492  #define _GPIO_PIN7 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< port bit mask for pin 7 (in _GPIOI_ODR, _GPIOI_IDR, _GPIOI_DDR, _GPIOI_CR1, _GPIOI_CR2)
493 
494 #endif // PORTx_AddressBase
495 
496 
497 
498 //------------------------
499 // Non-volative memory (FLASH)
500 //------------------------
501 #if defined(FLASH_AddressBase)
502 
503  /** @brief struct to control write/erase of flash memory (FLASH) */
504  typedef struct {
505 
506  /** @brief Flash control register 1 (FLASH_CR1) */
507  struct {
508  _BITS FIX : 1; ///< Fixed Byte programming time
509  _BITS IE : 1; ///< Flash Interrupt enable
510  _BITS AHALT : 1; ///< Power-down in Active-halt mode
511  _BITS HALT : 1; ///< Power-down in Halt mode
512  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
513  } CR1;
514 
515 
516  /** @brief Flash control register 2 (FLASH_CR2) */
517  struct {
518  _BITS PRG : 1; ///< Standard block programming
519  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
520  _BITS FPRG : 1; ///< Fast block programming
521  _BITS ERASE : 1; ///< Block erasing
522  _BITS WPRG : 1; ///< Word programming
523  _BITS OPT : 1; ///< Write option bytes
524  } CR2;
525 
526 
527  /** @brief Complementary flash control register 2 (FLASH_NCR2) */
528  struct {
529  _BITS NPRG : 1; ///< Standard block programming
530  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
531  _BITS NFPRG : 1; ///< Fast block programming
532  _BITS NERASE : 1; ///< Block erasing
533  _BITS NWPRG : 1; ///< Word programming
534  _BITS NOPT : 1; ///< Write option bytes
535  } NCR2;
536 
537 
538  /** @brief Flash protection register (FLASH_FPR) */
539  struct {
540  _BITS WPB : 6; ///< User boot code area protection bits
541  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
542  } FPR;
543 
544 
545  /** @brief Complementary flash protection register (FLASH_NFPR) */
546  struct {
547  _BITS NWPB : 6; ///< User boot code area protection bits
548  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
549  } NFPR;
550 
551 
552  /** @brief Flash status register (FLASH_IAPSR) */
553  struct {
554  _BITS WR_PG_DIS : 1; ///< Write attempted to protected page flag
555  _BITS PUL : 1; ///< Flash Program memory unlocked flag
556  _BITS EOP : 1; ///< End of programming (write or erase operation) flag
557  _BITS DUL : 1; ///< Data EEPROM area unlocked flag
558  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved, forced by hardware to 0
559  _BITS HVOFF : 1; ///< End of high voltage flag
560  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
561  } IAPSR;
562 
563 
564  /** @brief Reserved registers (2B) */
565  uint8_t res[2];
566 
567 
568  /** @brief Flash program memory unprotecting key register (FLASH_PUKR) */
569  struct {
570  _BITS PUK : 8; ///< Program memory write unlock key
571  } PUKR;
572 
573 
574  /** @brief Reserved register (1B) */
575  uint8_t res2[1];
576 
577 
578  /** @brief Data EEPROM unprotection key register (FLASH_DUKR) */
579  struct {
580  _BITS DUK : 8; ///< Data EEPROM write unlock key
581  } DUKR;
582 
583  } FLASH_t;
584 
585  /* Pointer to flash registers */
586  #define _FLASH _SFR(FLASH_t, FLASH_AddressBase) ///< Flash struct/bit access
587  #define _FLASH_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, FLASH_AddressBase+0x00) ///< Flash control register 1 (FLASH_CR1)
588  #define _FLASH_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, FLASH_AddressBase+0x01) ///< Flash control register 2 (FLASH_CR2)
589  #define _FLASH_NCR2 _SFR(uint8_t, FLASH_AddressBase+0x02) ///< complementary Flash control register 2 (FLASH_NCR2)
590  #define _FLASH_FPR _SFR(uint8_t, FLASH_AddressBase+0x03) ///< Flash protection register (FLASH_FPR)
591  #define _FLASH_NFPR _SFR(uint8_t, FLASH_AddressBase+0x04) ///< complementary Flash protection register (FLASH_NFPR)
592  #define _FLASH_IAPSR _SFR(uint8_t, FLASH_AddressBase+0x05) ///< Flash status register (FLASH_IAPSR)
593  // reserved (2B)
594  #define _FLASH_PUKR _SFR(uint8_t, FLASH_AddressBase+0x08) ///< Flash program memory unprotecting key register (FLASH_PUKR)
595  // reserved (1B)
596  #define _FLASH_DUKR _SFR(uint8_t, FLASH_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< Data EEPROM unprotection key register (FLASH_DUKR)
597 
598  /* FLASH Module Reset Values */
599  #define _FLASH_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Flash control register 1 reset value
600  #define _FLASH_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Flash control register 2 reset value
601  #define _FLASH_NCR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< complementary Flash control register 2 reset value
602  #define _FLASH_IAPSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x40) ///< Flash status register reset value
603  #define _FLASH_PUKR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Flash program memory unprotecting key reset value
604  #define _FLASH_DUKR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Data EEPROM unprotection key reset value
605 
606  /* Flash control register 1 (_FLASH_CR1) */
607  #define _FLASH_FIX ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Fixed Byte programming time [0] (in _FLASH_CR1)
608  #define _FLASH_IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Flash Interrupt enable [0] (in _FLASH_CR1)
609  #define _FLASH_AHALT ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Power-down in Active-halt mode [0] (in _FLASH_CR1)
610  #define _FLASH_HALT ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Power-down in Halt mode [0] (in _FLASH_CR1)
611  // reserved [7:4]
612 
613  /* Flash control register 2 and complement (FLASH_CR2 and FLASH_NCR2) */
614  #define _FLASH_PRG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Standard block programming [0] (in _FLASH_CR2 and _FLASH_NCR2)
615  // reserved [3:1]
616  #define _FLASH_FPRG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< Fast block programming [0] (in _FLASH_CR2 and _FLASH_NCR2)
617  #define _FLASH_ERASE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< Block erasing [0] (in _FLASH_CR2 and _FLASH_NCR2)
618  #define _FLASH_WPRG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< Word programming [0] (in _FLASH_CR2 and _FLASH_NCR2)
619  #define _FLASH_OPT ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< Write option bytes [0] (in _FLASH_CR2 and _FLASH_NCR2)
620 
621  /* Flash protection register and complement (FLASH_FPR and FLASH_NFPR) */
622  #define _FLASH_WPB ((uint8_t) (0x3F << 0)) ///< User boot code area protection bits [5:0] (in _FLASH_FPR and _FLASH_NFPR)
623  #define _FLASH_WPB0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< User boot code area protection bit [0] (in _FLASH_FPR and _FLASH_NFPR)
624  #define _FLASH_WPB1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< User boot code area protection bit [1] (in _FLASH_FPR and _FLASH_NFPR)
625  #define _FLASH_WPB2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< User boot code area protection bit [2] (in _FLASH_FPR and _FLASH_NFPR)
626  #define _FLASH_WPB3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< User boot code area protection bit [3] (in _FLASH_FPR and _FLASH_NFPR)
627  #define _FLASH_WPB4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< User boot code area protection bit [4] (in _FLASH_FPR and _FLASH_NFPR)
628  #define _FLASH_WPB5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< User boot code area protection bit [5] (in _FLASH_FPR and _FLASH_NFPR)
629  // reserved [7:6]
630 
631  /* Flash status register (FLASH_IAPSR) */
632  #define _FLASH_WR_PG_DIS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Write attempted to protected page flag [0] (in _FLASH_IAPSR)
633  #define _FLASH_PUL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Flash Program memory unlocked flag [0] (in _FLASH_IAPSR)
634  #define _FLASH_EOP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< End of programming (write or erase operation) flag [0] (in _FLASH_IAPSR)
635  #define _FLASH_DUL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Data EEPROM area unlocked flag [0] (in _FLASH_IAPSR)
636  // reserved [4]
637  #define _FLASH_HVOFF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< End of high voltage flag [0] (in _FLASH_IAPSR)
638  // reserved [7:6]
639 
640 #endif // FLASH_AddressBase
641 
642 
643 
644 //------------------------
645 // External interrupt control (EXTI)
646 //------------------------
647 #if defined(EXTI_AddressBase)
648 
649  /** @brief struct for configuring external port interrupts (EXTI) */
650  typedef struct {
651 
652  /** @brief External interrupt control register 1 (EXTI_CR1) */
653  struct {
654  _BITS PAIS : 2; ///< Port A external interrupt sensitivity bits
655  _BITS PBIS : 2; ///< Port B external interrupt sensitivity bits
656  _BITS PCIS : 2; ///< Port C external interrupt sensitivity bits
657  _BITS PDIS : 2; ///< Port D external interrupt sensitivity bits
658  } CR1;
659 
660 
661  /** @brief External interrupt control register 2 (EXTI_CR2) */
662  struct {
663  _BITS PEIS : 2; ///< Port E external interrupt sensitivity bits
664  _BITS TLIS : 1; ///< Top level interrupt sensitivity
665  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
666  } CR2;
667 
668  } EXTI_t;
669 
670  /* Pointer to EXTI registers */
671  #define _EXTI _SFR(EXTI_t, EXTI_AddressBase) ///< External interrupt struct/bit access
672  #define _EXTI_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, EXTI_AddressBase+0x00) ///< External interrupt control register 1 (EXTI_CR1)
673  #define _EXTI_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, EXTI_AddressBase+0x01) ///< External interrupt control register 2 (EXTI_CR2)
674 
675  /* EXTI Module Reset Values */
676  #define _EXTI_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< External interrupt control register 1 reset value
677  #define _EXTI_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< External interrupt control register 2 reset value
678 
679  /* External interrupt control register 1 (EXTI_CR1) */
680  #define _EXTI_PAIS ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port A [1:0] (in _EXTI_CR1)
681  #define _EXTI_PAIS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port A [0] (in _EXTI_CR1)
682  #define _EXTI_PAIS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port A [1] (in _EXTI_CR1)
683  #define _EXTI_PBIS ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port B [1:0] (in _EXTI_CR1)
684  #define _EXTI_PBIS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port B [0] (in _EXTI_CR1)
685  #define _EXTI_PBIS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port B [1] (in _EXTI_CR1)
686  #define _EXTI_PCIS ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port C [1:0] (in _EXTI_CR1)
687  #define _EXTI_PCIS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port C [0] (in _EXTI_CR1)
688  #define _EXTI_PCIS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port C [1] (in _EXTI_CR1)
689  #define _EXTI_PDIS ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 6)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port D [1:0] (in _EXTI_CR1)
690  #define _EXTI_PDIS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port D [0] (in _EXTI_CR1)
691  #define _EXTI_PDIS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< External interrupt sensitivity for Port D [1] (in _EXTI_CR1)
692 
693  /* External interrupt control register 2 (EXTI_CR2) */
694  #define _EXTI_PEIS ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< Port E external interrupt sensitivity bits [1:0] (in _EXTI_CR2)
695  #define _EXTI_PEIS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Port E external interrupt sensitivity bits [0] (in _EXTI_CR2)
696  #define _EXTI_PEIS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Port E external interrupt sensitivity bits [1] (in _EXTI_CR2)
697  #define _EXTI_TLIS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Top level interrupt sensitivity [0] (in _EXTI_CR2)
698  // reserved [7:3]
699 
700 #endif // EXTI_AddressBase
701 
702 
703 
704 //------------------------
705 // Reset status (RST)
706 //------------------------
707 #if defined(RST_AddressBase)
708 
709  /** @brief struct for determining reset source (RST) */
710  typedef struct {
711 
712  /** @brief Reset status register (RST_SR) */
713  struct {
714  _BITS WWDGF : 1; ///< Window Watchdog reset flag
715  _BITS IWDGF : 1; ///< Independent Watchdog reset flag
716  _BITS ILLOPF : 1; ///< Illegal opcode reset flag
717  _BITS SWIMF : 1; ///< SWIM reset flag
718  _BITS EMCF : 1; ///< EMC reset flag
719  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
720  } SR;
721 
722  } RST_t;
723 
724  /* Pointer to reset status register */
725  #define _RST _SFR(RST_t, RST_AddressBase) ///< Reset module struct/bit access
726  #define _RST_SR _SFR(uint8_t, RST_AddressBase+0x00) ///< Reset module status register (RST_SR)
727 
728  /* Reset module status register (RST_SR) */
729  #define _RST_WWDGF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Window Watchdog reset flag [0] (in _RST_SR)
730  #define _RST_IWDGF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Independent Watchdog reset flag [0] (in _RST_SR)
731  #define _RST_ILLOPF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Illegal opcode reset flag [0] (in _RST_SR)
732  #define _RST_SWIMF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< SWIM reset flag [0] (in _RST_SR)
733  #define _RST_EMCF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< EMC reset flag [0] (in _RST_SR)
734  // reserved [7:5]
735 
736 #endif // RST_AddressBase
737 
738 
739 
740 //------------------------
741 // Clock control (CLK)
742 //------------------------
743 #if defined(CLK_AddressBase)
744 
745  /** @brief struct for configuring/monitoring clock module (CLK) */
746  typedef struct {
747 
748  /** @brief Internal clock register (CLK_ICKR) */
749  struct {
750  _BITS HSIEN : 1; ///< High speed internal RC oscillator enable
751  _BITS HSIRDY : 1; ///< High speed internal oscillator ready flag
752  _BITS FHWU : 1; ///< Fast wakeup from Halt/Active-halt modes enable
753  _BITS LSIEN : 1; ///< Low speed internal RC oscillator enable
754  _BITS LSIRDY : 1; ///< Low speed internal oscillator ready flag
755  _BITS REGAH : 1; ///< Regulator power off in Active-halt mode enable
756  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
757  } ICKR;
758 
759 
760  /** @brief External clock register (CLK_ECKR) */
761  struct {
762  _BITS HSEEN : 1; ///< High speed external crystal oscillator enable
763  _BITS HSERDY : 1; ///< High speed external crystal oscillator ready
764  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
765  } ECKR;
766 
767 
768  /** @brief Reserved register (1B) */
769  uint8_t res[1];
770 
771 
772  /** @brief Clock master status register (CLK_CMSR) */
773  struct {
774  _BITS CKM : 8; ///< Clock master status bits
775  } CMSR;
776 
777 
778  /** @brief Clock master switch register (CLK_SWR) */
779  struct {
780  _BITS SWI : 8; ///< Clock master selection bits
781  } SWR;
782 
783 
784  /** @brief Switch control register (CLK_SWCR) */
785  struct {
786  _BITS SWBSY : 1; ///< Switch busy flag
787  _BITS SWEN : 1; ///< Switch start/stop enable
788  _BITS SWIEN : 1; ///< Clock switch interrupt enable
789  _BITS SWIF : 1; ///< Clock switch interrupt flag
790  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
791  } SWCR;
792 
793 
794  /** @brief Clock divider register (CLK_CKDIVR) */
795  struct {
796  _BITS CPUDIV : 3; ///< CPU clock prescaler
797  _BITS HSIDIV : 2; ///< High speed internal clock prescaler
798  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared.
799  } CKDIVR;
800 
801 
802  /** @brief Peripheral clock gating register 1 (CLK_PCKENR1) */
803  struct {
804  _BITS PCKEN_I2C : 1; ///< clock enable I2C
805  _BITS PCKEN_SPI : 1; ///< clock enable SPI
806  _BITS PCKEN_UART1 : 1; ///< clock enable UART1
807  _BITS PCKEN_UART2 : 1; ///< clock enable UART2
808  _BITS PCKEN_TIM4_TIM6 : 1; ///< clock enable TIM4/TIM6
809  _BITS PCKEN_TIM2_TIM5 : 1; ///< clock enable TIM4/TIM6
810  _BITS PCKEN_TIM3 : 1; ///< clock enable TIM3
811  _BITS PCKEN_TIM1 : 1; ///< clock enable TIM1
812  } PCKENR1;
813 
814 
815  /** @brief Clock security system register (CLK_CSSR) */
816  struct {
817  _BITS CSSEN : 1; ///< Clock security system enable
818  _BITS AUX : 1; ///< Auxiliary oscillator connected to master clock
819  _BITS CSSDIE : 1; ///< Clock security system detection interrupt enable
820  _BITS CSSD : 1; ///< Clock security system detection
821  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared.
822  } CSSR;
823 
824 
825  /** @brief Configurable clock output register (CLK_CCOR) */
826  struct {
827  _BITS CCOEN : 1; ///< Configurable clock output enable
828  _BITS CCOSEL : 4; ///< Configurable clock output selection.
829  _BITS CCORDY : 1; ///< Configurable clock output ready
830  _BITS CCOBSY : 1; ///< Configurable clock output busy
831  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared.
832  } CCOR;
833 
834 
835  /** @brief Peripheral clock gating register 2 (CLK_PCKENR2) */
836  struct {
837  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
838  _BITS PCKEN_AWU : 1; ///< clock enable AWU
839  _BITS PCKEN_ADC : 1; ///< clock enable ADC
840  _BITS res2 : 3; ///< Reserved
841  _BITS PCKEN_CAN : 1; ///< clock enable CAN
842  } PCKENR2;
843 
844 
845  /** @brief Reserved register (1B). Was CAN clock control (obsolete as of STM8 UM rev 7) */
846  uint8_t res2[1];
847 
848 
849  /** @brief HSI clock calibration trimming register (CLK_HSITRIMR) */
850  struct {
851  _BITS HSITRIM : 4; ///< HSI trimming value (some devices only support 3 bits, see DS!)
852  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared.
853  } HSITRIMR;
854 
855 
856  /** @brief SWIM clock control register (CLK_SWIMCCR) */
857  struct {
858  _BITS SWIMCLK : 1; ///< SWIM clock divider
859  _BITS res : 7; ///< Reserved.
860  } SWIMCCR;
861 
862  } CLK_t;
863 
864  /* Pointer to CLK registers */
865  #define _CLK _SFR(CLK_t, CLK_AddressBase) ///< Clock module struct/bit access
866  #define _CLK_ICKR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x00) ///< Internal clock register
867  #define _CLK_ECKR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x01) ///< External clock register
868  // reserved (1B)
869  #define _CLK_CMSR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x03) ///< Clock master status register
870  #define _CLK_SWR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x04) ///< Clock master switch register
871  #define _CLK_SWCR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x05) ///< Clock switch control register
872  #define _CLK_CKDIVR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x06) ///< Clock divider register
873  #define _CLK_PCKENR1 _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x07) ///< Peripheral clock gating register 1
874  #define _CLK_CSSR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x08) ///< Clock security system register
875  #define _CLK_CCOR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x09) ///< Configurable clock output register
876  #define _CLK_PCKENR2 _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< Peripheral clock gating register 2
877  // reserved (1B)
878  #define _CLK_HSITRIMR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x0C) ///< HSI clock calibration trimming register
879  #define _CLK_SWIMCCR _SFR(uint8_t, CLK_AddressBase+0x0D) ///< SWIM clock control register
880 
881  /* CLK Module Reset Values */
882  #define _CLK_ICKR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x01) ///< Internal clock register reset value
883  #define _CLK_ECKR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< External clock register reset value
884  #define _CLK_CMSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xE1) ///< Clock master status reset value
885  #define _CLK_SWR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xE1) ///< Clock master switch reset value
886  #define _CLK_SWCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Clock switch control reset value
887  #define _CLK_CKDIVR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x18) ///< Clock divider register reset value
888  #define _CLK_PCKENR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Peripheral clock gating register 1 reset value
889  #define _CLK_PCKENR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Peripheral clock gating register 2 reset value
890  #define _CLK_CSSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Clock security system register reset value
891  #define _CLK_CCOR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Configurable clock output register reset value
892  #define _CLK_HSITRIMR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< HSI clock calibration trimming register reset value
893  #define _CLK_SWIMCCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< SWIM clock control register reset value
894 
895  /* Internal clock register (CLK_ICKR) bits */
896  #define _CLK_HSIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< High speed internal RC oscillator enable [0] (in _CLK_ICKR)
897  #define _CLK_HSIRDY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< High speed internal oscillator ready [0] (in _CLK_ICKR)
898  #define _CLK_FHWU ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Fast wakeup from Halt/Active-halt modes [0] (in _CLK_ICKR)
899  #define _CLK_LSIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Low speed internal RC oscillator enable [0] (in _CLK_ICKR)
900  #define _CLK_LSIRDY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< Low speed internal oscillator ready [0] (in _CLK_ICKR)
901  #define _CLK_REGAH ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< Regulator power off in Active-halt mode [0] (in _CLK_ICKR)
902  // reserved [7:6]
903 
904  /* External clock register (CLK_ECKR) */
905  #define _CLK_HSEEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< High speed external crystal oscillator enable [0] (in _CLK_ECKR)
906  #define _CLK_ECKR_HSERDY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< High speed external crystal oscillator ready [0] (in _CLK_ECKR)
907  // reserved [7:2]
908 
909  /* Clock master switch register (CLK_SWR) */
910  #define _CLK_SWI_HSI ((uint8_t) 0xE1) ///< write to CLK_SWR for HSI clock (in _CLK_SWR)
911  #define _CLK_SWI_LSI ((uint8_t) 0xD2) ///< write to CLK_SWR for LSI clock (in _CLK_SWR)
912  #define _CLK_SWI_HSE ((uint8_t) 0xB4) ///< write to CLK_SWR for HSE clock (in _CLK_SWR)
913 
914  /* Switch control register (CLK_SWCR) */
915  #define _CLK_SWBSY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Switch busy flag [0] (in _CLK_SWCR)
916  #define _CLK_SWEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Switch start/stop enable [0] (in _CLK_SWCR)
917  #define _CLK_SWIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Clock switch interrupt enable [0] (in _CLK_SWCR)
918  #define _CLK_SWIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Clock switch interrupt flag [0] (in _CLK_SWCR)
919  // reserved [7:4]
920 
921  /* Clock divider register (CLK_CKDIVR) */
922  #define _CLK_CPUDIV ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 0)) ///< CPU clock prescaler [2:0] (in _CLK_CKDIVR)
923  #define _CLK_CPUDIV0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CPU clock prescaler [0] (in _CLK_CKDIVR)
924  #define _CLK_CPUDIV1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CPU clock prescaler [1] (in _CLK_CKDIVR)
925  #define _CLK_CPUDIV2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CPU clock prescaler [2] (in _CLK_CKDIVR)
926  #define _CLK_HSIDIV ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 3)) ///< High speed internal clock prescaler [1:0] (in _CLK_CKDIVR)
927  #define _CLK_HSIDIV0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< High speed internal clock prescaler [0] (in _CLK_CKDIVR)
928  #define _CLK_HSIDIV1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< High speed internal clock prescaler [1] (in _CLK_CKDIVR)
929  // reserved [7:5]
930 
931  /* Peripheral clock gating register 1 (CLK_PCKENR1) */
932  #define _CLK_I2C ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< clock enable I2C [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR1)
933  #define _CLK_SPI ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< clock enable SPI [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR1)
934  #define _CLK_UART1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< clock enable UART1 [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR1)
935  #define _CLK_UART2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< clock enable UART2 [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR1)
936  #define _CLK_TIM4_TIM6 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< clock enable TIM4/TIM6 [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR1)
937  #define _CLK_TIM2_TIM5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< clock enable TIM2/TIM5 [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR1)
938  #define _CLK_TIM3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< clock enable TIM3 [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR1)
939  #define _CLK_TIM1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< clock enable TIM1 [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR1)
940 
941  /* Clock security system register (CLK_CSSR) */
942  #define _CLK_CSSEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Clock security system enable [0] (in _CLK_CSSR)
943  #define _CLK_AUX ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Auxiliary oscillator connected to master clock [0] (in _CLK_CSSR)
944  #define _CLK_CSSDIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Clock security system detection interrupt enable [0] (in _CLK_CSSR)
945  #define _CLK_CSSD ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Clock security system detection [0] (in _CLK_CSSR)
946  // reserved [7:4]
947 
948  /* Configurable clock output register (CLK_CCOR) */
949  #define _CLK_CCOEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Configurable clock output enable [0] (in _CLK_CCOR)
950  #define _CLK_CCOSEL ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 1)) ///< Configurable clock output selection [3:0] (in _CLK_CCOR)
951  #define _CLK_CCOSEL0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Configurable clock output selection [0] (in _CLK_CCOR)
952  #define _CLK_CCOSEL1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Configurable clock output selection [1] (in _CLK_CCOR)
953  #define _CLK_CCOSEL2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Configurable clock output selection [2] (in _CLK_CCOR)
954  #define _CLK_CCOSEL3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< Configurable clock output selection [3] (in _CLK_CCOR)
955  #define _CLK_CCORDY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< Configurable clock output ready [0] (in _CLK_CCOR)
956  #define _CLK_CCOBSY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< Configurable clock output busy [0] (in _CLK_CCOR)
957  // reserved [7]
958 
959  /* Peripheral clock gating register 2 (CLK_PCKENR2) */
960  // reserved [1:0]
961  #define _CLK_AWU ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< clock enable AWU [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR2)
962  #define _CLK_ADC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< clock enable ADC [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR2)
963  // reserved [6:4]
964  #define _CLK_CAN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< clock enable CAN [0] (in _CLK_PCKENR2)
965 
966  /* HSI clock calibration trimming register (CLK_HSITRIMR) */
967  #define _CLK_HSITRIM ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< HSI trimming value (some devices only support 3 bits, see DS!) [3:0] (in _CLK_HSITRIMR)
968  #define _CLK_HSITRIM0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< HSI trimming value [0] (in _CLK_HSITRIMR)
969  #define _CLK_HSITRIM1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< HSI trimming value [1] (in _CLK_HSITRIMR)
970  #define _CLK_HSITRIM2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< HSI trimming value [2] (in _CLK_HSITRIMR)
971  #define _CLK_HSITRIM3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< HSI trimming value [3] (in _CLK_HSITRIMR)
972  // reserved [7:4]
973 
974  /* SWIM clock control register (CLK_SWIMCCR) */
975  #define _CLK_SWIMCLK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< SWIM clock divider [0] (in _CLK_SWIMCCR)
976  // reserved [7:2]
977 
978 #endif // CLK_AddressBase
979 
980 
981 
982 //------------------------
983 // Window Watchdog (WWDG)
984 //------------------------
985 #if defined(WWDG_AddressBase)
986 
987  /** @brief struct for access to Window Watchdog registers (WWDG) */
988  typedef struct {
989 
990  /** @brief WWDG Control register (WWDG_CR) */
991  struct {
992  _BITS T : 7; ///< 7-bit WWDG counter
993  _BITS WDGA : 1; ///< WWDG activation bit (n/a if WWDG enabled by option byte)
994  } CR;
995 
996 
997  /** @brief WWDR Window register (WWDG_WR) */
998  struct {
999  _BITS W : 7; ///< 7-bit window value
1000  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
1001  } WR;
1002 
1003  } WWDG_t;
1004 
1005  /* Pointer to Window Watchdog registers */
1006  #define _WWDG _SFR(WWDG_t, WWDG_AddressBase) ///< Window Watchdog struct/bit access
1007  #define _WWDG_CR _SFR(uint8_t, WWDG_AddressBase+0x00) ///< Window Watchdog Control register (WWDG_CR)
1008  #define _WWDG_WR _SFR(uint8_t, WWDG_AddressBase+0x01) ///< Window Watchdog Window register (WWDG_WR)
1009 
1010  /* WWDG Module Reset Values */
1011  #define _WWDG_CR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x7F) ///< Window Watchdog Control register reset value
1012  #define _WWDG_WR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x7F) ///< Window Watchdog Window register reset value
1013 
1014  /* WWDG Control register (WWDG_CR) */
1015  #define _WWDG_T ((uint8_t) (0x7F << 0)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit counter [6:0] (in _WWDG_CR)
1016  #define _WWDG_T0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit counter [0] (in _WWDG_CR)
1017  #define _WWDG_T1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit counter [1] (in _WWDG_CR)
1018  #define _WWDG_T2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit counter [2] (in _WWDG_CR)
1019  #define _WWDG_T3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit counter [3] (in _WWDG_CR)
1020  #define _WWDG_T4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit counter [4] (in _WWDG_CR)
1021  #define _WWDG_T5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit counter [5] (in _WWDG_CR)
1022  #define _WWDG_T6 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit counter [6] (in _WWDG_CR)
1023  #define _WWDG_WDGA ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< Window Watchdog activation bit (n/a if WWDG enabled by option byte) [0] (in _WWDG_CR)
1024 
1025  /* WWDR Window register (WWDG_WR) */
1026  #define _WWDG_W ((uint8_t) (0x7F << 0)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit window value [6:0] (in _WWDG_WR)
1027  #define _WWDG_W0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit window value [0] (in _WWDG_WR)
1028  #define _WWDG_W1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit window value [1] (in _WWDG_WR)
1029  #define _WWDG_W2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit window value [2] (in _WWDG_WR)
1030  #define _WWDG_W3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit window value [3] (in _WWDG_WR)
1031  #define _WWDG_W4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit window value [4] (in _WWDG_WR)
1032  #define _WWDG_W5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit window value [5] (in _WWDG_WR)
1033  #define _WWDG_W6 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< Window Watchdog 7-bit window value [6] (in _WWDG_WR)
1034  // reserved [7]
1035 
1036 #endif // WWDG_AddressBase
1037 
1038 
1039 
1040 //------------------------
1041 // Independent Timeout Watchdog (IWDG)
1042 //------------------------
1043 #if defined(IWDG_AddressBase)
1044 
1045  /** @brief struct for access to Independent Timeout Watchdog registers (IWDG) */
1046  typedef struct {
1047 
1048  /** @brief IWDG Key register (IWDG_KR) */
1049  struct {
1050  _BITS KEY : 8; ///< IWDG Key
1051  } KR;
1052 
1053 
1054  /** @brief IWDG Prescaler register (IWDG_PR) */
1055  struct {
1056  _BITS PRE : 3; ///< Prescaler divider
1057  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
1058  } PR;
1059 
1060 
1061  /** @brief IWDG Reload register (IWDG_RLR) */
1062  struct {
1063  _BITS RL : 8; ///< IWDG Reload value
1064  } RLR;
1065 
1066  } IWDG_t;
1067 
1068  /* Pointer to Independent Timeout Watchdog registers */
1069  #define _IWDG _SFR(IWDG_t, IWDG_AddressBase) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog struct/bit access
1070  #define _IWDG_KR _SFR(uint8_t, IWDG_AddressBase+0x00) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog Key register (IWDG_KR)
1071  #define _IWDG_PR _SFR(uint8_t, IWDG_AddressBase+0x01) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog Prescaler register (IWDG_PR)
1072  #define _IWDG_RLR _SFR(uint8_t, IWDG_AddressBase+0x02) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog Reload register (IWDG_RLR)
1073 
1074  /* IWDG Module Reset Values */
1075  #define _IWDG_PR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog Prescaler register reset value
1076  #define _IWDG_RLR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog Reload register reset value
1077 
1078  /* IWDG Key register (IWDG_KR) keys */
1079  #define _IWDG_KEY_ENABLE ((uint8_t) 0xCC) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog enable (in _IWDG_KR)
1080  #define _IWDG_KEY_REFRESH ((uint8_t) 0xAA) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog refresh (in _IWDG_KR)
1081  #define _IWDG_KEY_ACCESS ((uint8_t) 0x55) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog unlock write to IWDG_PR and IWDG_RLR (in _IWDG_KR)
1082 
1083  /* IWDG Prescaler register (IWDG_PR) bits */
1084  #define _IWDG_PRE ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 0)) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog Prescaler divider [2:0] (in _IWDG_PR)
1085  #define _IWDG_PRE0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog Prescaler divider [0] (in _IWDG_PR)
1086  #define _IWDG_PRE1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog Prescaler divider [1] (in _IWDG_PR)
1087  #define _IWDG_PRE2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Independent Timeout Watchdog Prescaler divider [2] (in _IWDG_PR)
1088  // reserved [7:3]
1089 
1090 #endif // IWDG_AddressBase
1091 
1092 
1093 
1094 //------------------------
1095 // Auto Wake-Up Module (AWU)
1096 //------------------------
1097 #if defined(AWU_AddressBase)
1098 
1099  /** @brief struct for cofiguring the Auto Wake-Up Module (AWU) */
1100  typedef struct {
1101 
1102  /** @brief AWU Control/status register (AWU_CSR) */
1103  struct {
1104  _BITS MSR : 1; ///< LSI measurement enable
1105  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
1106  _BITS AWUEN : 1; ///< Auto-wakeup enable
1107  _BITS AWUF : 1; ///< Auto-wakeup flag
1108  _BITS res2 : 2; ///< Reserved
1109  } CSR;
1110 
1111 
1112  /** @brief AWU Asynchronous prescaler register (AWU_APR) */
1113  struct {
1114  _BITS APRE : 6; ///< Asynchronous prescaler divider
1115  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
1116  } APR;
1117 
1118 
1119  /** @brief AWU Timebase selection register (AWU_TBR) */
1120  struct {
1121  _BITS AWUTB : 4; ///< Auto-wakeup timebase selection
1122  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
1123  } TBR;
1124 
1125  } AWU_t;
1126 
1127  /* Pointer to AWU registers */
1128  #define _AWU _SFR(AWU_t, AWU_AddressBase) ///< Auto Wake-Up struct/bit access
1129  #define _AWU_CSR _SFR(uint8_t, AWU_AddressBase+0x00) ///< Auto Wake-Up Control/status register (AWU_CSR)
1130  #define _AWU_APR _SFR(uint8_t, AWU_AddressBase+0x01) ///< Auto Wake-Up Asynchronous prescaler register (AWU_APR)
1131  #define _AWU_TBR _SFR(uint8_t, AWU_AddressBase+0x02) ///< Auto Wake-Up Timebase selection register (AWU_TBR)
1132 
1133  /* AWU Module Reset Values */
1134  #define _AWU_CSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Auto Wake-Up Control/status register reset value
1135  #define _AWU_APR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x3F) ///< Auto Wake-Up Asynchronous prescaler register reset value
1136  #define _AWU_TBR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< Auto Wake-Up Timebase selection register reset value
1137 
1138  /* AWU Control/status register (AWU_CSR) */
1139  #define _AWU_MSR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Auto Wake-Up LSI measurement enable [0] (in _AWU_CSR)
1140  // reserved [3:1]
1141  #define _AWU_AWUEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< Auto-wakeup enable [0] (in _AWU_CSR)
1142  #define _AWU_AWUF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< Auto-wakeup status flag [0] (in _AWU_CSR)
1143  // reserved [7:6]
1144 
1145  /* AWU Asynchronous prescaler register (AWU_APR) */
1146  #define _AWU_APRE ((uint8_t) (0x3F << 0)) ///< Auto-wakeup asynchronous prescaler divider [5:0] (in _AWU_APR)
1147  #define _AWU_APRE0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Auto-wakeup asynchronous prescaler divider [0] (in _AWU_APR)
1148  #define _AWU_APRE1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Auto-wakeup asynchronous prescaler divider [1] (in _AWU_APR)
1149  #define _AWU_APRE2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Auto-wakeup asynchronous prescaler divider [2] (in _AWU_APR)
1150  #define _AWU_APRE3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Auto-wakeup asynchronous prescaler divider [3] (in _AWU_APR)
1151  #define _AWU_APRE4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< Auto-wakeup asynchronous prescaler divider [4] (in _AWU_APR)
1152  #define _AWU_APRE5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< Auto-wakeup asynchronous prescaler divider [5] (in _AWU_APR)
1153  // reserved [7:6]
1154 
1155  /* AWU Asynchronous prescaler register (AWU_APR) */
1156  #define _AWU_AWUTB ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< Auto-wakeup timebase selection [3:0] (in _AWU_APR)
1157  #define _AWU_AWUTB0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Auto-wakeup timebase selection [0] (in _AWU_APR)
1158  #define _AWU_AWUTB1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Auto-wakeup timebase selection [1] (in _AWU_APR)
1159  #define _AWU_AWUTB2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Auto-wakeup timebase selection [2] (in _AWU_APR)
1160  #define _AWU_AWUTB3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Auto-wakeup timebase selection [3] (in _AWU_APR)
1161  // reserved [7:4]
1162 
1163 #endif // AWU_AddressBase
1164 
1165 
1166 
1167 //------------------------
1168 // Beeper module BEEP (all devices, may require option byte change)
1169 //------------------------
1170 #if defined(BEEP_AddressBase)
1171 
1172  /** @brief struct for beeper control (BEEP) */
1173  typedef struct {
1174 
1175  /** @brief Beeper control/status register (BEEP_CSR) */
1176  struct {
1177  _BITS BEEPDIV : 5; ///< Beep clock prescaler divider
1178  _BITS BEEPEN : 1; ///< Beep enable
1179  _BITS BEEPSEL : 2; ///< Beeper frequency selectiouint8_tn
1180  } CSR;
1181 
1182  } BEEP_t;
1183 
1184  /* Pointer to BEEP registers */
1185  #define _BEEP _SFR(BEEP_t, BEEP_AddressBase) ///< Beeper struct/bit access
1186  #define _BEEP_CSR _SFR(uint8_t, BEEP_AddressBase+0x00) ///< Beeper control/status register (BEEP_CSR)
1187 
1188  /* BEEP Module Reset Values */
1189  #define _BEEP_CSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x1F) ///< Beeper control/status register reset value
1190 
1191  /* Beeper control/status register (BEEP_CSR) */
1192  #define _BEEP_BEEPDIV ((uint8_t) (0x1F << 0)) ///< Beeper clock prescaler divider [4:0] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1193  #define _BEEP_BEEPDIV0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< Beeper clock prescaler divider [0] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1194  #define _BEEP_BEEPDIV1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Beeper clock prescaler divider [1] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1195  #define _BEEP_BEEPDIV2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< Beeper clock prescaler divider [2] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1196  #define _BEEP_BEEPDIV3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< Beeper clock prescaler divider [3] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1197  #define _BEEP_BEEPDIV4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< Beeper clock prescaler divider [4] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1198  #define _BEEP_BEEPEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< Beeper enable [0] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1199  #define _BEEP_BEEPSEL ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 6)) ///< Beeper frequency selection [1:0] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1200  #define _BEEP_BEEPSEL0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< Beeper frequency selection [0] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1201  #define _BEEP_BEEPSEL1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< Beeper frequency selection [1] (in _BEEP_CSR)
1202 
1203 #endif // BEEP_AddressBase
1204 
1205 
1206 
1207 //------------------------
1208 // Serial Peripheral Interface SPI
1209 //------------------------
1210 #if defined(SPI_AddressBase)
1211 
1212  /** @brief struct for controlling SPI module (SPI) */
1213  typedef struct {
1214 
1215  /** @brief SPI control register 1 (SPI_CR1) */
1216  struct {
1217  _BITS CPHA : 1; ///< Clock phase
1218  _BITS CPOL : 1; ///< Clock polarity
1219  _BITS MSTR : 1; ///< Master/slave selection
1220  _BITS BR : 3; ///< Baudrate control
1221  _BITS SPE : 1; ///< SPI enable
1222  _BITS LSBFIRST : 1; ///< Frame format
1223  } CR1;
1224 
1225 
1226  /** @brief SPI control register 2 (SPI_CR2) */
1227  struct {
1228  _BITS SSI : 1; ///< Internal slave select
1229  _BITS SSM : 1; ///< Software slave management
1230  _BITS RXONLY : 1; ///< Receive only
1231  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
1232  _BITS CRCNEXT : 1; ///< Transmit CRC next
1233  _BITS CRCEN : 1; ///< Hardware CRC calculation enable
1234  _BITS BDOE : 1; ///< Input/Output enable in bidirectional mode
1235  _BITS BDM : 1; ///< Bidirectional data mode enable
1236  } CR2;
1237 
1238 
1239  /** @brief SPI interrupt control register (SPI_ICR) */
1240  struct {
1241  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
1242  _BITS WKIE : 1; ///< Wakeup interrupt enable
1243  _BITS ERRIE : 1; ///< Error interrupt enable
1244  _BITS RXIE : 1; ///< Rx buffer not empty interrupt enable
1245  _BITS TXIE : 1; ///< Tx buffer empty interrupt enable
1246  } ICR;
1247 
1248 
1249  /** @brief SPI status register (SPI_SR) */
1250  struct {
1251  _BITS RXNE : 1; ///< Receive buffer not empty
1252  _BITS TXE : 1; ///< Transmit buffer empty
1253  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
1254  _BITS WKUP : 1; ///< Wakeup flag
1255  _BITS CRCERR : 1; ///< CRC error flag
1256  _BITS MODF : 1; ///< Mode fault
1257  _BITS OVR : 1; ///< Overrun flag
1258  _BITS BSY : 1; ///< Busy flag
1259  } SR;
1260 
1261 
1262  /** @brief SPI data register (SPI_DR) */
1263  struct {
1264  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< SPI data
1265  } DR;
1266 
1267 
1268  /** @brief SPI CRC polynomial register (SPI_CRCPR) */
1269  struct {
1270  _BITS CRCPOLY : 8; ///< CRC polynomial register
1271  } CRCPR;
1272 
1273 
1274  /** @brief SPI Rx CRC register (SPI_RXCRCR) */
1275  struct {
1276  _BITS RxCRC : 8; ///< Rx CRC Register
1277  } RXCRCR;
1278 
1279 
1280  /** @brief SPI Tx CRC register (SPI_TXCRCR) */
1281  struct {
1282  _BITS TxCRC : 8; ///< Tx CRC register
1283  } TXCRCR;
1284 
1285  } SPI_t;
1286 
1287  /// register for SPI control
1288  #define _SPI _SFR(SPI_t, SPI_AddressBase) ///< SPI struct/bit access
1289  #define _SPI_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, SPI_AddressBase+0x00) ///< SPI control register 1
1290  #define _SPI_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, SPI_AddressBase+0x01) ///< SPI control register 2
1291  #define _SPI_ICR _SFR(uint8_t, SPI_AddressBase+0x02) ///< SPI interrupt control register
1292  #define _SPI_SR _SFR(uint8_t, SPI_AddressBase+0x03) ///< SPI status register
1293  #define _SPI_DR _SFR(uint8_t, SPI_AddressBase+0x04) ///< SPI data register
1294  #define _SPI_CRCPR _SFR(uint8_t, SPI_AddressBase+0x05) ///< SPI CRC polynomial register
1295  #define _SPI_RXCRCR _SFR(uint8_t, SPI_AddressBase+0x06) ///< SPI Rx CRC register
1296  #define _SPI_TXCRCR _SFR(uint8_t, SPI_AddressBase+0x07) ///< SPI Tx CRC register
1297 
1298  /* SPI Module Reset Values */
1299  #define _SPI_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< SPI Control Register 1 reset value
1300  #define _SPI_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< SPI Control Register 2 reset value
1301  #define _SPI_ICR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< SPI Interrupt Control Register reset value
1302  #define _SPI_SR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x02) ///< SPI Status Register reset value
1303  #define _SPI_DR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< SPI Data Register reset value
1304  #define _SPI_CRCPR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x07) ///< SPI Polynomial Register reset value
1305  #define _SPI_RXCRCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< SPI RX CRC Register reset value
1306  #define _SPI_TXCRCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< SPI TX CRC Register reset value
1307 
1308  /* SPI control register 1 (SPI_CR1) */
1309  #define _SPI_CPHA ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< SPI Clock phase [0] (in _SPI_CR1)
1310  #define _SPI_CPOL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< SPI Clock polarity [0] (in _SPI_CR1)
1311  #define _SPI_MSTR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< SPI Master/slave selection [0] (in _SPI_CR1)
1312  #define _SPI_BR ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 3)) ///< SPI Baudrate control [2:0] (in _SPI_CR1)
1313  #define _SPI_BR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< SPI Baudrate control [0] (in _SPI_CR1)
1314  #define _SPI_BR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< SPI Baudrate control [1] (in _SPI_CR1)
1315  #define _SPI_BR2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< SPI Baudrate control [2] (in _SPI_CR1)
1316  #define _SPI_SPE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< SPI enable [0] (in _SPI_CR1)
1317  #define _SPI_LSBFIRST ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< SPI Frame format [0] (in _SPI_CR1)
1318 
1319  /* SPI control register 2 (SPI_CR2) */
1320  #define _SPI_SSI ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< SPI Internal slave select [0] (in _SPI_CR2)
1321  #define _SPI_SSM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< SPI Software slave management [0] (in _SPI_CR2)
1322  #define _SPI_RXONLY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< SPI Receive only [0] (in _SPI_CR2)
1323  // reserved [3]
1324  #define _SPI_CRCNEXT ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< SPI Transmit CRC next [0] (in _SPI_CR2)
1325  #define _SPI_CRCEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< SPI Hardware CRC calculation enable [0] (in _SPI_CR2)
1326  #define _SPI_BDOE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< SPI Input/Output enable in bidirectional mode [0] (in _SPI_CR2)
1327  #define _SPI_BDM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< SPI Bidirectional data mode enable [0] (in _SPI_CR2)
1328 
1329  /* SPI interrupt control register (SPI_ICR) */
1330  // reserved [3:0]
1331  #define _SPI_WKIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< SPI Wakeup interrupt enable [0] (in _SPI_ICR)
1332  #define _SPI_ERRIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< SPI Error interrupt enable [0] (in _SPI_ICR)
1333  #define _SPI_RXIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< SPI Rx buffer not empty interrupt enable [0] (in _SPI_ICR)
1334  #define _SPI_TXIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< SPI Tx buffer empty interrupt enable [0] (in _SPI_ICR)
1335 
1336  /* SPI status register (SPI_SR) */
1337  #define _SPI_RXNE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< SPI Receive buffer not empty [0] (in _SPI_SR)
1338  #define _SPI_TXE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< SPI Transmit buffer empty [0] (in _SPI_SR)
1339  // reserved [2]
1340  #define _SPI_WKUP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< SPI Wakeup flag [0] (in _SPI_SR)
1341  #define _SPI_CRCERR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< SPI CRC error flag [0] (in _SPI_SR)
1342  #define _SPI_MODF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< SPI Mode fault [0] (in _SPI_SR)
1343  #define _SPI_OVR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< SPI Overrun flag [0] (in _SPI_SR)
1344  #define _SPI_BSY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< SPI Busy flag [0] (in _SPI_SR)
1345 
1346 #endif // SPI_AddressBase
1347 
1348 
1349 
1350 //------------------------
1351 // I2C Bus Interface
1352 //------------------------
1353 #if defined(I2C_AddressBase)
1354 
1355  /** @brief struct for controlling I2C module (I2C) */
1356  typedef struct {
1357 
1358  /** @brief I2C Control register 1 (I2C_CR1) */
1359  struct {
1360  _BITS PE : 1; ///< Peripheral enable
1361  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
1362  _BITS ENGC : 1; ///< General call enable
1363  _BITS NOSTRETCH : 1; ///< Clock stretching disable (Slave mode)
1364  } CR1;
1365 
1366 
1367  /** @brief I2C Control register 2 (I2C_CR2) */
1368  struct {
1369  _BITS START : 1; ///< Start generation
1370  _BITS STOP : 1; ///< Stop generation
1371  _BITS ACK : 1; ///< Acknowledge enable
1372  _BITS POS : 1; ///< Acknowledge position (for data reception)
1373  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
1374  _BITS SWRST : 1; ///< Software reset
1375  } CR2;
1376 
1377 
1378  /** @brief I2C Frequency register (I2C_FREQR) */
1379  struct {
1380  _BITS FREQ : 6; ///< Peripheral clock frequency
1381  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
1382  } FREQR;
1383 
1384 
1385  /** @brief I2C own address register low byte (I2C_OARL) */
1386  struct {
1387  _BITS ADD0 : 1; ///< Interface address [0] (in 10-bit address mode)
1388  _BITS ADD : 7; ///< Interface address [7:1]
1389  } OARL;
1390 
1391 
1392  /** @brief I2C own address register high byte (I2C_OARH) */
1393  struct {
1394  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
1395  _BITS ADD : 2; ///< Interface address [9:8] (in 10-bit address mode)
1396  _BITS res2 : 3; ///< Reserved
1397  _BITS ADDCONF : 1; ///< Address mode configuration (must always be written as â€˜1â€™)
1398  _BITS ADDMODE : 1; ///< 7-/10-bit addressing mode (Slave mode)
1399  } OARH;
1400 
1401 
1402  /** @brief Reserved register (1B) */
1403  uint8_t res[1];
1404 
1405 
1406  /** @brief I2C data register (I2C_DR) */
1407  struct {
1408  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< I2C data
1409  } DR;
1410 
1411 
1412  /** @brief I2C Status register 1 (I2C_SR1) */
1413  struct {
1414  _BITS SB : 1; ///< Start bit (Mastermode)
1415  _BITS ADDR : 1; ///< Address sent (master mode) / matched (slave mode)
1416  _BITS BTF : 1; ///< Byte transfer finished
1417  _BITS ADD10 : 1; ///< 10-bit header sent (Master mode)
1418  _BITS STOPF : 1; ///< Stop detection (Slave mode)
1419  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
1420  _BITS RXNE : 1; ///< Data register not empty (receivers)
1421  _BITS TXE : 1; ///< Data register empty (transmitters)
1422  } SR1;
1423 
1424 
1425  /** @brief I2C Status register 2 (I2C_SR2) */
1426  struct {
1427  _BITS BERR : 1; ///< Bus error
1428  _BITS ARLO : 1; ///< Arbitration lost (master mode)
1429  _BITS AF : 1; ///< Acknowledge failure
1430  _BITS OVR : 1; ///< Overrun/underrun
1431  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
1432  _BITS WUFH : 1; ///< Wakeup from Halt
1433  _BITS res2 : 2; ///< Reserved
1434  } SR2;
1435 
1436 
1437  /** @brief I2C Status register 3 (I2C_SR3) */
1438  struct {
1439  _BITS MSL : 1; ///< Master/Slave
1440  _BITS BUSY : 1; ///< Bus busy
1441  _BITS TRA : 1; ///< Transmitter/Receiver
1442  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
1443  _BITS GENCALL : 1; ///< General call header (Slavemode)
1444  _BITS res2 : 3; ///< Reserved
1445  } SR3;
1446 
1447 
1448  /** @brief I2C Interrupt register (I2C_ITR) */
1449  struct {
1450  _BITS ITERREN : 1; ///< Error interrupt enable
1451  _BITS ITEVTEN : 1; ///< Event interrupt enable
1452  _BITS ITBUFEN : 1; ///< Buffer interrupt enable
1453  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
1454  } ITR;
1455 
1456 
1457  /** @brief I2C Clock control register low byte (I2C_CCRL) */
1458  struct {
1459  _BITS CCR : 8; ///< Clock control register (Master mode)
1460  } CCRL;
1461 
1462 
1463  /** @brief I2C Clock control register high byte (I2C_CCRH) */
1464  struct {
1465  _BITS CCR : 4; ///< Clock control register in Fast/Standard mode (Master mode)
1466  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
1467  _BITS DUTY : 1; ///< Fast mode duty cycle
1468  _BITS FS : 1; ///< I2C master mode selection
1469  } CCRH;
1470 
1471 
1472  /** @brief I2C rise time register (I2C_TRISER) */
1473  struct {
1474  _BITS TRISE : 6; ///< Maximum rise time in Fast/Standard mode (Master mode)
1475  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
1476  } TRISER;
1477 
1478 
1479  /** @brief Reserved register (1B). Was I2C packet error checking (undocumented in STM8 UM rev 9) */
1480  uint8_t res2[1];
1481 
1482  } I2C_t;
1483 
1484  /// register for SPI control
1485  #define _I2C _SFR(I2C_t, I2C_AddressBase) ///< I2C struct/bit access
1486  #define _I2C_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x00) ///< I2C Control register 1
1487  #define _I2C_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x01) ///< I2C Control register 2
1488  #define _I2C_FREQR _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x02) ///< I2C Frequency register
1489  #define _I2C_OARL _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x03) ///< I2C own address register low byte
1490  #define _I2C_OARH _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x04) ///< I2C own address register high byte
1491  // 1B
1492  #define _I2C_DR _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x06) ///< I2C data register
1493  #define _I2C_SR1 _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x07) ///< I2C Status register 1
1494  #define _I2C_SR2 _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x08) ///< I2C Status register 2
1495  #define _I2C_SR3 _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x09) ///< I2C Status register 3
1496  #define _I2C_ITR _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< I2C Interrupt register
1497  #define _I2C_CCRL _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x0B) ///< I2C Clock control register low byte
1498  #define _I2C_CCRH _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x0C) ///< I2C Clock control register high byte
1499  #define _I2C_TRISER _SFR(uint8_t, I2C_AddressBase+0x0D) ///< I2C rise time register
1500  // 1B
1501 
1502  /* I2C Module Reset Values */
1503  #define _I2C_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C Control register 1 reset value
1504  #define _I2C_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C Control register 2 reset value
1505  #define _I2C_FREQR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C Frequency register reset value
1506  #define _I2C_OARL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C own address register low byte reset value
1507  #define _I2C_OARH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C own address register high byte reset value
1508  #define _I2C_DR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C data register reset value
1509  #define _I2C_SR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C Status register 1 reset value
1510  #define _I2C_SR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C Status register 2 reset value
1511  #define _I2C_SR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C Status register 3 reset value
1512  #define _I2C_ITR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C Interrupt register reset value
1513  #define _I2C_CCRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C Clock control register low byte reset value
1514  #define _I2C_CCRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< I2C Clock control register high byte reset value
1515  #define _I2C_TRISER_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x02) ///< I2C rise time register reset value
1516 
1517  /* I2C Control register 1 (I2C_CR1) */
1518  #define _I2C_PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Peripheral enable [0] (in _I2C_CR1)
1519  // reserved [5:1]
1520  #define _I2C_ENGC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< I2C General call enable [0] (in _I2C_CR1)
1521  #define _I2C_NOSTRETCH ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< I2C Clock stretching disable (Slave mode) [0] (in _I2C_CR1)
1522 
1523  /* I2C Control register 2 (I2C_CR2) */
1524  #define _I2C_START ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Start generation [0] (in _I2C_CR2)
1525  #define _I2C_STOP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Stop generation [0] (in _I2C_CR2)
1526  #define _I2C_ACK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Acknowledge enable [0] (in _I2C_CR2)
1527  #define _I2C_POS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< I2C Acknowledge position (for data reception) [0] (in _I2C_CR2)
1528  // reserved [6:4]
1529  #define _I2C_SWRST ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< I2C Software reset [0] (in _I2C_CR2)
1530 
1531  /* I2C Frequency register (I2C_FREQR) */
1532  #define _I2C_FREQ ((uint8_t) (0x3F << 0)) ///< I2C Peripheral clock frequency [5:0] (in _I2C_FREQR)
1533  #define _I2C_FREQ0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Peripheral clock frequency [0] (in _I2C_FREQR)
1534  #define _I2C_FREQ1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Peripheral clock frequency [1] (in _I2C_FREQR)
1535  #define _I2C_FREQ2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Peripheral clock frequency [2] (in _I2C_FREQR)
1536  #define _I2C_FREQ3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< I2C Peripheral clock frequency [3] (in _I2C_FREQR)
1537  #define _I2C_FREQ4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< I2C Peripheral clock frequency [4] (in _I2C_FREQR)
1538  #define _I2C_FREQ5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< I2C Peripheral clock frequency [5] (in _I2C_FREQR)
1539  // reserved [7:6]
1540 
1541  /* I2C own address register low byte (I2C_OARL) */
1542  #define _I2C_ADD0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Interface address [0] (in 10-bit address mode) (in _I2C_OARL)
1543  #define _I2C_ADD1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Interface address [1] (in _I2C_OARL)
1544  #define _I2C_ADD2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Interface address [2] (in _I2C_OARL)
1545  #define _I2C_ADD3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< I2C Interface address [3] (in _I2C_OARL)
1546  #define _I2C_ADD4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< I2C Interface address [4] (in _I2C_OARL)
1547  #define _I2C_ADD5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< I2C Interface address [5] (in _I2C_OARL)
1548  #define _I2C_ADD6 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< I2C Interface address [6] (in _I2C_OARL)
1549  #define _I2C_ADD7 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< I2C Interface address [7] (in _I2C_OARL)
1550 
1551  /* I2C own address register high byte (I2C_OARH) */
1552  // reserved [0]
1553  #define _I2C_ADD_8_9 ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 1)) ///< I2C Interface address [9:8] (in 10-bit address mode) (in _I2C_OARH)
1554  #define _I2C_ADD8 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Interface address [8] (in _I2C_OARH)
1555  #define _I2C_ADD9 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Interface address [9] (in _I2C_OARH)
1556  // reserved [5:3]
1557  #define _I2C_ADDCONF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< I2C Address mode configuration [0] (in _I2C_OARH)
1558  #define _I2C_ADDMODE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< I2C 7-/10-bit addressing mode (Slave mode) [0] (in _I2C_OARH)
1559 
1560  /* I2C Status register 1 (I2C_SR1) */
1561  #define _I2C_SB ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Start bit (Mastermode) [0] (in _I2C_SR1)
1562  #define _I2C_ADDR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Address sent (master mode) / matched (slave mode) [0] (in _I2C_SR1)
1563  #define _I2C_BTF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Byte transfer finished [0] (in _I2C_SR1)
1564  #define _I2C_ADD10 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< I2C 10-bit header sent (Master mode) [0] (in _I2C_SR1)
1565  #define _I2C_STOPF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< I2C Stop detection (Slave mode) [0] (in _I2C_SR1)
1566  // reserved [5]
1567  #define _I2C_RXNE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< I2C Data register not empty (receivers) [0] (in _I2C_SR1)
