1568  #define _I2C_TXE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< I2C Data register empty (transmitters) [0] (in _I2C_SR1)
1569 
1570  /* I2C Status register 2 (I2C_SR2) */
1571  #define _I2C_BERR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Bus error [0] (in _I2C_SR2)
1572  #define _I2C_ARLO ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Arbitration lost (master mode) [0] (in _I2C_SR2)
1573  #define _I2C_AF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Acknowledge failure [0] (in _I2C_SR2)
1574  #define _I2C_OVR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< I2C Overrun/underrun [0] (in _I2C_SR2)
1575  // reserved [4]
1576  #define _I2C_WUFH ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< I2C Wakeup from Halt [0] (in _I2C_SR2)
1577  // reserved [7:6]
1578 
1579  /* I2C Status register 3 (I2C_SR3) */
1580  #define _I2C_MSL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Master/Slave [0] (in _I2C_SR3)
1581  #define _I2C_BUSY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Bus busy [0] (in _I2C_SR3)
1582  #define _I2C_TRA ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Transmitter/Receiver [0] (in _I2C_SR3)
1583  // reserved [3]
1584  #define _I2C_GENCALL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< I2C General call header (Slavemode) [0] (in _I2C_SR3)
1585  // reserved [7:5]
1586 
1587  /* I2C Interrupt register (I2C_ITR) */
1588  #define _I2C_ITERREN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Error interrupt enable [0] (in _I2C_ITR)
1589  #define _I2C_ITEVTEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Event interrupt enable [0] (in _I2C_ITR)
1590  #define _I2C_ITBUFEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Buffer interrupt enable [0] (in _I2C_ITR)
1591  // reserved [7:5]
1592 
1593  /* I2C Clock control register high byte (I2C_CCRH) */
1594  #define _I2C_CCR ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< I2C Clock control register (Master mode) [3:0] (in _I2C_CCRH)
1595  #define _I2C_CCR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Clock control register (Master mode) [0] (in _I2C_CCRH)
1596  #define _I2C_CCR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Clock control register (Master mode) [1] (in _I2C_CCRH)
1597  #define _I2C_CCR2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Clock control register (Master mode) [2] (in _I2C_CCRH)
1598  #define _I2C_CCR3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< I2C Clock control register (Master mode) [3] (in _I2C_CCRH)
1599  // reserved [5:4]
1600  #define _I2C_DUTY ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< I2C Fast mode duty cycle [0] (in _I2C_CCRH)
1601  #define _I2C_FS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< I2C master mode selection [0] (in _I2C_CCRH)
1602 
1603  /* I2C rise time register (I2C_TRISER) */
1604  #define _I2C_TRISE ((uint8_t) (0x3F << 0)) ///< I2C Maximum rise time (Master mode) [5:0] (in _I2C_TRISER)
1605  #define _I2C_TRISE0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< I2C Maximum rise time (Master mode) [0] (in _I2C_TRISER)
1606  #define _I2C_TRISE1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< I2C Maximum rise time (Master mode) [1] (in _I2C_TRISER)
1607  #define _I2C_TRISE2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< I2C Maximum rise time (Master mode) [2] (in _I2C_TRISER)
1608  #define _I2C_TRISE3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< I2C Maximum rise time (Master mode) [3] (in _I2C_TRISER)
1609  #define _I2C_TRISE4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< I2C Maximum rise time (Master mode) [4] (in _I2C_TRISER)
1610  #define _I2C_TRISE5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< I2C Maximum rise time (Master mode) [5] (in _I2C_TRISER)
1611  // reserved [7:6]
1612 
1613 #endif // I2C_AddressBase
1614 
1615 
1616 
1617 //------------------------
1618 // Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter 1 (UART1)
1619 //------------------------
1620 #if defined(UART1_AddressBase)
1621 
1622  /** @brief struct for controlling Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter 1 (UART1) */
1623  typedef struct {
1624 
1625  /** @brief UART1 Status register (UART1_SR) */
1626  struct {
1627  _BITS PE : 1; ///< Parity error
1628  _BITS FE : 1; ///< Framing error
1629  _BITS NF : 1; ///< Noise flag
1630  _BITS OR : 1; ///< LIN Header Error (LIN slave mode) / Overrun error
1631  _BITS IDLE : 1; ///< IDLE line detected
1632  _BITS RXNE : 1; ///< Read data register not empty
1633  _BITS TC : 1; ///< Transmission complete
1634  _BITS TXE : 1; ///< Transmit data register empty
1635  } SR;
1636 
1637 
1638  /** @brief UART1 data register (UART1_DR) */
1639  struct {
1640  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< UART1 data
1641  } DR;
1642 
1643 
1644  /** @brief UART1 Baud rate register 1 (UART1_BRR1) */
1645  struct {
1646  _BITS DIV_4_11 : 8; ///< UART_DIV bits [11:4]
1647  } BRR1;
1648 
1649 
1650  /** @brief UART1 Baud rate register 2 (UART1_BRR2) */
1651  struct {
1652  _BITS DIV_0_3 : 4; ///< UART_DIV bits [3:0]
1653  _BITS DIV_12_15 : 4; ///< UART_DIV bits [15:12]
1654  } BRR2;
1655 
1656 
1657  /** @brief UART1 Control register 1 (UART1_CR1) */
1658  struct {
1659  _BITS PIEN : 1; ///< Parity interrupt enable
1660  _BITS PS : 1; ///< Parity selection
1661  _BITS PCEN : 1; ///< Parity control enable
1662  _BITS WAKE : 1; ///< Wakeup method
1663  _BITS M : 1; ///< word length
1664  _BITS UARTD : 1; ///< UART Disable (for low power consumption)
1665  _BITS T8 : 1; ///< Transmit Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode)
1666  _BITS R8 : 1; ///< Receive Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode)
1667  } CR1;
1668 
1669 
1670  /** @brief UART1 Control register 2 (UART1_CR2) */
1671  struct {
1672  _BITS SBK : 1; ///< Send break
1673  _BITS RWU : 1; ///< Receiver wakeup
1674  _BITS REN : 1; ///< Receiver enable
1675  _BITS TEN : 1; ///< Transmitter enable
1676  _BITS ILIEN : 1; ///< IDLE Line interrupt enable
1677  _BITS RIEN : 1; ///< Receiver interrupt enable
1678  _BITS TCIEN : 1; ///< Transmission complete interrupt enable
1679  _BITS TIEN : 1; ///< Transmitter interrupt enable
1680  } CR2;
1681 
1682 
1683  /** @brief UART1 Control register 3 (UART1_CR3) */
1684  struct {
1685  _BITS LBCL : 1; ///< Last bit clock pulse
1686  _BITS CPHA : 1; ///< Clock phase
1687  _BITS CPOL : 1; ///< Clock polarity
1688  _BITS CKEN : 1; ///< Clock enable
1689  _BITS STOP : 2; ///< STOP bits
1690  _BITS LINEN : 1; ///< LIN mode enable
1691  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
1692  } CR3;
1693 
1694 
1695  /** @brief UART1 Control register 4 (UART1_CR4) */
1696  struct {
1697  _BITS ADD : 4; ///< Address of the UART node
1698  _BITS LBDF : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Flag
1699  _BITS LBDL : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Length
1700  _BITS LBDIEN : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Interrupt Enable
1701  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
1702  } CR4;
1703 
1704 
1705  /** @brief UART1 Control register 5 (UART1_CR5) */
1706  struct {
1707  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
1708  _BITS IREN : 1; ///< IrDA mode Enable
1709  _BITS IRLP : 1; ///< IrDA Low Power
1710  _BITS HDSEL : 1; ///< Half-Duplex Selection
1711  _BITS NACK : 1; ///< Smartcard NACK enable
1712  _BITS SCEN : 1; ///< Smartcard mode enable
1713  _BITS res2 : 2; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
1714  } CR5;
1715 
1716 
1717  /** @brief UART1 guard time register (UART1_GTR) */
1718  struct {
1719  _BITS GT : 8; ///< UART1 guard time
1720  } GTR;
1721 
1722 
1723  /** @brief UART1 prescaler register (UART1_PSCR) */
1724  struct {
1725  _BITS PSC : 8; ///< UART1 prescaler
1726  } PSCR;
1727 
1728  } UART1_t;
1729 
1730  /* Pointer to UART1 registers */
1731  #define _UART1 _SFR(UART1_t, UART1_AddressBase) ///< UART1 struct/bit access
1732  #define _UART1_SR _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x00) ///< UART1 Status register
1733  #define _UART1_DR _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x01) ///< UART1 data register
1734  #define _UART1_BRR1 _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x02) ///< UART1 Baud rate register 1
1735  #define _UART1_BRR2 _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x03) ///< UART1 Baud rate register 2
1736  #define _UART1_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x04) ///< UART1 Control register 1
1737  #define _UART1_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x05) ///< UART1 Control register 2
1738  #define _UART1_CR3 _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x06) ///< UART1 Control register 3
1739  #define _UART1_CR4 _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x07) ///< UART1 Control register 4
1740  #define _UART1_CR5 _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x08) ///< UART1 Control register 5
1741  #define _UART1_GTR _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x09) ///< UART1 guard time register
1742  #define _UART1_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, UART1_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< UART1 prescaler register
1743 
1744  /* UART1 Module Reset Values */
1745  #define _UART1_SR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xC0) ///< UART1 Status register reset value
1746  #define _UART1_BRR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART1 Baud rate register 1 reset value
1747  #define _UART1_BRR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART1 Baud rate register 2 reset value
1748  #define _UART1_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART1 Control register 1 reset value
1749  #define _UART1_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART1 Control register 2 reset value
1750  #define _UART1_CR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART1 Control register 3 reset value
1751  #define _UART1_CR4_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART1 Control register 4 reset value
1752  #define _UART1_CR5_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART1 Control register 5 reset value
1753  #define _UART1_GTR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART1 guard time register reset value
1754  #define _UART1_PSCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART1 prescaler register reset value
1755 
1756  /* UART1 Status register (UART1_SR) bits */
1757  #define _UART1_PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART1 Parity error [0] (in _UART1_SR)
1758  #define _UART1_FE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART1 Framing error [0] (in _UART1_SR)
1759  #define _UART1_NF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART1 Noise flag [0] (in _UART1_SR)
1760  #define _UART1_OR_LHE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART1 LIN Header Error (LIN slave mode) / Overrun error [0] (in _UART1_SR)
1761  #define _UART1_IDLE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART1 IDLE line detected [0] (in _UART1_SR)
1762  #define _UART1_RXNE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART1 Read data register not empty [0] (in _UART1_SR)
1763  #define _UART1_TC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART1 Transmission complete [0] (in _UART1_SR)
1764  #define _UART1_TXE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART1 Transmit data register empty [0] (in _UART1_SR)
1765 
1766  /* UART1 Control register 1 (UART1_CR1) bits */
1767  #define _UART1_PIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART1 Parity interrupt enable [0] (in _UART1_CR1)
1768  #define _UART1_PS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART1 Parity selection [0] (in _UART1_CR1)
1769  #define _UART1_PCEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART1 Parity control enable [0] (in _UART1_CR1)
1770  #define _UART1_WAKE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART1 Wakeup method [0] (in _UART1_CR1)
1771  #define _UART1_M ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART1 word length [0] (in _UART1_CR1)
1772  #define _UART1_UARTD ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART1 Disable (for low power consumption) [0] (in _UART1_CR1)
1773  #define _UART1_T8 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART1 Transmit Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode) [0] (in _UART1_CR1)
1774  #define _UART1_R8 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART1 Receive Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode) [0] (in _UART1_CR1)
1775 
1776  /* UART1 Control register 2 (UART1_CR2) bits */
1777  #define _UART1_SBK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART1 Send break [0] (in _UART1_CR2)
1778  #define _UART1_RWU ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART1 Receiver wakeup [0] (in _UART1_CR2)
1779  #define _UART1_REN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART1 Receiver enable [0] (in _UART1_CR2)
1780  #define _UART1_TEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART1 Transmitter enable [0] (in _UART1_CR2)
1781  #define _UART1_ILIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART1 IDLE Line interrupt enable [0] (in _UART1_CR2)
1782  #define _UART1_RIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART1 Receiver interrupt enable [0] (in _UART1_CR2)
1783  #define _UART1_TCIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART1 Transmission complete interrupt enable [0] (in _UART1_CR2)
1784  #define _UART1_TIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART1 Transmitter interrupt enable [0] (in _UART1_CR2)
1785 
1786  /* UART1 Control register 3 (UART1_CR3) bits */
1787  #define _UART1_LBCL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART1 Last bit clock pulse [0] (in _UART1_CR3)
1788  #define _UART1_CPHA ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART1 Clock phase [0] (in _UART1_CR3)
1789  #define _UART1_CPOL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART1 Clock polarity [0] (in _UART1_CR3)
1790  #define _UART1_CKEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART1 Clock enable [0] (in _UART1_CR3)
1791  #define _UART1_STOP ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< UART1 STOP bits [1:0] (in _UART1_CR3)
1792  #define _UART1_STOP0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART1 STOP bits [0] (in _UART1_CR3)
1793  #define _UART1_STOP1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART1 STOP bits [1] (in _UART1_CR3)
1794  #define _UART1_LINEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART1 LIN mode enable [0] (in _UART1_CR3)
1795  // reserved [7]
1796 
1797  /* UART1 Control register 4 (UART1_CR4) bits */
1798  #define _UART1_ADD ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< UART1 Address of the UART node [3:0] (in _UART1_CR4)
1799  #define _UART1_ADD0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART1 Address of the UART node [0] (in _UART1_CR4)
1800  #define _UART1_ADD1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART1 Address of the UART node [1] (in _UART1_CR4)
1801  #define _UART1_ADD2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART1 Address of the UART node [2] (in _UART1_CR4)
1802  #define _UART1_ADD3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART1 Address of the UART node [3] (in _UART1_CR4)
1803  #define _UART1_LBDF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART1 LIN Break Detection Flag [0] (in _UART1_CR4)
1804  #define _UART1_LBDL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART1 LIN Break Detection Length [0] (in _UART1_CR4)
1805  #define _UART1_LBDIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART1 LIN Break Detection Interrupt Enable [0] (in _UART1_CR4)
1806  // reserved [7]
1807 
1808  /* UART1 Control register 5 (UART1_CR5) bits */
1809  // reserved [0]
1810  #define _UART1_IREN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART1 IrDA mode Enable [0] (in _UART1_CR5)
1811  #define _UART1_IRLP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART1 IrDA Low Power [0] (in _UART1_CR5)
1812  #define _UART1_HDSEL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART1 Half-Duplex Selection [0] (in _UART1_CR5)
1813  #define _UART1_NACK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART1 Smartcard NACK enable [0] (in _UART1_CR5)
1814  #define _UART1_SCEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART1 Smartcard mode enable [0] (in _UART1_CR5)
1815  // reserved [7:6]
1816 
1817 #endif // UART1_AddressBase
1818 
1819 
1820 
1821 //------------------------
1822 // Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter 2 (UART2)
1823 //------------------------
1824 #if defined(UART2_AddressBase)
1825 
1826  /** @brief struct for controlling Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter 2 (UART2) */
1827  typedef struct {
1828 
1829  /** @brief UART2 Status register (UART2_SR) */
1830  struct {
1831  _BITS PE : 1; ///< Parity error
1832  _BITS FE : 1; ///< Framing error
1833  _BITS NF : 1; ///< Noise flag
1834  _BITS OR : 1; ///< LIN Header Error (LIN slave mode) / Overrun error
1835  _BITS IDLE : 1; ///< IDLE line detected
1836  _BITS RXNE : 1; ///< Read data register not empty
1837  _BITS TC : 1; ///< Transmission complete
1838  _BITS TXE : 1; ///< Transmit data register empty
1839  } SR;
1840 
1841 
1842  /** @brief UART2 data register (UART2_DR) */
1843  struct {
1844  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< UART2 data
1845  } DR;
1846 
1847 
1848  /** @brief UART2 Baud rate register 1 (UART2_BRR1) */
1849  struct {
1850  _BITS DIV_4_11 : 8; ///< UART2_BRR bits [11:4]
1851  } BRR1;
1852 
1853 
1854  /** @brief UART2 Baud rate register 2 (UART2_BRR2) */
1855  struct {
1856  _BITS DIV_0_3 : 4; ///< UART2_BRR bits [3:0]
1857  _BITS DIV_12_15 : 4; ///< UART2_BRR bits [15:12]
1858  } BRR2;
1859 
1860 
1861  /** @brief UART2 Control register 1 (UART2_CR1) */
1862  struct {
1863  _BITS PIEN : 1; ///< Parity interrupt enable
1864  _BITS PS : 1; ///< Parity selection
1865  _BITS PCEN : 1; ///< Parity control enable
1866  _BITS WAKE : 1; ///< Wakeup method
1867  _BITS M : 1; ///< word length
1868  _BITS UARTD : 1; ///< UART Disable (for low power consumption)
1869  _BITS T8 : 1; ///< Transmit Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode)
1870  _BITS R8 : 1; ///< Receive Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode)
1871  } CR1;
1872 
1873 
1874  /** @brief UART2 Control register 2 (UART2_CR2) */
1875  struct {
1876  _BITS SBK : 1; ///< Send break
1877  _BITS RWU : 1; ///< Receiver wakeup
1878  _BITS REN : 1; ///< Receiver enable
1879  _BITS TEN : 1; ///< Transmitter enable
1880  _BITS ILIEN : 1; ///< IDLE Line interrupt enable
1881  _BITS RIEN : 1; ///< Receiver interrupt enable
1882  _BITS TCIEN : 1; ///< Transmission complete interrupt enable
1883  _BITS TIEN : 1; ///< Transmitter interrupt enable
1884  } CR2;
1885 
1886 
1887  /** @brief UART2 Control register 3 (UART2_CR3) */
1888  struct {
1889  _BITS LBCL : 1; ///< Last bit clock pulse
1890  _BITS CPHA : 1; ///< Clock phase
1891  _BITS CPOL : 1; ///< Clock polarity
1892  _BITS CKEN : 1; ///< Clock enable
1893  _BITS STOP : 2; ///< STOP bits
1894  _BITS LINEN : 1; ///< LIN mode enable
1895  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
1896  } CR3;
1897 
1898 
1899  /** @brief UART2 Control register 4 (UART2_CR4) */
1900  struct {
1901  _BITS ADD : 4; ///< Address of the UART node
1902  _BITS LBDF : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Flag
1903  _BITS LBDL : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Length
1904  _BITS LBDIEN : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Interrupt Enable
1905  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
1906  } CR4;
1907 
1908 
1909  /** @brief UART2 Control register 5 (UART2_CR5) */
1910  struct {
1911  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
1912  _BITS IREN : 1; ///< IrDA mode Enable
1913  _BITS IRLP : 1; ///< IrDA Low Power
1914  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
1915  _BITS NACK : 1; ///< Smartcard NACK enable
1916  _BITS SCEN : 1; ///< Smartcard mode enable
1917  _BITS res3 : 2; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
1918  } CR5;
1919 
1920 
1921  /** @brief UART2 Control register 6 (UART2_CR6) */
1922  struct {
1923  _BITS LSF : 1; ///< LIN Sync Field
1924  _BITS LHDF : 1; ///< LIN Header Detection Flag
1925  _BITS LHDIEN : 1; ///< LIN Header Detection Interrupt Enable
1926  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
1927  _BITS LASE : 1; ///< LIN automatic resynchronisation enable
1928  _BITS LSLV : 1; ///< LIN Slave Enable
1929  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
1930  _BITS LDUM : 1; ///< LIN Divider Update Method
1931  } CR6;
1932 
1933 
1934  /** @brief UART2 guard time register (UART2_GTR) */
1935  struct {
1936  _BITS GT : 8; ///< UART2 guard time
1937  } GTR;
1938 
1939 
1940  /** @brief UART2 prescaler register (UART2_PSCR) */
1941  struct {
1942  _BITS PSC : 8; ///< UART1 prescaler
1943  } PSCR;
1944 
1945  } UART2_t;
1946 
1947  /* Pointer to UART2 registers */
1948  #define _UART2 _SFR(UART2_t, UART2_AddressBase) ///< UART2 struct/bit access
1949  #define _UART2_SR _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x00) ///< UART2 Status register
1950  #define _UART2_DR _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x01) ///< UART2 data register
1951  #define _UART2_BRR1 _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x02) ///< UART2 Baud rate register 1
1952  #define _UART2_BRR2 _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x03) ///< UART2 Baud rate register 2
1953  #define _UART2_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x04) ///< UART2 Control register 1
1954  #define _UART2_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x05) ///< UART2 Control register 2
1955  #define _UART2_CR3 _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x06) ///< UART2 Control register 3
1956  #define _UART2_CR4 _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x07) ///< UART2 Control register 4
1957  #define _UART2_CR5 _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x08) ///< UART2 Control register 5
1958  #define _UART2_CR6 _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x09) ///< UART2 Control register 6
1959  #define _UART2_GTR _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< UART2 guard time register
1960  #define _UART2_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, UART2_AddressBase+0x0B) ///< UART2 prescaler register
1961 
1962  /* UART2 Module Reset Values */
1963  #define _UART2_SR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xC0) ///< UART2 Status register reset value
1964  #define _UART2_BRR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 Baud rate register 1 reset value
1965  #define _UART2_BRR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 Baud rate register 2 reset value
1966  #define _UART2_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 Control register 1 reset value
1967  #define _UART2_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 Control register 2 reset value
1968  #define _UART2_CR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 Control register 3 reset value
1969  #define _UART2_CR4_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 Control register 4 reset value
1970  #define _UART2_CR5_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 Control register 5 reset value
1971  #define _UART2_CR6_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 Control register 6 reset value
1972  #define _UART2_GTR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 guard time register reset value
1973  #define _UART2_PSCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART2 prescaler register reset value
1974 
1975  /* UART2 Status register (UART2_SR) bits */
1976  #define _UART2_PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART2 Parity error [0] (in _UART2_SR)
1977  #define _UART2_FE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART2 Framing error [0] (in _UART2_SR)
1978  #define _UART2_NF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART2 Noise flag [0] (in _UART2_SR)
1979  #define _UART2_OR_LHE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART2 LIN Header Error (LIN slave mode) / Overrun error [0] (in _UART2_SR)
1980  #define _UART2_IDLE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART2 IDLE line detected [0] (in _UART2_SR)
1981  #define _UART2_RXNE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART2 Read data register not empty [0] (in _UART2_SR)
1982  #define _UART2_TC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART2 Transmission complete [0] (in _UART2_SR)
1983  #define _UART2_TXE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART2 Transmit data register empty [0] (in _UART2_SR)
1984 
1985  /* UART2 Control register 1 (UART2_CR1) bits */
1986  #define _UART2_PIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART2 Parity interrupt enable [0] (in _UART2_CR1)
1987  #define _UART2_PS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART2 Parity selection [0] (in _UART2_CR1)
1988  #define _UART2_PCEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART2 Parity control enable [0] (in _UART2_CR1)
1989  #define _UART2_WAKE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART2 Wakeup method [0] (in _UART2_CR1)
1990  #define _UART2_M ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART2 word length [0] (in _UART2_CR1)
1991  #define _UART2_UARTD ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART2 Disable (for low power consumption) [0] (in _UART2_CR1)
1992  #define _UART2_T8 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART2 Transmit Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode) [0] (in _UART2_CR1)
1993  #define _UART2_R8 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART2 Receive Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode) [0] (in _UART2_CR1)
1994 
1995  /* UART2 Control register 2 (UART2_CR2) bits */
1996  #define _UART2_SBK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART2 Send break [0] (in _UART2_CR2)
1997  #define _UART2_RWU ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART2 Receiver wakeup [0] (in _UART2_CR2)
1998  #define _UART2_REN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART2 Receiver enable [0] (in _UART2_CR2)
1999  #define _UART2_TEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART2 Transmitter enable [0] (in _UART2_CR2)
2000  #define _UART2_ILIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART2 IDLE Line interrupt enable [0] (in _UART2_CR2)
2001  #define _UART2_RIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART2 Receiver interrupt enable [0] (in _UART2_CR2)
2002  #define _UART2_TCIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART2 Transmission complete interrupt enable [0] (in _UART2_CR2)
2003  #define _UART2_TIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART2 Transmitter interrupt enable [0] (in _UART2_CR2)
2004 
2005  /* UART2 Control register 3 (UART2_CR3) bits */
2006  #define _UART2_LBCL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART2 Last bit clock pulse [0] (in _UART2_CR3)
2007  #define _UART2_CPHA ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART2 Clock phase [0] (in _UART2_CR3)
2008  #define _UART2_CPOL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART2 Clock polarity [0] (in _UART2_CR3)
2009  #define _UART2_CKEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART2 Clock enable [0] (in _UART2_CR3)
2010  #define _UART2_STOP ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< UART2 STOP bits [1:0] (in _UART2_CR3)
2011  #define _UART2_STOP0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART2 STOP bits [0] (in _UART2_CR3)
2012  #define _UART2_STOP1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART2 STOP bits [1] (in _UART2_CR3)
2013  #define _UART2_LINEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART2 LIN mode enable [0] (in _UART2_CR3)
2014  // reserved [7]
2015 
2016  /* UART2 Control register 4 (UART2_CR4) bits */
2017  #define _UART2_ADD ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< UART2 Address of the UART node [3:0] (in _UART2_CR4)
2018  #define _UART2_ADD0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART2 Address of the UART node [0] (in _UART2_CR4)
2019  #define _UART2_ADD1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART2 Address of the UART node [1] (in _UART2_CR4)
2020  #define _UART2_ADD2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART2 Address of the UART node [2] (in _UART2_CR4)
2021  #define _UART2_ADD3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART2 Address of the UART node [3] (in _UART2_CR4)
2022  #define _UART2_LBDF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART2 LIN Break Detection Flag [0] (in _UART2_CR4)
2023  #define _UART2_LBDL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART2 LIN Break Detection Length [0] (in _UART2_CR4)
2024  #define _UART2_LBDIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART2 LIN Break Detection Interrupt Enable [0] (in _UART2_CR4)
2025  // reserved [7]
2026 
2027  /* UART2 Control register 5 (UART2_CR5) bits */
2028  // reserved [0]
2029  #define _UART2_IREN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART2 IrDA mode Enable [0] (in _UART2_CR5)
2030  #define _UART2_IRLP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART2 IrDA Low Power [0] (in _UART2_CR5)
2031  // reserved [3]
2032  #define _UART2_NACK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART2 Smartcard NACK enable [0] (in _UART2_CR5)
2033  #define _UART2_SCEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART2 Smartcard mode enable [0] (in _UART2_CR5)
2034  // reserved [7:6]
2035 
2036  /* UART2 Control register 6 (UART2_CR6) bits */
2037  #define _UART2_LSF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART2 LIN Sync Field [0] (in _UART2_CR6)
2038  #define _UART2_LHDF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART2 LIN Header Detection Flag [0] (in _UART2_CR6)
2039  #define _UART2_LHDIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART2 LIN Header Detection Interrupt Enable [0] (in _UART2_CR6)
2040  // reserved [3]
2041  #define _UART2_LASE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART2 LIN automatic resynchronisation enable [0] (in _UART2_CR6)
2042  #define _UART2_LSLV ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART2 LIN Slave Enable [0] (in _UART2_CR6)
2043  // reserved [6]
2044  #define _UART2_LDUM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART2 LIN Divider Update Method [0] (in _UART2_CR6)
2045 
2046 #endif // UART2_AddressBase
2047 
2048 
2049 
2050 //------------------------
2051 // Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter 3 (UART3)
2052 //------------------------
2053 #if defined(UART3_AddressBase)
2054 
2055  /** @brief struct for controlling Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter 3 (UART3) */
2056  typedef struct {
2057 
2058  /** @brief UART3 Status register (UART3_SR) */
2059  struct {
2060  _BITS PE : 1; ///< Parity error
2061  _BITS FE : 1; ///< Framing error
2062  _BITS NF : 1; ///< Noise flag
2063  _BITS OR : 1; ///< LIN Header Error (LIN slave mode) / Overrun error
2064  _BITS IDLE : 1; ///< IDLE line detected
2065  _BITS RXNE : 1; ///< Read data register not empty
2066  _BITS TC : 1; ///< Transmission complete
2067  _BITS TXE : 1; ///< Transmit data register empty
2068  } SR;
2069 
2070 
2071  /** @brief UART3 data register (UART3_DR) */
2072  struct {
2073  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< UART3 data
2074  } DR;
2075 
2076 
2077  /** @brief UART3 Baud rate register 1 (UART3_BRR1) */
2078  struct {
2079  _BITS DIV_4_11 : 8; ///< UART_DIV bits [11:4]
2080  } BRR1;
2081 
2082 
2083  /** @brief UART3 Baud rate register 2 (UART3_BRR2) */
2084  struct {
2085  _BITS DIV_0_3 : 4; ///< UART_DIV bits [3:0]
2086  _BITS DIV_12_15 : 4; ///< UART_DIV bits [15:12]
2087  } BRR2;
2088 
2089 
2090  /** @brief UART3 Control register 1 (UART3_CR1) */
2091  struct {
2092  _BITS PIEN : 1; ///< Parity interrupt enable
2093  _BITS PS : 1; ///< Parity selection
2094  _BITS PCEN : 1; ///< Parity control enable
2095  _BITS WAKE : 1; ///< Wakeup method
2096  _BITS M : 1; ///< word length
2097  _BITS UARTD : 1; ///< UART Disable (for low power consumption)
2098  _BITS T8 : 1; ///< Transmit Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode)
2099  _BITS R8 : 1; ///< Receive Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode)
2100  } CR1;
2101 
2102 
2103  /** @brief UART3 Control register 2 (UART3_CR2) */
2104  struct {
2105  _BITS SBK : 1; ///< Send break
2106  _BITS RWU : 1; ///< Receiver wakeup
2107  _BITS REN : 1; ///< Receiver enable
2108  _BITS TEN : 1; ///< Transmitter enable
2109  _BITS ILIEN : 1; ///< IDLE Line interrupt enable
2110  _BITS RIEN : 1; ///< Receiver interrupt enable
2111  _BITS TCIEN : 1; ///< Transmission complete interrupt enable
2112  _BITS TIEN : 1; ///< Transmitter interrupt enable
2113  } CR2;
2114 
2115 
2116  /** @brief UART3 Control register 3 (UART3_CR3) */
2117  struct {
2118  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2119  _BITS STOP : 2; ///< STOP bits
2120  _BITS LINEN : 1; ///< LIN mode enable
2121  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2122  } CR3;
2123 
2124 
2125  /** @brief UART3 Control register 4 (UART3_CR4) */
2126  struct {
2127  _BITS ADD : 4; ///< Address of the UART node
2128  _BITS LBDF : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Flag
2129  _BITS LBDL : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Length
2130  _BITS LBDIEN : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Interrupt Enable
2131  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2132  } CR4;
2133 
2134 
2135  /** @brief Reserved register (1B) */
2136  uint8_t res[1];
2137 
2138 
2139  /** @brief UART3 Control register 6 (UART3_CR6) */
2140  struct {
2141  _BITS LSF : 1; ///< LIN Sync Field
2142  _BITS LHDF : 1; ///< LIN Header Detection Flag
2143  _BITS LHDIEN : 1; ///< LIN Header Detection Interrupt Enable
2144  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
2145  _BITS LASE : 1; ///< LIN automatic resynchronisation enable
2146  _BITS LSLV : 1; ///< LIN Slave Enable
2147  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
2148  _BITS LDUM : 1; ///< LIN Divider Update Method
2149  } CR6;
2150 
2151  } UART3_t;
2152 
2153  /* Pointer to UART3 registers */
2154  #define _UART3 _SFR(UART3_t, UART3_AddressBase) ///< UART3 struct/bit access
2155  #define _UART3_SR _SFR(uint8_t, UART3_AddressBase+0x00) ///< UART3 Status register
2156  #define _UART3_DR _SFR(uint8_t, UART3_AddressBase+0x01) ///< UART3 data register
2157  #define _UART3_BRR1 _SFR(uint8_t, UART3_AddressBase+0x02) ///< UART3 Baud rate register 1
2158  #define _UART3_BRR2 _SFR(uint8_t, UART3_AddressBase+0x03) ///< UART3 Baud rate register 2
2159  #define _UART3_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, UART3_AddressBase+0x04) ///< UART3 Control register 1
2160  #define _UART3_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, UART3_AddressBase+0x05) ///< UART3 Control register 2
2161  #define _UART3_CR3 _SFR(uint8_t, UART3_AddressBase+0x06) ///< UART3 Control register 3
2162  #define _UART3_CR4 _SFR(uint8_t, UART3_AddressBase+0x07) ///< UART3 Control register 4
2163  // 1B
2164  #define _UART3_CR6 _SFR(uint8_t, UART3_AddressBase+0x09) ///< UART3 Control register 6
2165 
2166  /* UART3 Module Reset Values */
2167  #define _UART3_SR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xC0) ///< UART3 Status register reset value
2168  #define _UART3_BRR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART3 Baud rate register 1 reset value
2169  #define _UART3_BRR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART3 Baud rate register 2 reset value
2170  #define _UART3_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART3 Control register 1 reset value
2171  #define _UART3_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART3 Control register 2 reset value
2172  #define _UART3_CR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART3 Control register 3 reset value
2173  #define _UART3_CR4_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART3 Control register 4 reset value
2174  #define _UART3_CR6_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART3 Control register 6 reset value
2175 
2176  /* UART3 Status register (UART3_SR) bits */
2177  #define _UART3_PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART3 Parity error [0] (in _UART3_SR)
2178  #define _UART3_FE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART3 Framing error [0] (in _UART3_SR)
2179  #define _UART3_NF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART3 Noise flag [0] (in _UART3_SR)
2180  #define _UART3_OR_LHE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART3 LIN Header Error (LIN slave mode) / Overrun error [0] (in _UART3_SR)
2181  #define _UART3_IDLE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART3 IDLE line detected [0] (in _UART3_SR)
2182  #define _UART3_RXNE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART3 Read data register not empty [0] (in _UART3_SR)
2183  #define _UART3_TC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART3 Transmission complete [0] (in _UART3_SR)
2184  #define _UART3_TXE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART3 Transmit data register empty [0] (in _UART3_SR)
2185 
2186  /* UART3 Control register 1 (UART3_CR1) bits */
2187  #define _UART3_PIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART3 Parity interrupt enable [0] (in _UART3_CR1)
2188  #define _UART3_PS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART3 Parity selection [0] (in _UART3_CR1)
2189  #define _UART3_PCEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART3 Parity control enable [0] (in _UART3_CR1)
2190  #define _UART3_WAKE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART3 Wakeup method [0] (in _UART3_CR1)
2191  #define _UART3_M ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART3 word length [0] (in _UART3_CR1)
2192  #define _UART3_UARTD ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART3 Disable (for low power consumption) [0] (in _UART3_CR1)
2193  #define _UART3_T8 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART3 Transmit Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode) [0] (in _UART3_CR1)
2194  #define _UART3_R8 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART3 Receive Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode) [0] (in _UART3_CR1)
2195 
2196  /* UART3 Control register 2 (UART3_CR2) bits */
2197  #define _UART3_SBK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART3 Send break [0] (in _UART3_CR2)
2198  #define _UART3_RWU ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART3 Receiver wakeup [0] (in _UART3_CR2)
2199  #define _UART3_REN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART3 Receiver enable [0] (in _UART3_CR2)
2200  #define _UART3_TEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART3 Transmitter enable [0] (in _UART3_CR2)
2201  #define _UART3_ILIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART3 IDLE Line interrupt enable [0] (in _UART3_CR2)
2202  #define _UART3_RIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART3 Receiver interrupt enable [0] (in _UART3_CR2)
2203  #define _UART3_TCIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART3 Transmission complete interrupt enable [0] (in _UART3_CR2)
2204  #define _UART3_TIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART3 Transmitter interrupt enable [0] (in _UART3_CR2)
2205 
2206  /* UART3 Control register 3 (UART3_CR3) bits */
2207  // reserved [3:0]
2208  #define _UART3_STOP ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< UART3 STOP bits [1:0] (in _UART3_CR3)
2209  #define _UART3_STOP0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART3 STOP bits [0] (in _UART3_CR3)
2210  #define _UART3_STOP1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART3 STOP bits [1] (in _UART3_CR3)
2211  #define _UART3_LINEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART3 LIN mode enable [0] (in _UART3_CR3)
2212  // reserved [7]
2213 
2214  /* UART3 Control register 4 (UART3_CR4) bits */
2215  #define _UART3_ADD ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< UART3 Address of the UART node [3:0] (in _UART3_CR4)
2216  #define _UART3_ADD0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART3 Address of the UART node [0] (in _UART3_CR4)
2217  #define _UART3_ADD1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART3 Address of the UART node [1] (in _UART3_CR4)
2218  #define _UART3_ADD2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART3 Address of the UART node [2] (in _UART3_CR4)
2219  #define _UART3_ADD3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART3 Address of the UART node [3] (in _UART3_CR4)
2220  #define _UART3_LBDF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART3 LIN Break Detection Flag [0] (in _UART3_CR4)
2221  #define _UART3_LBDL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART3 LIN Break Detection Length [0] (in _UART3_CR4)
2222  #define _UART3_LBDIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART3 LIN Break Detection Interrupt Enable [0] (in _UART3_CR4)
2223  // reserved [7]
2224 
2225  /* UART3 Control register 6 (UART3_CR6) bits */
2226  #define _UART3_LSF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART3 LIN Sync Field [0] (in _UART3_CR6)
2227  #define _UART3_LHDF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART3 LIN Header Detection Flag [0] (in _UART3_CR6)
2228  #define _UART3_LHDIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART3 LIN Header Detection Interrupt Enable [0] (in _UART3_CR6)
2229  // reserved [3]
2230  #define _UART3_LASE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART3 LIN automatic resynchronisation enable [0] (in _UART3_CR6)
2231  #define _UART3_LSLV ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART3 LIN Slave Enable [0] (in _UART3_CR6)
2232  // reserved [6]
2233  #define _UART3_LDUM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART3 LIN Divider Update Method [0] (in _UART3_CR6)
2234 
2235 #endif // UART3_AddressBase
2236 
2237 
2238 
2239 //------------------------
2240 // Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter 4 (UART4)
2241 //------------------------
2242 #if defined(UART4_AddressBase)
2243 
2244  /** @brief struct for controlling Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter 4 (UART4) */
2245  typedef struct {
2246 
2247  /** @brief UART4 Status register (UART4_SR) */
2248  struct {
2249  _BITS PE : 1; ///< Parity error
2250  _BITS FE : 1; ///< Framing error
2251  _BITS NF : 1; ///< Noise flag
2252  _BITS OR : 1; ///< LIN Header Error (LIN slave mode) / Overrun error
2253  _BITS IDLE : 1; ///< IDLE line detected
2254  _BITS RXNE : 1; ///< Read data register not empty
2255  _BITS TC : 1; ///< Transmission complete
2256  _BITS TXE : 1; ///< Transmit data register empty
2257  } SR;
2258 
2259 
2260  /** @brief UART4 data register (UART4_DR) */
2261  struct {
2262  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< UART4 data
2263  } DR;
2264 
2265 
2266  /** @brief UART4 Baud rate register 1 (UART4_BRR1) */
2267  struct {
2268  _BITS DIV_4_11 : 8; ///< UART_DIV bits [11:4]
2269  } BRR1;
2270 
2271 
2272  /** @brief UART4 Baud rate register 2 (UART4_BRR2) */
2273  struct {
2274  _BITS DIV_0_3 : 4; ///< UART_DIV bits [3:0]
2275  _BITS DIV_12_15 : 4; ///< UART_DIV bits [15:12]
2276  } BRR2;
2277 
2278 
2279  /** @brief UART4 Control register 1 (UART4_CR1) */
2280  struct {
2281  _BITS PIEN : 1; ///< Parity interrupt enable
2282  _BITS PS : 1; ///< Parity selection
2283  _BITS PCEN : 1; ///< Parity control enable
2284  _BITS WAKE : 1; ///< Wakeup method
2285  _BITS M : 1; ///< word length
2286  _BITS UARTD : 1; ///< UART Disable (for low power consumption)
2287  _BITS T8 : 1; ///< Transmit Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode)
2288  _BITS R8 : 1; ///< Receive Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode)
2289  } CR1;
2290 
2291 
2292  /** @brief UART4 Control register 2 (UART4_CR2) */
2293  struct {
2294  _BITS SBK : 1; ///< Send break
2295  _BITS RWU : 1; ///< Receiver wakeup
2296  _BITS REN : 1; ///< Receiver enable
2297  _BITS TEN : 1; ///< Transmitter enable
2298  _BITS ILIEN : 1; ///< IDLE Line interrupt enable
2299  _BITS RIEN : 1; ///< Receiver interrupt enable
2300  _BITS TCIEN : 1; ///< Transmission complete interrupt enable
2301  _BITS TIEN : 1; ///< Transmitter interrupt enable
2302  } CR2;
2303 
2304 
2305  /** @brief UART4 Control register 3 (UART4_CR3) */
2306  struct {
2307  _BITS LBCL : 1; ///< Last bit clock pulse
2308  _BITS CPHA : 1; ///< Clock phase
2309  _BITS CPOL : 1; ///< Clock polarity
2310  _BITS CKEN : 1; ///< Clock enable
2311  _BITS STOP : 2; ///< STOP bits
2312  _BITS LINEN : 1; ///< LIN mode enable
2313  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2314  } CR3;
2315 
2316 
2317  /** @brief UART4 Control register 4 (UART4_CR4) */
2318  struct {
2319  _BITS ADD : 4; ///< Address of the UART node
2320  _BITS LBDF : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Flag
2321  _BITS LBDL : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Length
2322  _BITS LBDIEN : 1; ///< LIN Break Detection Interrupt Enable
2323  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2324  } CR4;
2325 
2326 
2327  /** @brief UART4 Control register 5 (UART4_CR5) */
2328  struct {
2329  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2330  _BITS IREN : 1; ///< IrDA mode Enable
2331  _BITS IRLP : 1; ///< IrDA Low Power
2332  _BITS HDSEL : 1; ///< Half-Duplex Selection
2333  _BITS NACK : 1; ///< Smartcard NACK enable
2334  _BITS SCEN : 1; ///< Smartcard mode enable
2335  _BITS res2 : 2; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2336  } CR5;
2337 
2338 
2339  /** @brief UART4 Control register 6 (UART4_CR6) */
2340  struct {
2341  _BITS LSF : 1; ///< LIN Sync Field
2342  _BITS LHDF : 1; ///< LIN Header Detection Flag
2343  _BITS LHDIEN : 1; ///< LIN Header Detection Interrupt Enable
2344  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
2345  _BITS LASE : 1; ///< LIN automatic resynchronisation enable
2346  _BITS LSLV : 1; ///< LIN Slave Enable
2347  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
2348  _BITS LDUM : 1; ///< LIN Divider Update Method
2349  } CR6;
2350 
2351 
2352  /** @brief UART4 guard time register (UART4_GTR) */
2353  struct {
2354  _BITS GT : 8; ///< UART4 guard time
2355  } GTR;
2356 
2357 
2358  /** @brief UART4 prescaler register (UART4_PSCR) */
2359  struct {
2360  _BITS PSC : 8; ///< UART4 prescaler
2361  } PSCR;
2362 
2363  } UART4_t;
2364 
2365  /* Pointer to UART4 registers */
2366  #define _UART4 _SFR(UART4_t, UART4_AddressBase) ///< UART4 struct/bit access
2367  #define _UART4_SR _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x00) ///< UART4 Status register
2368  #define _UART4_DR _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x01) ///< UART4 data register
2369  #define _UART4_BRR1 _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x02) ///< UART4 Baud rate register 1
2370  #define _UART4_BRR2 _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x03) ///< UART4 Baud rate register 2
2371  #define _UART4_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x04) ///< UART4 Control register 1
2372  #define _UART4_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x05) ///< UART4 Control register 2
2373  #define _UART4_CR3 _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x06) ///< UART4 Control register 3
2374  #define _UART4_CR4 _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x07) ///< UART4 Control register 4
2375  #define _UART4_CR5 _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x08) ///< UART4 Control register 5
2376  #define _UART4_CR6 _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x09) ///< UART4 Control register 6
2377  #define _UART4_GTR _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< UART4 guard time register
2378  #define _UART4_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, UART4_AddressBase+0x0B) ///< UART4 prescaler register
2379 
2380  /* UART4 Module Reset Values */
2381  #define _UART4_SR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xC0) ///< UART4 Status register reset value
2382  #define _UART4_BRR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 Baud rate register 1 reset value
2383  #define _UART4_BRR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 Baud rate register 2 reset value
2384  #define _UART4_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 Control register 1 reset value
2385  #define _UART4_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 Control register 2 reset value
2386  #define _UART4_CR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 Control register 3 reset value
2387  #define _UART4_CR4_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 Control register 4 reset value
2388  #define _UART4_CR5_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 Control register 5 reset value
2389  #define _UART4_CR6_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 Control register 6 reset value
2390  #define _UART4_GTR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 guard time register reset value
2391  #define _UART4_PSCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< UART4 prescaler register reset value
2392 
2393  /* UART4 Status register (UART4_SR) bits */
2394  #define _UART4_PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART4 Parity error [0] (in _UART4_SR)
2395  #define _UART4_FE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART4 Framing error [0] (in _UART4_SR)
2396  #define _UART4_NF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART4 Noise flag [0] (in _UART4_SR)
2397  #define _UART4_OR_LHE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART4 LIN Header Error (LIN slave mode) / Overrun error [0] (in _UART4_SR)
2398  #define _UART4_IDLE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART4 IDLE line detected [0] (in _UART4_SR)
2399  #define _UART4_RXNE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART4 Read data register not empty [0] (in _UART4_SR)
2400  #define _UART4_TC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART4 Transmission complete [0] (in _UART4_SR)
2401  #define _UART4_TXE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART4 Transmit data register empty [0] (in _UART4_SR)
2402 
2403  /* UART4 Control register 1 (UART4_CR1) bits */
2404  #define _UART4_PIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART4 Parity interrupt enable [0] (in _UART4_CR1)
2405  #define _UART4_PS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART4 Parity selection [0] (in _UART4_CR1)
2406  #define _UART4_PCEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART4 Parity control enable [0] (in _UART4_CR1)
2407  #define _UART4_WAKE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART4 Wakeup method [0] (in _UART4_CR1)
2408  #define _UART4_M ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART4 word length [0] (in _UART4_CR1)
2409  #define _UART4_UARTD ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART4 Disable (for low power consumption) [0] (in _UART4_CR1)
2410  #define _UART4_T8 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART4 Transmit Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode) [0] (in _UART4_CR1)
2411  #define _UART4_R8 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART4 Receive Data bit 8 (in 9-bit mode) [0] (in _UART4_CR1)
2412 
2413  /* UART4 Control register 2 (UART4_CR2) bits */
2414  #define _UART4_SBK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART4 Send break [0] (in _UART4_CR2)
2415  #define _UART4_RWU ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART4 Receiver wakeup [0] (in _UART4_CR2)
2416  #define _UART4_REN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART4 Receiver enable [0] (in _UART4_CR2)
2417  #define _UART4_TEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART4 Transmitter enable [0] (in _UART4_CR2)
2418  #define _UART4_ILIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART4 IDLE Line interrupt enable [0] (in _UART4_CR2)
2419  #define _UART4_RIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART4 Receiver interrupt enable [0] (in _UART4_CR2)
2420  #define _UART4_TCIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART4 Transmission complete interrupt enable [0] (in _UART4_CR2)
2421  #define _UART4_TIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART4 Transmitter interrupt enable [0] (in _UART4_CR2)
2422 
2423  /* UART4 Control register 3 (UART4_CR3) bits */
2424  #define _UART4_LBCL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART4 Last bit clock pulse [0] (in _UART4_CR3)
2425  #define _UART4_CPHA ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART4 Clock phase [0] (in _UART4_CR3)
2426  #define _UART4_CPOL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART4 Clock polarity [0] (in _UART4_CR3)
2427  #define _UART4_CKEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART4 Clock enable [0] (in _UART4_CR3)
2428  #define _UART4_STOP ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< UART4 STOP bits [1:0] (in _UART4_CR3)
2429  #define _UART4_STOP0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART4 STOP bits [0] (in _UART4_CR3)
2430  #define _UART4_STOP1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART4 STOP bits [1] (in _UART4_CR3)
2431  #define _UART4_LINEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART4 LIN mode enable [0] (in _UART4_CR3)
2432  // reserved [7]
2433 
2434  /* UART4 Control register 4 (UART4_CR4) bits */
2435  #define _UART4_ADD ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< UART4 Address of the UART node [3:0] (in _UART4_CR4)
2436  #define _UART4_ADD0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART4 Address of the UART node [0] (in _UART4_CR4)
2437  #define _UART4_ADD1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART4 Address of the UART node [1] (in _UART4_CR4)
2438  #define _UART4_ADD2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART4 Address of the UART node [2] (in _UART4_CR4)
2439  #define _UART4_ADD3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART4 Address of the UART node [3] (in _UART4_CR4)
2440  #define _UART4_LBDF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART4 LIN Break Detection Flag [0] (in _UART4_CR4)
2441  #define _UART4_LBDL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART4 LIN Break Detection Length [0] (in _UART4_CR4)
2442  #define _UART4_LBDIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< UART4 LIN Break Detection Interrupt Enable [0] (in _UART4_CR4)
2443  // reserved [7]
2444 
2445  /* UART4 Control register 5 (UART4_CR5) bits */
2446  // reserved [0]
2447  #define _UART4_IREN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART4 IrDA mode Enable [0] (in _UART4_CR5)
2448  #define _UART4_IRLP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART4 IrDA Low Power [0] (in _UART4_CR5)
2449  #define _UART4_HDSEL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< UART4 Half-Duplex Selection [0] (in _UART4_CR5)
2450  #define _UART4_NACK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART4 Smartcard NACK enable [0] (in _UART4_CR5)
2451  #define _UART4_SCEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART4 Smartcard mode enable [0] (in _UART4_CR5)
2452  // reserved [7:6]
2453 
2454  /* UART4 Control register 6 (UART4_CR6) bits */
2455  #define _UART4_LSF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< UART4 LIN Sync Field [0] (in _UART4_CR6)
2456  #define _UART4_LHDF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< UART4 LIN Header Detection Flag [0] (in _UART4_CR6)
2457  #define _UART4_LHDIEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< UART4 LIN Header Detection Interrupt Enable [0] (in _UART4_CR6)
2458  // reserved [3]
2459  #define _UART4_LASE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< UART4 LIN automatic resynchronisation enable [0] (in _UART4_CR6)
2460  #define _UART4_LSLV ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< UART4 LIN Slave Enable [0] (in _UART4_CR6)
2461  // reserved [6]
2462  #define _UART4_LDUM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< UART4 LIN Divider Update Method [0] (in _UART4_CR6)
2463 
2464 #endif // UART4_AddressBase
2465 
2466 
2467 
2468 //------------------------
2469 // 16-Bit Timer 1 (TIM1)
2470 //------------------------
2471 #if defined(TIM1_AddressBase)
2472 
2473  /** @brief struct for controlling 16-Bit Timer 1 (TIM1) */
2474  typedef struct {
2475 
2476  /** @brief TIM1 Control register 1 (TIM1_CR1) */
2477  struct {
2478  _BITS CEN : 1; ///< Counter enable
2479  _BITS UDIS : 1; ///< Update disable
2480  _BITS URS : 1; ///< Update request source
2481  _BITS OPM : 1; ///< One-pulse mode
2482  _BITS DIR : 1; ///< Direction
2483  _BITS CMS : 2; ///< Center-aligned mode selection
2484  _BITS ARPE : 1; ///< Auto-reload preload enable
2485  } CR1;
2486 
2487 
2488  /** @brief TIM1 Control register 2 (TIM1_CR2) */
2489  struct {
2490  _BITS CCPC : 1; ///< Capture/compare preloaded control
2491  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, forced by hardware to 0
2492  _BITS COMS : 1; ///< Capture/compare control update selection
2493  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2494  _BITS MMS : 3; ///< Master mode selection
2495  _BITS res3 : 1; ///< Reserved
2496  } CR2;
2497 
2498 
2499  /** @brief Slave mode control register (TIM1_SMCR) */
2500  struct {
2501  _BITS SMS : 3; ///< Clock/trigger/slave mode selection
2502  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
2503  _BITS TS : 3; ///< Trigger selection
2504  _BITS MSM : 1; ///< Master/slave mode
2505  } SMCR;
2506 
2507 
2508  /** @brief TIM1 External trigger register (TIM1_ETR) */
2509  struct {
2510  _BITS ETF : 4; ///< External trigger filter
2511  _BITS ETPS : 2; ///< External trigger prescaler
2512  _BITS ECE : 1; ///< External clock enable
2513  _BITS ETP : 1; ///< External trigger polarity
2514  } ETR;
2515 
2516 
2517  /** @brief TIM1 Interrupt enable register (TIM1_IER) */
2518  struct {
2519  _BITS UIE : 1; ///< Update interrupt enable
2520  _BITS CC1IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 interrupt enable
2521  _BITS CC2IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 interrupt enable
2522  _BITS CC3IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 interrupt enable
2523  _BITS CC4IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 4 interrupt enable
2524  _BITS COMIE : 1; ///< Commutation interrupt enable
2525  _BITS TIE : 1; ///< Trigger interrupt enable
2526  _BITS BIE : 1; ///< Break interrupt enable
2527  } IER;
2528 
2529 
2530  /** @brief TIM1 Status register 1 (TIM1_SR1) */
2531  struct {
2532  _BITS UIF : 1; ///< Update interrupt flag
2533  _BITS CC1IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 interrupt flag
2534  _BITS CC2IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 interrupt flag
2535  _BITS CC3IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 interrupt flag
2536  _BITS CC4IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 4 interrupt flag
2537  _BITS COMIF : 1; ///< Commutation interrupt flag
2538  _BITS TIF : 1; ///< Trigger interrupt flag
2539  _BITS BIF : 1; ///< Break interrupt flag
2540  } SR1;
2541 
2542 
2543  /** @brief TIM1 Status register 2 (TIM1_SR2) */
2544  struct {
2545  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2546  _BITS CC1OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 overcapture flag
2547  _BITS CC2OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 overcapture flag
2548  _BITS CC3OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 overcapture flag
2549  _BITS CC4OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 4 overcapture flag
2550  _BITS res2 : 3; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
2551  } SR2;
2552 
2553 
2554  /** @brief TIM1 Event generation register (TIM1_EGR) */
2555  struct {
2556  _BITS UG : 1; ///< Update generation
2557  _BITS CC1G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 generation
2558  _BITS CC2G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 generation
2559  _BITS CC3G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 generation
2560  _BITS CC4G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 4 generation
2561  _BITS COMG : 1; ///< Capture/compare control update generation
2562  _BITS TG : 1; ///< Trigger generation
2563  _BITS BG : 1; ///< Break generation
2564  } EGR;
2565 
2566 
2567  /** @brief TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM1_CCMR1) */
2568  union {
2569 
2570  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
2571  struct {
2572  _BITS CC1S : 2; ///< Compare 1 selection
2573  _BITS OC1FE : 1; ///< Output compare 1 fast enable
2574  _BITS OC1PE : 1; ///< Output compare 1 preload enable
2575  _BITS OC1M : 3; ///< Output compare 1 mode
2576  _BITS OC1CE : 1; ///< Output compare 1 clear enable
2577  } OUT;
2578 
2579  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
2580  struct {
2581  _BITS CC1S : 2; ///< Capture 1 selection
2582  _BITS IC1PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 1 prescaler
2583  _BITS IC1F : 4; ///< Input capture 1 filter
2584  } IN;
2585 
2586  } CCMR1;
2587 
2588 
2589  /** @brief TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM1_CCMR2) */
2590  union {
2591 
2592  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
2593  struct {
2594  _BITS CC2S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 2 selection
2595  _BITS OC2FE : 1; ///< Output compare 2 fast enable
2596  _BITS OC2PE : 1; ///< Output compare 2 preload enable
2597  _BITS OC2M : 3; ///< Output compare 2 mode
2598  _BITS OC2CE : 1; ///< Output compare 2 clear enable
2599  } OUT;
2600 
2601  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
2602  struct {
2603  _BITS CC2S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 2 selection
2604  _BITS IC2PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 2 prescaler
2605  _BITS IC2F : 4; ///< Input capture 2 filter
2606  } IN;
2607 
2608  } CCMR2;
2609 
2610 
2611  /** @brief TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 3 (TIM1_CCMR3) */
2612  union {
2613 
2614  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
2615  struct {
2616  _BITS CC3S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 3 selection
2617  _BITS OC3FE : 1; ///< Output compare 3 fast enable
2618  _BITS OC3PE : 1; ///< Output compare 3 preload enable
2619  _BITS OC3M : 3; ///< Output compare 3 mode
2620  _BITS OC3CE : 1; ///< Output compare 3 clear enable
2621  } OUT;
2622 
2623  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
2624  struct {
2625  _BITS CC3S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 3 selection
2626  _BITS IC3PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 3 prescaler
2627  _BITS IC3F : 4; ///< Input capture 3 filter
2628  } IN;
2629 
2630  } CCMR3;
2631 
2632 
2633  /** @brief TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 4 (TIM1_CCMR4) */
2634  union {
2635 
2636  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
2637  struct {
2638  _BITS CC4S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 4 selection
2639  _BITS OC4FE : 1; ///< Output compare 4 fast enable
2640  _BITS OC4PE : 1; ///< Output compare 4 preload enable
2641  _BITS OC4M : 3; ///< Output compare 4 mode
2642  _BITS OC4CE : 1; ///< Output compare 4 clear enable
2643  } OUT;
2644 
2645  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
2646  struct {
2647  _BITS CC4S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 4 selection
2648  _BITS IC4PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 4 prescaler
2649  _BITS IC4F : 4; ///< Input capture 4 filter
2650  } IN;
2651 
2652  } CCMR4;
2653 
2654 
2655  /** @brief TIM1 Capture/compare enable register 1 (TIM1_CCER1) */
2656  struct {
2657  _BITS CC1E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 output enable
2658  _BITS CC1P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 output polarity
2659  _BITS CC1NE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 complementary output enable
2660  _BITS CC1NP : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 complementary output polarity
2661  _BITS CC2E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 output enable
2662  _BITS CC2P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 output polarity
2663  _BITS CC2NE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 complementary output enable
2664  _BITS CC2NP : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 complementary output polarity
2665  } CCER1;
2666 
2667 
2668  /** @brief TIM1 Capture/compare enable register 2 (TIM1_CCER2) */
2669  struct {
2670  _BITS CC3E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 output enable
2671  _BITS CC3P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 output polarity
2672  _BITS CC3NE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 complementary output enable
2673  _BITS CC3NP : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 complementary output polarity
2674  _BITS CC4E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 4 output enable
2675  _BITS CC4P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 4 output polarity
2676  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
2677  } CCER2;
2678 
2679 
2680  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit counter high byte (TIM1_CNTRH) */
2681  struct {
2682  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 16-bit counter [15:8]
2683  } CNTRH;
2684 
2685 
2686  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit counter low byte (TIM1_CNTRL) */
2687  struct {
2688  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 16-bit counter [7:0]
2689  } CNTRL;
2690 
2691 
2692  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit prescaler high byte (TIM1_PSCRH) */
2693  struct {
2694  _BITS PSC : 8; ///< 16-bit prescaler [15:8]
2695  } PSCRH;
2696 
2697 
2698  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit prescaler low byte (TIM1_PSCRL) */
2699  struct {
2700  _BITS PSC : 8; ///< 16-bit prescaler [7:0]
2701  } PSCRL;
2702 
2703 
2704  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit auto-reload value high byte (TIM1_ARRH) */
2705  struct {
2706  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< 16-bit auto-reload value [15:8]
2707  } ARRH;
2708 
2709 
2710  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit auto-reload value low byte (TIM1_ARRL) */
2711  struct {
2712  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< 16-bit auto-reload value [7:0]
2713  } ARRL;
2714 
2715 
2716  /** @brief TIM1 Repetition counter (TIM1_RCR) */
2717  struct {
2718  _BITS REP : 8; ///< Repetition counter value
2719  } RCR;
2720 
2721 
2722  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte (TIM1_CCR1H) */
2723  struct {
2724  _BITS CCR1 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 1 [15:8]
2725  } CCR1H;
2726 
2727 
2728  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte (TIM1_CCR1L) */
2729  struct {
2730  _BITS CCR1 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 1 [7:0]
2731  } CCR1L;
2732 
2733 
2734  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte (TIM1_CCR2H) */
2735  struct {
2736  _BITS CCR2 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 2 [15:8]
2737  } CCR2H;
2738 
2739 
2740  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte (TIM1_CCR2L) */
2741  struct {
2742  _BITS CCR2 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 2 [7:0]
2743  } CCR2L;
2744 
2745 
2746  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte (TIM1_CCR3H) */
2747  struct {
2748  _BITS CCR3 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 3 [15:8]
2749  } CCR3H;
2750 
2751 
2752  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte (TIM1_CCR3L) */
2753  struct {
2754  _BITS CCR3 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 3 [7:0]
2755  } CCR3L;
2756 
2757 
2758  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 4 high byte (TIM1_CCR4H) */
2759  struct {
2760  _BITS CCR4 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 4 [15:8]
2761  } CCR4H;
2762 
2763 
2764  /** @brief TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 4 low byte (TIM1_CCR4L) */
2765  struct {
2766  _BITS CCR4 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 4 [7:0]
2767  } CCR4L;
2768 
2769 
2770  /** @brief TIM1 Break register (TIM1_BKR) */
2771  struct {
2772  _BITS LOCK : 2; ///< Lock configuration
2773  _BITS OSSI : 1; ///< Off state selection for idle mode
2774  _BITS OSSR : 1; ///< Off state selection for Run mode
2775  _BITS BKE : 1; ///< Break enable
2776  _BITS BKP : 1; ///< Break polarity
2777  _BITS AOE : 1; ///< Automatic output enable
2778  _BITS MOE : 1; ///< Main output enable
2779  } BKR;
2780 
2781 
2782  /** @brief TIM1 Dead-time register (TIM1_DTR) */
2783  struct {
2784  _BITS DTG : 8; ///< Deadtime generator set-up
2785  } DTR;
2786 
2787 
2788  /** @brief TIM1 Output idle state register (TIM1_OISR) */
2789  struct {
2790  _BITS OIS1 : 1; ///< Output idle state 1 (OC1 output)
2791  _BITS OIS1N : 1; ///< Output idle state 1 (OC1N output)
2792  _BITS OIS2 : 1; ///< Output idle state 2 (OC2 output)
2793  _BITS OIS2N : 1; ///< Output idle state 2 (OC2N output)
2794  _BITS OIS3 : 1; ///< Output idle state 3 (OC3 output)
2795  _BITS OIS3N : 1; ///< Output idle state 3 (OC3N output)
2796  _BITS OIS4 : 1; ///< Output idle state 4 (OC4 output)
2797  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, forced by hardware to 0
2798  } OISR;
2799 
2800  } TIM1_t;
2801 
2802  /* Pointer to TIM1 registers */
2803  #define _TIM1 _SFR(TIM1_t, TIM1_AddressBase) ///< TIM1 struct/bit access
2804  #define _TIM1_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x00) ///< TIM1 control register 1
2805  #define _TIM1_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x01) ///< TIM1 control register 2
2806  #define _TIM1_SMCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x02) ///< TIM1 Slave mode control register
2807  #define _TIM1_ETR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x03) ///< TIM1 External trigger register
2808  #define _TIM1_IER _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x04) ///< TIM1 interrupt enable register
2809  #define _TIM1_SR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x05) ///< TIM1 status register 1
2810  #define _TIM1_SR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x06) ///< TIM1 status register 2
2811  #define _TIM1_EGR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x07) ///< TIM1 Event generation register
2812  #define _TIM1_CCMR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x08) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 1
2813  #define _TIM1_CCMR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x09) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 2
2814  #define _TIM1_CCMR3 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 3
2815  #define _TIM1_CCMR4 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x0B) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 4
2816  #define _TIM1_CCER1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x0C) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare enable register 1
2817  #define _TIM1_CCER2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x0D) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare enable register 2
2818  #define _TIM1_CNTRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x0E) ///< TIM1 counter register high byte
2819  #define _TIM1_CNTRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x0F) ///< TIM1 counter register low byte
2820  #define _TIM1_PSCRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x10) ///< TIM1 clock prescaler register high byte
2821  #define _TIM1_PSCRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x11) ///< TIM1 clock prescaler register low byte
2822  #define _TIM1_ARRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x12) ///< TIM1 auto-reload register high byte
2823  #define _TIM1_ARRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x13) ///< TIM1 auto-reload register low byte
2824  #define _TIM1_RCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x14) ///< TIM1 Repetition counter
2825  #define _TIM1_CCR1H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x15) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte
2826  #define _TIM1_CCR1L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x16) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte
2827  #define _TIM1_CCR2H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x17) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte
2828  #define _TIM1_CCR2L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x18) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte
2829  #define _TIM1_CCR3H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x19) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte
2830  #define _TIM1_CCR3L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x1A) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte
2831  #define _TIM1_CCR4H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x1B) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 4 high byte
2832  #define _TIM1_CCR4L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x1C) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 4 low byte
2833  #define _TIM1_BKR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x1D) ///< TIM1 Break register
2834  #define _TIM1_DTR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x1E) ///< TIM1 Dead-time register
2835  #define _TIM1_OISR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM1_AddressBase+0x1F) ///< TIM1 Output idle state register
2836 
2837  /* TIM1 Module Reset Values */
2838  #define _TIM1_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 control register 1 reset value
2839  #define _TIM1_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 control register 2 reset value
2840  #define _TIM1_SMCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Slave mode control register reset value
2841  #define _TIM1_ETR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 External trigger register reset value
2842  #define _TIM1_IER_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 interrupt enable register reset value
2843  #define _TIM1_SR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 status register 1 reset value
2844  #define _TIM1_SR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 status register 2 reset value
2845  #define _TIM1_EGR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Event generation register reset value
2846  #define _TIM1_CCMR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 1 reset value
2847  #define _TIM1_CCMR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 2 reset value
2848  #define _TIM1_CCMR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 3 reset value
2849  #define _TIM1_CCMR4_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 4 reset value
2850  #define _TIM1_CCER1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare enable register 1 reset value
2851  #define _TIM1_CCER2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare enable register 2 reset value
2852  #define _TIM1_CNTRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 counter register high byte reset value
2853  #define _TIM1_CNTRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 counter register low byte reset value
2854  #define _TIM1_PSCRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 clock prescaler register high byte reset value
2855  #define _TIM1_PSCRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 clock prescaler register low byte reset value
2856  #define _TIM1_ARRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM1 auto-reload register high byte reset value
2857  #define _TIM1_ARRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM1 auto-reload register low byte reset value
2858  #define _TIM1_RCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Repetition counter reset value
2859  #define _TIM1_CCR1H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte reset value
2860  #define _TIM1_CCR1L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte reset value
2861  #define _TIM1_CCR2H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte reset value
2862  #define _TIM1_CCR2L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte reset value
2863  #define _TIM1_CCR3H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte reset value
2864  #define _TIM1_CCR3L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte reset value
2865  #define _TIM1_CCR4H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 4 high byte reset value
2866  #define _TIM1_CCR4L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 16-bit capture/compare value 4 low byte reset value
2867  #define _TIM1_BKR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Break register reset value
2868  #define _TIM1_DTR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Dead-time register reset value
2869  #define _TIM1_OISR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM1 Output idle state register reset value
2870 
2871  /* TIM1 Control register (TIM1_CR1) */
2872  #define _TIM1_CEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Counter enable [0] (in _TIM1_CR1)
2873  #define _TIM1_UDIS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Update disable [0] (in _TIM1_CR1)
2874  #define _TIM1_URS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Update request source [0] (in _TIM1_CR1)
2875  #define _TIM1_OPM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 One-pulse mode [0] (in _TIM1_CR1)
2876  #define _TIM1_DIR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Direction [0] (in _TIM1_CR1)
2877  #define _TIM1_CMS ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Center-aligned mode selection [1:0] (in _TIM1_CR1)
2878  #define _TIM1_CMS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Center-aligned mode selection [0] (in _TIM1_CR1)
2879  #define _TIM1_CMS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Center-aligned mode selection [1] (in _TIM1_CR1)
2880  #define _TIM1_ARPE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Auto-reload preload enable [0] (in _TIM1_CR1)
2881 
2882  /* TIM1 Control register (TIM1_CR2) */
2883  #define _TIM1_CCPC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare preloaded control [0] (in _TIM1_CR2)
2884  // reserved [1]
2885  #define _TIM1_COMS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare control update selection [0] (in _TIM1_CR2)
2886  // reserved [3]
2887  #define _TIM1_MMS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Master mode selection [2:0] (in _TIM1_CR2)
2888  #define _TIM1_MMS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Master mode selection [0] (in _TIM1_CR2)
2889  #define _TIM1_MMS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Master mode selection [1] (in _TIM1_CR2)
2890  #define _TIM1_MMS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Master mode selection [2] (in _TIM1_CR2)
2891  // reserved [7]
2892 
2893  /* TIM1 Slave mode control register (TIM1_SMCR) */
2894  #define _TIM1_SMS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [2:0] (in _TIM1_SMCR)
2895  #define _TIM1_SMS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [0] (in _TIM1_SMCR)
2896  #define _TIM1_SMS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [1] (in _TIM1_SMCR)
2897  #define _TIM1_SMS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [2] (in _TIM1_SMCR)
2898  // reserved [3]
2899  #define _TIM1_TS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Trigger selection [2:0] (in _TIM1_SMCR)
2900  #define _TIM1_TS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Trigger selection [0] (in _TIM1_SMCR)
2901  #define _TIM1_TS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Trigger selection [1] (in _TIM1_SMCR)
2902  #define _TIM1_TS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Trigger selection [2] (in _TIM1_SMCR)
2903  #define _TIM1_MSM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Master/slave mode [0] (in _TIM1_SMCR)
2904 
2905  /* TIM1 External trigger register (TIM1_ETR) */
2906  #define _TIM1_ETF ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< TIM1 External trigger filter [3:0] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2907  #define _TIM1_ETF0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 External trigger filter [0] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2908  #define _TIM1_ETF1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 External trigger filter [1] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2909  #define _TIM1_ETF2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 External trigger filter [2] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2910  #define _TIM1_ETF3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 External trigger filter [3] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2911  #define _TIM1_ETPS ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< TIM1 External trigger prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2912  #define _TIM1_ETPS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 External trigger prescaler [0] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2913  #define _TIM1_ETPS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 External trigger prescaler [1] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2914  #define _TIM1_ECE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 External clock enable [0] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2915  #define _TIM1_ETP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 External trigger polarity [0] (in _TIM1_ETR)
2916 
2917  /* TIM1 Interrupt enable (TIM1_IER) */
2918  #define _TIM1_UIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Update interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM1_IER)
2919  #define _TIM1_CC1IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 1 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM1_IER)
2920  #define _TIM1_CC2IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 2 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM1_IER)
2921  #define _TIM1_CC3IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 3 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM1_IER)
2922  #define _TIM1_CC4IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 4 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM1_IER)
2923  #define _TIM1_COMIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Commutation interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM1_IER)
2924  #define _TIM1_TIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Trigger interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM1_IER)
2925  #define _TIM1_BIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Break interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM1_IER)
2926 
2927  /* TIM1 Status register 1 (TIM1_SR1) */
2928  #define _TIM1_UIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Update interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR1)
2929  #define _TIM1_CC1IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 1 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR1)
2930  #define _TIM1_CC2IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 2 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR1)
2931  #define _TIM1_CC3IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 3 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR1)
2932  #define _TIM1_CC4IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 4 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR1)
2933  #define _TIM1_COMIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Commutation interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR1)
2934  #define _TIM1_TIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Trigger interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR1)
2935  #define _TIM1_BIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Break interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR1)
2936 
2937  /* TIM1 Status register 2 (TIM1_SR2) */
2938  // reserved [0]
2939  #define _TIM1_CC1OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 1 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR2)
2940  #define _TIM1_CC2OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 2 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR2)
2941  #define _TIM1_CC3OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 3 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR2)
2942  #define _TIM1_CC4OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 4 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM1_SR2)
2943  // reserved [7:5]
2944 
2945  /* TIM1 Event generation register (TIM1_EGR) */
2946  #define _TIM1_UG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Update generation [0] (in _TIM1_EGR)
2947  #define _TIM1_CC1G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 1 generation [0] (in _TIM1_EGR)
2948  #define _TIM1_CC2G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 2 generation [0] (in _TIM1_EGR)
2949  #define _TIM1_CC3G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 3 generation [0] (in _TIM1_EGR)
2950  #define _TIM1_CC4G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 4 generation [0] (in _TIM1_EGR)
2951  #define _TIM1_COMG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare control update generation [0] (in _TIM1_EGR)
2952  #define _TIM1_TG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Trigger generation [0] (in _TIM1_EGR)
2953  #define _TIM1_BG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Break generation [0] (in _TIM1_EGR)
2954 
2955  /* TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM1_CCMR1). Output mode */
2956  #define _TIM1_CC1S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Compare 1 selection [1:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2957  #define _TIM1_CC1S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Compare 1 selection [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2958  #define _TIM1_CC1S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Compare 1 selection [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2959  #define _TIM1_OC1FE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 1 fast enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2960  #define _TIM1_OC1PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 1 preload enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2961  #define _TIM1_OC1M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 1 mode [2:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2962  #define _TIM1_OC1M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 1 mode [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2963  #define _TIM1_OC1M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 1 mode [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2964  #define _TIM1_OC1M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 1 mode [2] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2965  #define _TIM1_OC1CE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 1 clear enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2966 
2967  /* TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM1_CCMR1). Input mode */
2968  // _TIM1_CC1S [1:0] defined above
2969  #define _TIM1_IC1PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 1 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2970  #define _TIM1_IC1PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 1 prescaler [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2971  #define _TIM1_IC1PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 1 prescaler [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2972  #define _TIM1_IC1F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 1 mode [3:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2973  #define _TIM1_IC1F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 1 filter [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2974  #define _TIM1_IC1F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 1 filter [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2975  #define _TIM1_IC1F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 1 filter [2] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2976  #define _TIM1_IC1F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 1 filter [3] (in _TIM1_CCMR1)
2977 
2978  /* TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM1_CCMR2). Output mode */
2979  #define _TIM1_CC2S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Compare 2 selection [1:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2980  #define _TIM1_CC2S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Compare 2 selection [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2981  #define _TIM1_CC2S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Compare 2 selection [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2982  #define _TIM1_OC2FE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 2 fast enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2983  #define _TIM1_OC2PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 2 preload enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2984  #define _TIM1_OC2M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 2 mode [2:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2985  #define _TIM1_OC2M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 2 mode [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2986  #define _TIM1_OC2M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 2 mode [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2987  #define _TIM1_OC2M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 2 mode [2] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2988  #define _TIM1_OC2CE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 2 clear enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2989 
2990  /* TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM1_CCMR2). Input mode */
2991  // _TIM1_CC2S [1:0] defined above
2992  #define _TIM1_IC2PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 2 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2993  #define _TIM1_IC2PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 2 prescaler [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2994  #define _TIM1_IC2PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 2 prescaler [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2995  #define _TIM1_IC2F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 2 mode [3:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2996  #define _TIM1_IC2F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 2 filter [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2997  #define _TIM1_IC2F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 2 filter [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2998  #define _TIM1_IC2F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 2 filter [2] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
2999  #define _TIM1_IC2F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 2 filter [3] (in _TIM1_CCMR2)
3000 
3001  /* TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 3 (TIM1_CCMR3). Output mode */
3002  #define _TIM1_CC3S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Compare 3 selection [1:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3003  #define _TIM1_CC3S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Compare 3 selection [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3004  #define _TIM1_CC3S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Compare 3 selection [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3005  #define _TIM1_OC3FE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 3 fast enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3006  #define _TIM1_OC3PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 3 preload enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3007  #define _TIM1_OC3M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 3 mode [2:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
