3008  #define _TIM1_OC3M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 3 mode [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3009  #define _TIM1_OC3M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 3 mode [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3010  #define _TIM1_OC3M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 3 mode [2] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3011  #define _TIM1_OC3CE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 3 clear enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3012 
3013  /* TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 3 (TIM1_CCMR3). Input mode */
3014  // _TIM1_CC3S [1:0] defined above
3015  #define _TIM1_IC3PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 3 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3016  #define _TIM1_IC3PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 3 prescaler [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3017  #define _TIM1_IC3PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 3 prescaler [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3018  #define _TIM1_IC3F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 3 mode [3:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3019  #define _TIM1_IC3F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 3 filter [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3020  #define _TIM1_IC3F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 3 filter [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3021  #define _TIM1_IC3F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 3 filter [2] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3022  #define _TIM1_IC3F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 3 filter [3] (in _TIM1_CCMR3)
3023 
3024  /* TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 4 (TIM1_CCMR4). Output mode */
3025  #define _TIM1_CC4S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Compare 4 selection [1:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3026  #define _TIM1_CC4S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Compare 4 selection [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3027  #define _TIM1_CC4S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Compare 4 selection [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3028  #define _TIM1_OC4FE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 4 fast enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3029  #define _TIM1_OC4PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 4 preload enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3030  #define _TIM1_OC4M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 4 mode [2:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3031  #define _TIM1_OC4M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 4 mode [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3032  #define _TIM1_OC4M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 4 mode [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3033  #define _TIM1_OC4M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 4 mode [2] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3034  #define _TIM1_OC4CE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 4 clear enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3035 
3036  /* TIM1 Capture/compare mode register 4 (TIM1_CCMR4). Input mode */
3037  // _TIM1_CC4S [1:0] defined above
3038  #define _TIM1_IC4PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 4 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3039  #define _TIM1_IC4PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 4 prescaler [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3040  #define _TIM1_IC4PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 4 prescaler [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3041  #define _TIM1_IC4F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output compare 4 mode [3:0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3042  #define _TIM1_IC4F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 4 filter [0] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3043  #define _TIM1_IC4F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 4 filter [1] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3044  #define _TIM1_IC4F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 4 filter [2] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3045  #define _TIM1_IC4F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Input capture 4 filter [3] (in _TIM1_CCMR4)
3046 
3047  /* TIM1 Capture/compare enable register 1 (TIM1_CCER1) */
3048  #define _TIM1_CC1E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 1 output enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCER1)
3049  #define _TIM1_CC1P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 1 output polarity [0] (in _TIM1_CCER1)
3050  #define _TIM1_CC1NE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 1 complementary output enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCER1)
3051  #define _TIM1_CC1NP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 1 complementary output polarity [0] (in _TIM1_CCER1)
3052  #define _TIM1_CC2E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 2 output enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCER1)
3053  #define _TIM1_CC2P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 2 output polarity [0] (in _TIM1_CCER1)
3054  #define _TIM1_CC2NE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 2 complementary output enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCER1)
3055  #define _TIM1_CC2NP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 2 complementary output polarity [0] (in _TIM1_CCER1)
3056 
3057  /* TIM1 Capture/compare enable register 2 (TIM1_CCER2) */
3058  #define _TIM1_CC3E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 3 output enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCER2)
3059  #define _TIM1_CC3P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 3 output polarity [0] (in _TIM1_CCER2)
3060  #define _TIM1_CC3NE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 3 complementary output enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCER2)
3061  #define _TIM1_CC3NP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 3 complementary output polarity [0] (in _TIM1_CCER2)
3062  #define _TIM1_CC4E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 4 output enable [0] (in _TIM1_CCER2)
3063  #define _TIM1_CC4P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Capture/compare 4 output polarity [0] (in _TIM1_CCER2)
3064  // reserved [7:6]
3065 
3066  /* TIM1 Break register (TIM1_BKR) */
3067  #define _TIM1_LOCK ((int8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Lock configuration [1:0] (in _TIM1_BKR)
3068  #define _TIM1_LOCK0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Lock configuration [0] (in _TIM1_BKR)
3069  #define _TIM1_LOCK1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Lock configuration [1] (in _TIM1_BKR)
3070  #define _TIM1_OSSI ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Off state selection for idle mode [0] (in _TIM1_BKR)
3071  #define _TIM1_OSSR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Off state selection for Run mode [0] (in _TIM1_BKR)
3072  #define _TIM1_BKE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Break enable [0] (in _TIM1_BKR)
3073  #define _TIM1_BKP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Break polarity [0] (in _TIM1_BKR)
3074  #define _TIM1_AOE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Automatic output enable [0] (in _TIM1_BKR)
3075  #define _TIM1_MOE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM1 Main output enable [0] (in _TIM1_BKR)
3076 
3077  /* TIM1 Output idle state register (TIM1_OISR) */
3078  #define _TIM1_OIS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM1 Output idle state 1 (OC1 output) [0] (in _TIM1_OISR)
3079  #define _TIM1_OIS1N ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM1 Output idle state 1 (OC1N output) [0] (in _TIM1_OISR)
3080  #define _TIM1_OIS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM1 Output idle state 2 (OC2 output) [0] (in _TIM1_OISR)
3081  #define _TIM1_OIS2N ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM1 Output idle state 2 (OC2N output) [0] (in _TIM1_OISR)
3082  #define _TIM1_OIS3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM1 Output idle state 3 (OC3 output) [0] (in _TIM1_OISR)
3083  #define _TIM1_OIS3N ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM1 Output idle state 3 (OC3N output) [0] (in _TIM1_OISR)
3084  #define _TIM1_OIS4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM1 Output idle state 4 (OC4 output) [0] (in _TIM1_OISR)
3085  // reserved [7]
3086 
3087 #endif // TIM1_AddressBase
3088 
3089 
3090 
3091 //------------------------
3092 // 16-Bit Timer 2 (TIM2)
3093 //------------------------
3094 #if defined(TIM2_AddressBase)
3095 
3096  /** @brief struct for controlling 16-Bit Timer 2 (TIM2) */
3097  typedef struct {
3098 
3099  /** @brief TIM2 Control register 1 (TIM2_CR1) */
3100  struct {
3101  _BITS CEN : 1; ///< Counter enable
3102  _BITS UDIS : 1; ///< Update disable
3103  _BITS URS : 1; ///< Update request source
3104  _BITS OPM : 1; ///< One-pulse mode
3105  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
3106  _BITS ARPE : 1; ///< Auto-reload preload enable
3107  } CR1;
3108 
3109 
3110  /** @brief Reserved registers on selected devices (2B) */
3111  #if defined(STM8S103) || defined(STM8S003) || defined(STM8S001)
3112  uint8_t res[2];
3113  #endif
3114 
3115 
3116  /** @brief TIM2 Interrupt enable register (TIM2_IER) */
3117  struct {
3118  _BITS UIE : 1; ///< Update interrupt enable
3119  _BITS CC1IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 interrupt enable
3120  _BITS CC2IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 interrupt enable
3121  _BITS CC3IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 interrupt enable
3122  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
3123  } IER;
3124 
3125 
3126  /** @brief TIM2 Status register 1 (TIM2_SR1) */
3127  struct {
3128  _BITS UIF : 1; ///< Update interrupt flag
3129  _BITS CC1IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 interrupt flag
3130  _BITS CC2IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 interrupt flag
3131  _BITS CC3IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 interrupt flag
3132  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
3133  } SR1;
3134 
3135 
3136  /** @brief TIM2 Status register 2 (TIM2_SR2) */
3137  struct {
3138  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
3139  _BITS CC1OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 overcapture flag
3140  _BITS CC2OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 overcapture flag
3141  _BITS CC3OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 overcapture flag
3142  _BITS res2 : 4; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
3143  } SR2;
3144 
3145 
3146  /** @brief TIM2 Event generation register (TIM2_EGR) */
3147  struct {
3148  _BITS UG : 1; ///< Update generation
3149  _BITS CC1G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 generation
3150  _BITS CC2G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 generation
3151  _BITS CC3G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 generation
3152  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
3153  } EGR;
3154 
3155 
3156  /** @brief TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM2_CCMR1) */
3157  union {
3158 
3159  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
3160  struct {
3161  _BITS CC1S : 2; ///< Compare 1 selection
3162  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
3163  _BITS OC1PE : 1; ///< Output compare 1 preload enable
3164  _BITS OC1M : 3; ///< Output compare 1 mode
3165  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
3166  } OUT;
3167 
3168  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
3169  struct {
3170  _BITS CC1S : 2; ///< Capture 1 selection
3171  _BITS IC1PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 1 prescaler
3172  _BITS IC1F : 4; ///< Input capture 1 filter
3173  } IN;
3174 
3175  } CCMR1;
3176 
3177 
3178  /** @brief TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM2_CCMR2) */
3179  union {
3180 
3181  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
3182  struct {
3183  _BITS CC2S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 2 selection
3184  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
3185  _BITS OC2PE : 1; ///< Output compare 2 preload enable
3186  _BITS OC2M : 3; ///< Output compare 2 mode
3187  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
3188  } OUT;
3189 
3190  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
3191  struct {
3192  _BITS CC2S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 2 selection
3193  _BITS IC2PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 2 prescaler
3194  _BITS IC2F : 4; ///< Input capture 2 filter
3195  } IN;
3196 
3197  } CCMR2;
3198 
3199 
3200  /** @brief TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 3 (TIM2_CCMR3) */
3201  union {
3202 
3203  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
3204  struct {
3205  _BITS CC3S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 3 selection
3206  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
3207  _BITS OC3PE : 1; ///< Output compare 3 preload enable
3208  _BITS OC3M : 3; ///< Output compare 3 mode
3209  _BITS OC3CE : 1; ///< Output compare 3 clear enable
3210  } OUT;
3211 
3212  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
3213  struct {
3214  _BITS CC3S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 3 selection
3215  _BITS IC3PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 3 prescaler
3216  _BITS IC3F : 4; ///< Input capture 3 filter
3217  } IN;
3218 
3219  } CCMR3;
3220 
3221 
3222  /** @brief TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 1 (TIM2_CCER1) */
3223  struct {
3224  _BITS CC1E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 output enable
3225  _BITS CC1P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 output polarity
3226  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
3227  _BITS CC2E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 output enable
3228  _BITS CC2P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 output polarity
3229  _BITS res2 : 2; ///< Reserved
3230  } CCER1;
3231 
3232 
3233  /** @brief TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 2 (TIM2_CCER2) */
3234  struct {
3235  _BITS CC3E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 output enable
3236  _BITS CC3P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 output polarity
3237  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved
3238  } CCER2;
3239 
3240 
3241  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit counter high byte (TIM2_CNTRH) */
3242  struct {
3243  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 16-bit counter [15:8]
3244  } CNTRH;
3245 
3246 
3247  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit counter low byte (TIM2_CNTRL) */
3248  struct {
3249  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 16-bit counter [7:0]
3250  } CNTRL;
3251 
3252 
3253  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit prescaler high byte (TIM2_PSCR) */
3254  struct {
3255  _BITS PSC : 4; ///< prescaler [3:0]
3256  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
3257  } PSCR;
3258 
3259 
3260  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit auto-reload value high byte (TIM2_ARRH) */
3261  struct {
3262  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< 16-bit auto-reload value [15:8]
3263  } ARRH;
3264 
3265 
3266  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit auto-reload value low byte (TIM2_ARRL) */
3267  struct {
3268  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< 16-bit auto-reload value [7:0]
3269  } ARRL;
3270 
3271 
3272  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte (TIM2_CCR1H) */
3273  struct {
3274  _BITS CCR1 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 1 [15:8]
3275  } CCR1H;
3276 
3277 
3278  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte (TIM2_CCR1L) */
3279  struct {
3280  _BITS CCR1 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 1 [7:0]
3281  } CCR1L;
3282 
3283 
3284  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte (TIM2_CCR2H) */
3285  struct {
3286  _BITS CCR2 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 2 [15:8]
3287  } CCR2H;
3288 
3289 
3290  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte (TIM2_CCR2L) */
3291  struct {
3292  _BITS CCR2 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 2 [7:0]
3293  } CCR2L;
3294 
3295 
3296  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte (TIM2_CCR3H) */
3297  struct {
3298  _BITS CCR3 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 3 [15:8]
3299  } CCR3H;
3300 
3301 
3302  /** @brief TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte (TIM2_CCR3L) */
3303  struct {
3304  _BITS CCR3 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 3 [7:0]
3305  } CCR3L;
3306 
3307  } TIM2_t;
3308 
3309  /* Pointer to TIM2 registers */
3310  #define _TIM2 _SFR(TIM2_t, TIM2_AddressBase) ///< TIM2 struct/bit access
3311  #define _TIM2_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x00) ///< TIM2 control register 1
3312  #if defined(STM8S103) || defined(STM8S003) || defined(STM8S001) // 2B offset for selected devices
3313  // 2B reserved
3314  #define _TIM2_IER _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x03) ///< TIM2 interrupt enable register
3315  #define _TIM2_SR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x04) ///< TIM2 status register 1
3316  #define _TIM2_SR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x05) ///< TIM2 status register 2
3317  #define _TIM2_EGR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x06) ///< TIM2 Event generation register
3318  #define _TIM2_CCMR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x07) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 1
3319  #define _TIM2_CCMR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x08) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 2
3320  #define _TIM2_CCMR3 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x09) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 3
3321  #define _TIM2_CCER1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 1
3322  #define _TIM2_CCER2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0B) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 2
3323  #define _TIM2_CNTRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0C) ///< TIM2 counter register high byte
3324  #define _TIM2_CNTRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0D) ///< TIM2 counter register low byte
3325  #define _TIM2_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0E) ///< TIM2 clock prescaler register
3326  #define _TIM2_ARRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0F) ///< TIM2 auto-reload register high byte
3327  #define _TIM2_ARRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x10) ///< TIM2 auto-reload register low byte
3328  #define _TIM2_CCR1H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x11) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte
3329  #define _TIM2_CCR1L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x12) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte
3330  #define _TIM2_CCR2H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x13) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte
3331  #define _TIM2_CCR2L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x14) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte
3332  #define _TIM2_CCR3H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x15) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte
3333  #define _TIM2_CCR3L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x16) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte
3334  #else
3335  #define _TIM2_IER _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x01) ///< TIM2 interrupt enable register
3336  #define _TIM2_SR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x02) ///< TIM2 status register 1
3337  #define _TIM2_SR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x03) ///< TIM2 status register 2
3338  #define _TIM2_EGR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x04) ///< TIM2 Event generation register
3339  #define _TIM2_CCMR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x05) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 1
3340  #define _TIM2_CCMR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x06) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 2
3341  #define _TIM2_CCMR3 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x07) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 3
3342  #define _TIM2_CCER1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x08) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 1
3343  #define _TIM2_CCER2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x09) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 2
3344  #define _TIM2_CNTRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< TIM2 counter register high byte
3345  #define _TIM2_CNTRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0B) ///< TIM2 counter register low byte
3346  #define _TIM2_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0C) ///< TIM2 clock prescaler register
3347  #define _TIM2_ARRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0D) ///< TIM2 auto-reload register high byte
3348  #define _TIM2_ARRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0E) ///< TIM2 auto-reload register low byte
3349  #define _TIM2_CCR1H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x0F) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte
3350  #define _TIM2_CCR1L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x10) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte
3351  #define _TIM2_CCR2H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x11) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte
3352  #define _TIM2_CCR2L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x12) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte
3353  #define _TIM2_CCR3H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x13) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte
3354  #define _TIM2_CCR3L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM2_AddressBase+0x14) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte
3355  #endif
3356 
3357  /* TIM2 Module Reset Values */
3358  #define _TIM2_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 control register 1 reset value
3359  #define _TIM2_IER_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 interrupt enable register reset value
3360  #define _TIM2_SR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 status register 1 reset value
3361  #define _TIM2_SR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 status register 2 reset value
3362  #define _TIM2_EGR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 Event generation register reset value
3363  #define _TIM2_CCMR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 1 reset value
3364  #define _TIM2_CCMR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 2 reset value
3365  #define _TIM2_CCMR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 3 reset value
3366  #define _TIM2_CCER1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 1 reset value
3367  #define _TIM2_CCER2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 2 reset value
3368  #define _TIM2_CNTRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 counter register high byte reset value
3369  #define _TIM2_CNTRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 counter register low byte reset value
3370  #define _TIM2_PSCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 clock prescaler register reset value
3371  #define _TIM2_ARRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM2 auto-reload register high byte reset value
3372  #define _TIM2_ARRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM2 auto-reload register low byte reset value
3373  #define _TIM2_CCR1H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte reset value
3374  #define _TIM2_CCR1L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte reset value
3375  #define _TIM2_CCR2H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte reset value
3376  #define _TIM2_CCR2L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte reset value
3377  #define _TIM2_CCR3H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte reset value
3378  #define _TIM2_CCR3L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM2 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte reset value
3379 
3380  /* TIM2 Control register (TIM2_CR1) */
3381  #define _TIM2_CEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Counter enable [0] (in _TIM2_CR1)
3382  #define _TIM2_UDIS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Update disable [0] (in _TIM2_CR1)
3383  #define _TIM2_URS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Update request source [0] (in _TIM2_CR1)
3384  #define _TIM2_OPM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 One-pulse mode [0] (in _TIM2_CR1)
3385  // reserved [6:4]
3386  #define _TIM2_ARPE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM2 Auto-reload preload enable [0] (in _TIM2_CR1)
3387 
3388  /* TIM2 Interrupt enable (TIM2_IER) */
3389  #define _TIM2_UIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Update interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM2_IER)
3390  #define _TIM2_CC1IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 1 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM2_IER)
3391  #define _TIM2_CC2IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 2 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM2_IER)
3392  #define _TIM2_CC3IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 3 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM2_IER)
3393  // reserved [7:4]
3394 
3395  /* TIM2 Status register 1 (TIM2_SR1) */
3396  #define _TIM2_UIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Update interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM2_SR1)
3397  #define _TIM2_CC1IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 1 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM2_SR1)
3398  #define _TIM2_CC2IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 2 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM2_SR1)
3399  #define _TIM2_CC3IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 3 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM2_SR1)
3400  // reserved [7:4]
3401 
3402  /* TIM2 Status register 2 (TIM2_SR2) */
3403  // reserved [0]
3404  #define _TIM2_CC1OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 1 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM2_SR2)
3405  #define _TIM2_CC2OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 2 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM2_SR2)
3406  #define _TIM2_CC3OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 3 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM2_SR2)
3407  // reserved [7:4]
3408 
3409  /* TIM2 Event generation register (TIM2_EGR) */
3410  #define _TIM2_UG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Update generation [0] (in _TIM2_EGR)
3411  #define _TIM2_CC1G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 1 generation [0] (in _TIM2_EGR)
3412  #define _TIM2_CC2G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 2 generation [0] (in _TIM2_EGR)
3413  #define _TIM2_CC3G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 3 generation [0] (in _TIM2_EGR)
3414  // reserved [7:4]
3415 
3416  /* TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM2_CCMR1). Output mode */
3417  #define _TIM2_CC1S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Compare 1 selection [1:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3418  #define _TIM2_CC1S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Compare 1 selection [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3419  #define _TIM2_CC1S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Compare 1 selection [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3420  // reserved [2]
3421  #define _TIM2_OC1PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 preload enable [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3422  #define _TIM2_OC1M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 mode [2:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3423  #define _TIM2_OC1M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 mode [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3424  #define _TIM2_OC1M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 mode [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3425  #define _TIM2_OC1M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 mode [2] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3426  // reserved [7]
3427 
3428  /* TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM2_CCMR1). Input mode */
3429  // _TIM2_CC1S [1:0] defined above
3430  #define _TIM2_IC1PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Input capture 1 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3431  #define _TIM2_IC1PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Input capture 1 prescaler [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3432  #define _TIM2_IC1PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Input capture 1 prescaler [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3433  #define _TIM2_IC1F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 mode [3:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3434  #define _TIM2_IC1F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 mode [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3435  #define _TIM2_IC1F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 mode [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3436  #define _TIM2_IC1F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 mode [2] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3437  #define _TIM2_IC1F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 1 mode [3] (in _TIM2_CCMR1)
3438 
3439  /* TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM2_CCMR2). Output mode */
3440  #define _TIM2_CC2S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Compare 2 selection [1:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3441  #define _TIM2_CC2S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Compare 2 selection [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3442  #define _TIM2_CC2S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Compare 2 selection [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3443  // reserved [2]
3444  #define _TIM2_OC2PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 preload enable [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3445  #define _TIM2_OC2M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 mode [2:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3446  #define _TIM2_OC2M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 mode [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3447  #define _TIM2_OC2M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 mode [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3448  #define _TIM2_OC2M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 mode [2] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3449  // reserved [7]
3450 
3451  /* TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM2_CCMR2). Input mode */
3452  // _TIM2_CC2S [1:0] defined above
3453  #define _TIM2_IC2PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Input capture 2 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3454  #define _TIM2_IC2PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Input capture 2 prescaler [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3455  #define _TIM2_IC2PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Input capture 2 prescaler [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3456  #define _TIM2_IC2F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 mode [3:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3457  #define _TIM2_IC2F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 mode [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3458  #define _TIM2_IC2F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 mode [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3459  #define _TIM2_IC2F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 mode [2] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3460  #define _TIM2_IC2F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 2 mode [3] (in _TIM2_CCMR2)
3461 
3462  /* TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 3 (TIM2_CCMR3). Output mode */
3463  #define _TIM2_CC3S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Compare 3 selection [1:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3464  #define _TIM2_CC3S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Compare 3 selection [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3465  #define _TIM2_CC3S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Compare 3 selection [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3466  // reserved [2]
3467  #define _TIM2_OC3PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 preload enable [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3468  #define _TIM2_OC3M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 mode [2:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3469  #define _TIM2_OC3M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 mode [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3470  #define _TIM2_OC3M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 mode [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3471  #define _TIM2_OC3M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 mode [2] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3472  // reserved [7]
3473 
3474  /* TIM2 Capture/compare mode register 3 (TIM2_CCMR3). Input mode */
3475  // _TIM2_CC3S [1:0] defined above
3476  #define _TIM2_IC3PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Input capture 3 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3477  #define _TIM2_IC3PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM2 Input capture 3 prescaler [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3478  #define _TIM2_IC3PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 Input capture 3 prescaler [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3479  #define _TIM2_IC3F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 mode [3:0] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3480  #define _TIM2_IC3F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 mode [0] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3481  #define _TIM2_IC3F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 mode [1] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3482  #define _TIM2_IC3F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 mode [2] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3483  #define _TIM2_IC3F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM2 Output compare 3 mode [3] (in _TIM2_CCMR3)
3484 
3485  /* TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 1 (TIM2_CCER1) */
3486  #define _TIM2_CC1E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 1 output enable [0] (in _TIM2_CCER1)
3487  #define _TIM2_CC1P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 1 output polarity [0] (in _TIM2_CCER1)
3488  // reserved [3:2]
3489  #define _TIM2_CC2E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 2 output enable [0] (in _TIM2_CCER1)
3490  #define _TIM2_CC2P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 2 output polarity [0] (in _TIM2_CCER1)
3491  // reserved [7:6]
3492 
3493  /* TIM2 Capture/compare enable register 2 (TIM2_CCER2) */
3494  #define _TIM2_CC3E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 3 output enable [0] (in _TIM2_CCER2)
3495  #define _TIM2_CC3P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 Capture/compare 3 output polarity [0] (in _TIM2_CCER2)
3496  // reserved [7:2]
3497 
3498  /* TIM2 prescaler (TIM2_PSCR) */
3499  #define _TIM2_PSC ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< TIM2 prescaler [3:0] (in _TIM2_PSCR)
3500  #define _TIM2_PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM2 prescaler [0] (in _TIM2_PSCR)
3501  #define _TIM2_PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM2 prescaler [1] (in _TIM2_PSCR)
3502  #define _TIM2_PSC2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM2 prescaler [2] (in _TIM2_PSCR)
3503  #define _TIM2_PSC3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM2 prescaler [3] (in _TIM2_PSCR)
3504  // reserved [7:6]
3505 
3506 #endif // TIM2_AddressBase
3507 
3508 
3509 
3510 //------------------------
3511 // 16-Bit Timer 3 (TIM3)
3512 //------------------------
3513 #if defined(TIM3_AddressBase)
3514 
3515  /** @brief struct for controlling 16-Bit Timer 3 (TIM3) */
3516  typedef struct {
3517 
3518  /** @brief TIM3 Control register 1 (TIM3_CR1) */
3519  struct {
3520  _BITS CEN : 1; ///< Counter enable
3521  _BITS UDIS : 1; ///< Update disable
3522  _BITS URS : 1; ///< Update request source
3523  _BITS OPM : 1; ///< One-pulse mode
3524  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
3525  _BITS ARPE : 1; ///< Auto-reload preload enable
3526  } CR1;
3527 
3528 
3529  /** @brief TIM3 Interrupt enable register (TIM3_IER) */
3530  struct {
3531  _BITS UIE : 1; ///< Update interrupt enable
3532  _BITS CC1IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 interrupt enable
3533  _BITS CC2IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 interrupt enable
3534  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
3535  } IER;
3536 
3537 
3538  /** @brief TIM3 Status register 1 (TIM3_SR1) */
3539  struct {
3540  _BITS UIF : 1; ///< Update interrupt flag
3541  _BITS CC1IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 interrupt flag
3542  _BITS CC2IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 interrupt flag
3543  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
3544  } SR1;
3545 
3546 
3547  /** @brief TIM3 Status register 2 (TIM3_SR2) */
3548  struct {
3549  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
3550  _BITS CC1OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 overcapture flag
3551  _BITS CC2OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 overcapture flag
3552  _BITS res2 : 5; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
3553  } SR2;
3554 
3555 
3556  /** @brief TIM3 Event generation register (TIM3_EGR) */
3557  struct {
3558  _BITS UG : 1; ///< Update generation
3559  _BITS CC1G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 generation
3560  _BITS CC2G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 generation
3561  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
3562  } EGR;
3563 
3564 
3565  /** @brief TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM3_CCMR1) */
3566  union {
3567 
3568  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
3569  struct {
3570  _BITS CC1S : 2; ///< Compare 1 selection
3571  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
3572  _BITS OC1PE : 1; ///< Output compare 1 preload enable
3573  _BITS OC1M : 3; ///< Output compare 1 mode
3574  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
3575  } OUT;
3576 
3577  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
3578  struct {
3579  _BITS CC1S : 2; ///< Capture 1 selection
3580  _BITS IC1PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 1 prescaler
3581  _BITS IC1F : 4; ///< Input capture 1 filter
3582  } IN;
3583 
3584  } CCMR1;
3585 
3586 
3587  /** @brief TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM3_CCMR2) */
3588  union {
3589 
3590  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
3591  struct {
3592  _BITS CC2S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 2 selection
3593  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
3594  _BITS OC2PE : 1; ///< Output compare 2 preload enable
3595  _BITS OC2M : 3; ///< Output compare 2 mode
3596  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
3597  } OUT;
3598 
3599  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
3600  struct {
3601  _BITS CC2S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 2 selection
3602  _BITS IC2PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 2 prescaler
3603  _BITS IC2F : 4; ///< Input capture 2 filter
3604  } IN;
3605 
3606  } CCMR2;
3607 
3608 
3609  /** @brief TIM3 Capture/compare enable register 1 (TIM3_CCER1) */
3610  struct {
3611  _BITS CC1E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 output enable
3612  _BITS CC1P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 output polarity
3613  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
3614  _BITS CC2E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 output enable
3615  _BITS CC2P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 output polarity
3616  _BITS res2 : 2; ///< Reserved
3617  } CCER1;
3618 
3619 
3620  /** @brief TIM3 16-bit counter high byte (TIM3_CNTRH) */
3621  struct {
3622  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 16-bit counter [15:8]
3623  } CNTRH;
3624 
3625 
3626  /** @brief TIM3 16-bit counter low byte (TIM3_CNTRL) */
3627  struct {
3628  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 16-bit counter [7:0]
3629  } CNTRL;
3630 
3631 
3632  /** @brief TIM3 16-bit prescaler high byte (TIM3_PSCR) */
3633  struct {
3634  _BITS PSC : 4; ///< prescaler [3:0]
3635  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
3636  } PSCR;
3637 
3638 
3639  /** @brief TIM3 16-bit auto-reload value high byte (TIM3_ARRH) */
3640  struct {
3641  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< 16-bit auto-reload value [15:8]
3642  } ARRH;
3643 
3644 
3645  /** @brief TIM3 16-bit auto-reload value low byte (TIM3_ARRL) */
3646  struct {
3647  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< 16-bit auto-reload value [7:0]
3648  } ARRL;
3649 
3650 
3651  /** @brief TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte (TIM3_CCR1H) */
3652  struct {
3653  _BITS CCR1 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 1 [15:8]
3654  } CCR1H;
3655 
3656 
3657  /** @brief TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte (TIM3_CCR1L) */
3658  struct {
3659  _BITS CCR1 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 1 [7:0]
3660  } CCR1L;
3661 
3662 
3663  /** @brief TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte (TIM3_CCR2H) */
3664  struct {
3665  _BITS CCR2 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 2 [15:8]
3666  } CCR2H;
3667 
3668 
3669  /** @brief TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte (TIM3_CCR2L) */
3670  struct {
3671  _BITS CCR2 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 2 [7:0]
3672  } CCR2L;
3673 
3674  } TIM3_t;
3675 
3676  /* Pointer to TIM3 registers */
3677  #define _TIM3 _SFR(TIM3_t, TIM3_AddressBase) ///< TIM3 struct/bit access
3678  #define _TIM3_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x00) ///< TIM3 control register 1
3679  #define _TIM3_IER _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x01) ///< TIM3 interrupt enable register
3680  #define _TIM3_SR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x02) ///< TIM3 status register 1
3681  #define _TIM3_SR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x03) ///< TIM3 status register 2
3682  #define _TIM3_EGR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x04) ///< TIM3 Event generation register
3683  #define _TIM3_CCMR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x05) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 1
3684  #define _TIM3_CCMR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x06) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 2
3685  #define _TIM3_CCER1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x08) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare enable register 1
3686  #define _TIM3_CNTRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< TIM3 counter register high byte
3687  #define _TIM3_CNTRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x0B) ///< TIM3 counter register low byte
3688  #define _TIM3_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x0C) ///< TIM3 clock prescaler register
3689  #define _TIM3_ARRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x0D) ///< TIM3 auto-reload register high byte
3690  #define _TIM3_ARRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x0E) ///< TIM3 auto-reload register low byte
3691  #define _TIM3_CCR1H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x0F) ///< TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte
3692  #define _TIM3_CCR1L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x10) ///< TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte
3693  #define _TIM3_CCR2H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x11) ///< TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte
3694  #define _TIM3_CCR2L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM3_AddressBase+0x12) ///< TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte
3695 
3696  /* TIM3 Module Reset Values */
3697  #define _TIM3_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 control register 1 reset value
3698  #define _TIM3_IER_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 interrupt enable register reset value
3699  #define _TIM3_SR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 status register 1 reset value
3700  #define _TIM3_SR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 status register 2 reset value
3701  #define _TIM3_EGR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 Event generation register reset value
3702  #define _TIM3_CCMR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 1 reset value
3703  #define _TIM3_CCMR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 2 reset value
3704  #define _TIM3_CCER1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare enable register 1 reset value
3705  #define _TIM3_CNTRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 counter register high byte reset value
3706  #define _TIM3_CNTRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 counter register low byte reset value
3707  #define _TIM3_PSCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 clock prescaler register reset value
3708  #define _TIM3_ARRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM3 auto-reload register high byte reset value
3709  #define _TIM3_ARRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM3 auto-reload register low byte reset value
3710  #define _TIM3_CCR1H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte reset value
3711  #define _TIM3_CCR1L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte reset value
3712  #define _TIM3_CCR2H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte reset value
3713  #define _TIM3_CCR2L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM3 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte reset value
3714 
3715  /* TIM3 Control register (TIM3_CR1) */
3716  #define _TIM3_CEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM3 Counter enable [0] (in _TIM3_CR1)
3717  #define _TIM3_UDIS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM3 Update disable [0] (in _TIM3_CR1)
3718  #define _TIM3_URS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM3 Update request source [0] (in _TIM3_CR1)
3719  #define _TIM3_OPM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM3 One-pulse mode [0] (in _TIM3_CR1)
3720  // reserved [6:4]
3721  #define _TIM3_ARPE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM3 Auto-reload preload enable [0] (in _TIM3_CR1)
3722 
3723  /* TIM3 Interrupt enable (TIM3_IER) */
3724  #define _TIM3_UIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM3 Update interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM3_IER)
3725  #define _TIM3_CC1IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 1 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM3_IER)
3726  #define _TIM3_CC2IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 2 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM3_IER)
3727  // reserved [7:3]
3728 
3729  /* TIM3 Status register 1 (TIM3_SR1) */
3730  #define _TIM3_UIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM3 Update interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM3_SR1)
3731  #define _TIM3_CC1IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 1 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM3_SR1)
3732  #define _TIM3_CC2IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 2 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM3_SR1)
3733  // reserved [7:3]
3734 
3735  /* TIM3 Status register 2 (TIM3_SR2) */
3736  // reserved [0]
3737  #define _TIM3_CC1OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 1 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM3_SR2)
3738  #define _TIM3_CC2OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 2 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM3_SR2)
3739  // reserved [7:3]
3740 
3741  /* TIM3 Event generation register (TIM3_EGR) */
3742  #define _TIM3_UG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM3 Update generation [0] (in _TIM3_EGR)
3743  #define _TIM3_CC1G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 1 generation [0] (in _TIM3_EGR)
3744  #define _TIM3_CC2G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 2 generation [0] (in _TIM3_EGR)
3745  // reserved [7:3]
3746 
3747  /* TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM3_CCMR1). Output mode */
3748  #define _TIM3_CC1S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM3 Compare 1 selection [1:0] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3749  #define _TIM3_CC1S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM3 Compare 1 selection [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3750  #define _TIM3_CC1S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM3 Compare 1 selection [1] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3751  // reserved [2]
3752  #define _TIM3_OC1PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 preload enable [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3753  #define _TIM3_OC1M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 mode [2:0] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3754  #define _TIM3_OC1M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 mode [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3755  #define _TIM3_OC1M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 mode [1] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3756  #define _TIM3_OC1M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 mode [2] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3757  // reserved [7]
3758 
3759  /* TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM3_CCMR1). Input mode */
3760  // _TIM3_CC1S [1:0] defined above
3761  #define _TIM3_IC1PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM3 Input capture 1 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3762  #define _TIM3_IC1PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM3 Input capture 1 prescaler [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3763  #define _TIM3_IC1PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM3 Input capture 1 prescaler [1] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3764  #define _TIM3_IC1F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 mode [3:0] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3765  #define _TIM3_IC1F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 mode [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3766  #define _TIM3_IC1F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 mode [1] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3767  #define _TIM3_IC1F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 mode [2] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3768  #define _TIM3_IC1F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 1 mode [3] (in _TIM3_CCMR1)
3769 
3770  /* TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM3_CCMR2). Output mode */
3771  #define _TIM3_CC2S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM3 Compare 2 selection [1:0] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3772  #define _TIM3_CC2S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM3 Compare 2 selection [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3773  #define _TIM3_CC2S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM3 Compare 2 selection [1] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3774  // reserved [2]
3775  #define _TIM3_OC2PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 preload enable [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3776  #define _TIM3_OC2M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 mode [2:0] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3777  #define _TIM3_OC2M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 mode [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3778  #define _TIM3_OC2M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 mode [1] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3779  #define _TIM3_OC2M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 mode [2] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3780  // reserved [7]
3781 
3782  /* TIM3 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM3_CCMR2). Input mode */
3783  // _TIM3_CC2S [1:0] defined above
3784  #define _TIM3_IC2PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM3 Input capture 2 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3785  #define _TIM3_IC2PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM3 Input capture 2 prescaler [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3786  #define _TIM3_IC2PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM3 Input capture 2 prescaler [1] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3787  #define _TIM3_IC2F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 mode [3:0] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3788  #define _TIM3_IC2F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 mode [0] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3789  #define _TIM3_IC2F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 mode [1] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3790  #define _TIM3_IC2F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 mode [2] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3791  #define _TIM3_IC2F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM3 Output compare 2 mode [3] (in _TIM3_CCMR2)
3792 
3793  /* TIM3 Capture/compare enable register 1 (TIM3_CCER1) */
3794  #define _TIM3_CC1E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 1 output enable [0] (in _TIM3_CCER1)
3795  #define _TIM3_CC1P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 1 output polarity [0] (in _TIM3_CCER1)
3796  // reserved [3:2]
3797  #define _TIM3_CC2E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 2 output enable [0] (in _TIM3_CCER1)
3798  #define _TIM3_CC2P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM3 Capture/compare 2 output polarity [0] (in _TIM3_CCER1)
3799  // reserved [7:6]
3800 
3801  /* TIM3 prescaler (TIM3_PSCR) */
3802  #define _TIM3_PSC ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< TIM3 clock prescaler [3:0] (in _TIM3_PSCR)
3803  #define _TIM3_PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM3 clock prescaler [0] (in _TIM3_PSCR)
3804  #define _TIM3_PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM3 clock prescaler [1] (in _TIM3_PSCR)
3805  #define _TIM3_PSC2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM3 clock prescaler [2] (in _TIM3_PSCR)
3806  #define _TIM3_PSC3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM3 clock prescaler [3] (in _TIM3_PSCR)
3807  // reserved [7:6]
3808 
3809 #endif // TIM3_AddressBase
3810 
3811 
3812 
3813 //------------------------
3814 // 8-Bit Timer 4 (TIM4)
3815 //------------------------
3816 #if defined(TIM4_AddressBase)
3817 
3818  /** @brief struct for controlling 8-Bit Timer 4 (TIM4) */
3819  typedef struct {
3820 
3821  /** @brief TIM4 Control register (TIM4_CR) */
3822  struct {
3823  _BITS CEN : 1; ///< Counter enable
3824  _BITS UDIS : 1; ///< Update disable
3825  _BITS URS : 1; ///< Update request source
3826  _BITS OPM : 1; ///< One-pulse mode
3827  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
3828  _BITS ARPE : 1; ///< Auto-reload preload enable
3829  } CR;
3830 
3831 
3832  /** @brief Reserved registers on selected devices (2B) */
3833  #if defined(STM8S103) || defined(STM8S003) || defined(STM8S001)
3834  uint8_t res[2];
3835  #endif
3836 
3837 
3838  /** @brief TIM4 Interrupt enable (TIM4_IER) */
3839  struct {
3840  _BITS UIE : 1; ///< Update interrupt enable
3841  _BITS res : 7; ///< Reserved
3842  } IER;
3843 
3844 
3845  /** @brief TIM4 Status register (TIM4_SR) */
3846  struct {
3847  _BITS UIF : 1; ///< Update interrupt flag
3848  _BITS res : 7; ///< Reserved
3849  } SR;
3850 
3851 
3852  /** @brief TIM4 Event Generation (TIM4_EGR) */
3853  struct {
3854  _BITS UG : 1; ///< Update generation
3855  _BITS res : 7; ///< Reserved
3856  } EGR;
3857 
3858 
3859  /** @brief TIM4 8-bit counter register (TIM4_CNTR) */
3860  struct {
3861  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 8-bit counter
3862  } CNTR;
3863 
3864  /** @brief TIM4 clock prescaler (TIM4_PSCR) */
3865  struct {
3866  _BITS PSC : 3; ///< clock prescaler
3867  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
3868  } PSCR;
3869 
3870 
3871  /** @brief TIM4 8-bit auto-reload register (TIM4_ARR) */
3872  struct {
3873  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< auto-reload value
3874  } ARR;
3875 
3876  } TIM4_t;
3877 
3878  /* Pointer to TIM4 registers */
3879  #define _TIM4 _SFR(TIM4_t, TIM4_AddressBase) ///< TIM4 struct/bit access
3880  #define _TIM4_CR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x00) ///< TIM4 control register
3881  #if defined(STM8S103) || defined(STM8S003) || defined(STM8S001) // 2B offset for selected devices
3882  // 2B reserved
3883  #define _TIM4_IER _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x03) ///< TIM4 interrupt enable register
3884  #define _TIM4_SR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x04) ///< TIM4 status register
3885  #define _TIM4_EGR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x05) ///< TIM4 event generation register
3886  #define _TIM4_CNTR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x06) ///< TIM4 counter register
3887  #define _TIM4_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x07) ///< TIM4 clock prescaler register
3888  #define _TIM4_ARR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x08) ///< TIM4 auto-reload register
3889  #else
3890  #define _TIM4_IER _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x01) ///< TIM4 interrupt enable register
3891  #define _TIM4_SR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x02) ///< TIM4 status register
3892  #define _TIM4_EGR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x03) ///< TIM4 event generation register
3893  #define _TIM4_CNTR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x04) ///< TIM4 counter register
3894  #define _TIM4_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x05) ///< TIM4 clock prescaler register
3895  #define _TIM4_ARR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM4_AddressBase+0x06) ///< TIM4 auto-reload register
3896  #endif
3897 
3898  /* TIM4 Module Reset Values */
3899  #define _TIM4_CR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM4 control register reset value
3900  #define _TIM4_IER_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM4 interrupt enable register reset value
3901  #define _TIM4_SR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM4 status register reset value
3902  #define _TIM4_EGR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM4 event generation register reset value
3903  #define _TIM4_CNTR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM4 counter register reset value
3904  #define _TIM4_PSCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM4 clock prescaler register reset value
3905  #define _TIM4_ARR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM4 auto-reload register reset value
3906 
3907  /* TIM4 Control register (TIM4_CR) */
3908  #define _TIM4_CEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM4 Counter enable [0] (in _TIM4_CR)
3909  #define _TIM4_UDIS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM4 Update disable [0] (in _TIM4_CR)
3910  #define _TIM4_URS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM4 Update request source [0] (in _TIM4_CR)
3911  #define _TIM4_OPM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM4 One-pulse mode [0] (in _TIM4_CR)
3912  // reserved [6:4]
3913  #define _TIM4_ARPE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM4 Auto-reload preload enable [0] (in _TIM4_CR)
3914 
3915  /* TIM4 Interrupt enable (TIM4_IER) */
3916  #define _TIM4_UIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM4 Update interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM4_IER)
3917  // reserved [7:1]
3918 
3919  /* TIM4 Status register (TIM4_SR) */
3920  #define _TIM4_UIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM4 Update interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM4_SR)
3921  // reserved [7:1]
3922 
3923  /* TIM4 Event generation register (TIM4_EGR) */
3924  #define _TIM4_UG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM4 Update generation [0] (in _TIM4_EGR)
3925  // reserved [7:1]
3926 
3927  /* TIM4 Prescaler register (TIM4_PSCR) */
3928  #define _TIM4_PSC ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 0)) ///< TIM4 clock prescaler [2:0] (in _TIM4_PSCR)
3929  #define _TIM4_PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM4 clock prescaler [0] (in _TIM4_PSCR)
3930  #define _TIM4_PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM4 clock prescaler [1] (in _TIM4_PSCR)
3931  #define _TIM4_PSC2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM4 clock prescaler [2] (in _TIM4_PSCR)
3932  // reserved [7:3]
3933 
3934 #endif // TIM4_AddressBase
3935 
3936 
3937 
3938 //------------------------
3939 // 16-Bit Timer 5 (TIM5)
3940 //------------------------
3941 #if defined(TIM5_AddressBase)
3942 
3943  /** @brief struct for controlling 16-Bit Timer 5 (TIM5) */
3944  typedef struct {
3945 
3946  /** @brief TIM5 Control register 1 (TIM5_CR1) */
3947  struct {
3948  _BITS CEN : 1; ///< Counter enable
3949  _BITS UDIS : 1; ///< Update disable
3950  _BITS URS : 1; ///< Update request source
3951  _BITS OPM : 1; ///< One-pulse mode
3952  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
3953  _BITS ARPE : 1; ///< Auto-reload preload enable
3954  } CR1;
3955 
3956 
3957  /** @brief TIM5 Control register 2 (TIM5_CR2) */
3958  struct {
3959  _BITS CCPC : 1; ///< Capture/compare preloaded control
3960  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, forced by hardware to 0
3961  _BITS COMS : 1; ///< Capture/compare control update selection
3962  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
3963  _BITS MMS : 3; ///< Master mode selection
3964  _BITS res3 : 1; ///< Reserved
3965  } CR2;
3966 
3967 
3968  /** @brief Slave mode control register (TIM5_SMCR) */
3969  struct {
3970  _BITS SMS : 3; ///< Clock/trigger/slave mode selection
3971  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
3972  _BITS TS : 3; ///< Trigger selection
3973  _BITS MSM : 1; ///< Master/slave mode
3974  } SMCR;
3975 
3976 
3977  /** @brief TIM5 Interrupt enable register (TIM5_IER) */
3978  struct {
3979  _BITS UIE : 1; ///< Update interrupt enable
3980  _BITS CC1IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 interrupt enable
3981  _BITS CC2IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 interrupt enable
3982  _BITS CC3IE : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 interrupt enable
3983  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
3984  _BITS TIE : 1; ///< Trigger interrupt enable
3985  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
3986  } IER;
3987 
3988 
3989  /** @brief TIM5 Status register 1 (TIM5_SR1) */
3990  struct {
3991  _BITS UIF : 1; ///< Update interrupt flag
3992  _BITS CC1IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 interrupt flag
3993  _BITS CC2IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 interrupt flag
3994  _BITS CC3IF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 interrupt flag
3995  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
3996  _BITS TIF : 1; ///< Trigger interrupt flag
3997  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
3998  } SR1;
3999 
4000 
4001  /** @brief TIM5 Status register 2 (TIM5_SR2) */
4002  struct {
4003  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
4004  _BITS CC1OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 overcapture flag
4005  _BITS CC2OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 overcapture flag
4006  _BITS CC3OF : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 overcapture flag
4007  _BITS res2 : 4; ///< Reserved
4008  } SR2;
4009 
4010 
4011  /** @brief TIM5 Event generation register (TIM5_EGR) */
4012  struct {
4013  _BITS UG : 1; ///< Update generation
4014  _BITS CC1G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 generation
4015  _BITS CC2G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 generation
4016  _BITS CC3G : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 generation
4017  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
4018  _BITS TG : 1; ///< Trigger generation
4019  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
4020  } EGR;
4021 
4022 
4023  /** @brief TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM5_CCMR1) */
4024  union {
4025 
4026  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
4027  struct {
4028  _BITS CC1S : 2; ///< Compare 1 selection
4029  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
4030  _BITS OC1PE : 1; ///< Output compare 1 preload enable
4031  _BITS OC1M : 3; ///< Output compare 1 mode
4032  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
4033  } OUT;
4034 
4035  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
4036  struct {
4037  _BITS CC1S : 2; ///< Capture 1 selection
4038  _BITS IC1PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 1 prescaler
4039  _BITS IC1F : 4; ///< Input capture 1 filter
4040  } IN;
4041 
4042  } CCMR1;
4043 
4044 
4045  /** @brief TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM5_CCMR2) */
4046  union {
4047 
4048  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
4049  struct {
4050  _BITS CC2S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 2 selection
4051  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
4052  _BITS OC2PE : 1; ///< Output compare 2 preload enable
4053  _BITS OC2M : 3; ///< Output compare 2 mode
4054  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
4055  } OUT;
4056 
4057  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
4058  struct {
4059  _BITS CC2S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 2 selection
4060  _BITS IC2PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 2 prescaler
4061  _BITS IC2F : 4; ///< Input capture 2 filter
4062  } IN;
4063 
4064  } CCMR2;
4065 
4066 
4067  /** @brief TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 3 (TIM5_CCMR3) */
4068  union {
4069 
4070  /** @brief bitwise access to register (output mode) */
4071  struct {
4072  _BITS CC3S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 3 selection
4073  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
4074  _BITS OC3PE : 1; ///< Output compare 3 preload enable
4075  _BITS OC3M : 3; ///< Output compare 3 mode
4076  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
4077  } OUT;
4078 
4079  /** @brief bitwise access to register (input mode) */
4080  struct {
4081  _BITS CC3S : 2; ///< Capture/compare 3 selection
4082  _BITS IC3PSC : 2; ///< Input capture 3 prescaler
4083  _BITS IC3F : 4; ///< Input capture 3 filter
4084  } IN;
4085 
4086  } CCMR3;
4087 
4088 
4089  /** @brief TIM5 Capture/compare enable register 1 (TIM5_CCER1) */
4090  struct {
4091  _BITS CC1E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 output enable
4092  _BITS CC1P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 1 output polarity
4093  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
4094  _BITS CC2E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 output enable
4095  _BITS CC2P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 2 output polarity
4096  _BITS res2 : 2; ///< Reserved
4097  } CCER1;
4098 
4099 
4100  /** @brief TIM5 Capture/compare enable register 2 (TIM5_CCER2) */
4101  struct {
4102  _BITS CC3E : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 output enable
4103  _BITS CC3P : 1; ///< Capture/compare 3 output polarity
4104  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved
4105  } CCER2;
4106 
4107 
4108  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit counter high byte (TIM5_CNTRH) */
4109  struct {
4110  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 16-bit counter [15:8]
4111  } CNTRH;
4112 
4113 
4114  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit counter low byte (TIM5_CNTRL) */
4115  struct {
4116  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 16-bit counter [7:0]
4117  } CNTRL;
4118 
4119 
4120  /** @brief TIM5 prescaler (TIM5_PSCR) */
4121  struct {
4122  _BITS PSC : 4; ///< clock prescaler
4123  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
4124  } PSCR;
4125 
4126 
4127  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit auto-reload value high byte (TIM5_ARRH) */
4128  struct {
4129  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< 16-bit auto-reload value [15:8]
4130  } ARRH;
4131 
4132 
4133  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit auto-reload value low byte (TIM5_ARRL) */
4134  struct {
4135  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< 16-bit auto-reload value [7:0]
4136  } ARRL;
4137 
4138 
4139  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte (TIM5_CCR1H) */
4140  struct {
4141  _BITS CCR1 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 1 [15:8]
4142  } CCR1H;
4143 
4144 
4145  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte (TIM5_CCR1L) */
4146  struct {
4147  _BITS CCR1 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 1 [7:0]
4148  } CCR1L;
4149 
4150 
4151  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte (TIM5_CCR2H) */
4152  struct {
4153  _BITS CCR2 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 2 [15:8]
4154  } CCR2H;
4155 
4156 
4157  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte (TIM5_CCR2L) */
4158  struct {
4159  _BITS CCR2 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 2 [7:0]
4160  } CCR2L;
4161 
4162 
4163  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte (TIM5_CCR3H) */
4164  struct {
4165  _BITS CCR3 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 3 [15:8]
4166  } CCR3H;
4167 
4168 
4169  /** @brief TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte (TIM5_CCR3L) */
4170  struct {
4171  _BITS CCR3 : 8; ///< 16-bit capture/compare value 3 [7:0]
4172  } CCR3L;
4173 
4174  } TIM5_t;
4175 
4176  /* Pointer to TIM5 registers */
4177  #define _TIM5 _SFR(TIM5_t, TIM5_AddressBase) ///< TIM5 struct/bit access
4178  #define _TIM5_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x00) ///< TIM5 control register 1
4179  #define _TIM5_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x01) ///< TIM5 control register 2
4180  #define _TIM5_SMCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x02) ///< TIM5 Slave mode control register
4181  #define _TIM5_IER _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x03) ///< TIM5 interrupt enable register
4182  #define _TIM5_SR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x04) ///< TIM5 status register 1
4183  #define _TIM5_SR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x05) ///< TIM5 status register 2
4184  #define _TIM5_EGR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x06) ///< TIM5 Event generation register
4185  #define _TIM5_CCMR1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x07) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 1
4186  #define _TIM5_CCMR2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x08) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 2
4187  #define _TIM5_CCMR3 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x09) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 3
4188  #define _TIM5_CCER1 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare enable register 1
4189  #define _TIM5_CCER2 _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x0B) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare enable register 2
4190  #define _TIM5_CNTRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x0C) ///< TIM5 counter register high byte
4191  #define _TIM5_CNTRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x0D) ///< TIM5 counter register low byte
4192  #define _TIM5_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x0E) ///< TIM5 clock prescaler register
4193  #define _TIM5_ARRH _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x0F) ///< TIM5 auto-reload register high byte
4194  #define _TIM5_ARRL _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x10) ///< TIM5 auto-reload register low byte
4195  #define _TIM5_CCR1H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x11) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte
4196  #define _TIM5_CCR1L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x12) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte
4197  #define _TIM5_CCR2H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x13) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte
4198  #define _TIM5_CCR2L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x14) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte
4199  #define _TIM5_CCR3H _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x15) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte
4200  #define _TIM5_CCR3L _SFR(uint8_t, TIM5_AddressBase+0x16) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte
4201 
4202  /* TIM5 Module Reset Values */
4203  #define _TIM5_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 control register 1 reset value
4204  #define _TIM5_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 control register 2 reset value
4205  #define _TIM5_SMCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 Slave mode control register reset value
4206  #define _TIM5_IER_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 interrupt enable register reset value
4207  #define _TIM5_SR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 status register 1 reset value
4208  #define _TIM5_SR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 status register 2 reset value
4209  #define _TIM5_EGR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 Event generation register reset value
4210  #define _TIM5_CCMR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 1 reset value
4211  #define _TIM5_CCMR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 2 reset value
4212  #define _TIM5_CCMR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 3 reset value
4213  #define _TIM5_CCER1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare enable register 1 reset value
4214  #define _TIM5_CCER2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare enable register 2 reset value
4215  #define _TIM5_CNTRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 counter register high byte reset value
4216  #define _TIM5_CNTRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 counter register low byte reset value
4217  #define _TIM5_PSCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 clock prescaler register reset value
4218  #define _TIM5_ARRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM5 auto-reload register high byte reset value
4219  #define _TIM5_ARRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM5 auto-reload register low byte reset value
4220  #define _TIM5_CCR1H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 1 high byte reset value
4221  #define _TIM5_CCR1L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 1 low byte reset value
4222  #define _TIM5_CCR2H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 2 high byte reset value
4223  #define _TIM5_CCR2L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 2 low byte reset value
4224  #define _TIM5_CCR3H_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 3 high byte reset value
4225  #define _TIM5_CCR3L_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 16-bit capture/compare value 3 low byte reset value
4226 
4227  /* TIM5 Control register (TIM5_CR1) */
4228  #define _TIM5_CEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Counter enable [0] (in _TIM5_CR1)
4229  #define _TIM5_UDIS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Update disable [0] (in _TIM5_CR1)
4230  #define _TIM5_URS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Update request source [0] (in _TIM5_CR1)
4231  #define _TIM5_OPM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 One-pulse mode [0] (in _TIM5_CR1)
4232  // reserved [6:4]
4233  #define _TIM5_ARPE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM5 Auto-reload preload enable [0] (in _TIM5_CR1)
4234 
4235  /* TIM5 Control register (TIM5_CR2) */
4236  #define _TIM5_CCPC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare preloaded control [0] (in _TIM5_CR2)
4237  // reserved [1]
4238  #define _TIM5_COMS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare control update selection [0] (in _TIM5_CR2)
4239  // reserved [3]
4240  #define _TIM5_MMS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Master mode selection [2:0] (in _TIM5_CR2)
4241  #define _TIM5_MMS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Master mode selection [0] (in _TIM5_CR2)
4242  #define _TIM5_MMS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM5 Master mode selection [1] (in _TIM5_CR2)
4243  #define _TIM5_MMS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Master mode selection [2] (in _TIM5_CR2)
4244  // reserved [7]
4245 
4246  /* TIM5 Slave mode control register (TIM5_SMCR) */
4247  #define _TIM5_SMS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [2:0] (in _TIM5_SMCR)
4248  #define _TIM5_SMS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [0] (in _TIM5_SMCR)
4249  #define _TIM5_SMS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [1] (in _TIM5_SMCR)
4250  #define _TIM5_SMS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [2] (in _TIM5_SMCR)
4251  // reserved [3]
4252  #define _TIM5_TS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Trigger selection [2:0] (in _TIM5_SMCR)
4253  #define _TIM5_TS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Trigger selection [0] (in _TIM5_SMCR)
4254  #define _TIM5_TS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM5 Trigger selection [1] (in _TIM5_SMCR)
4255  #define _TIM5_TS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Trigger selection [2] (in _TIM5_SMCR)
4256  #define _TIM5_MSM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM5 Master/slave mode [0] (in _TIM5_SMCR)
4257 
4258  /* TIM5 Interrupt enable (TIM5_IER) */
4259  #define _TIM5_UIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Update interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM5_IER)
4260  #define _TIM5_CC1IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 1 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM5_IER)
4261  #define _TIM5_CC2IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 2 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM5_IER)
4262  #define _TIM5_CC3IE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 3 interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM5_IER)
4263  // reserved [5:4]
4264  #define _TIM5_TIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Trigger interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM5_IER)
4265  // reserved [7]
4266 
4267  /* TIM5 Status register 1 (TIM5_SR1) */
4268  #define _TIM5_UIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Update interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM5_SR1)
4269  #define _TIM5_CC1IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 1 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM5_SR1)
4270  #define _TIM5_CC2IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 2 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM5_SR1)
4271  #define _TIM5_CC3IF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 3 interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM5_SR1)
4272  // reserved [5:4]
4273  #define _TIM5_TIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Trigger interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM5_SR1)
4274  // reserved [7]
4275 
4276  /* TIM5 Status register 2 (TIM5_SR2) */
4277  // reserved [0]
4278  #define _TIM5_CC1OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 1 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM5_SR2)
4279  #define _TIM5_CC2OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 2 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM5_SR2)
4280  #define _TIM5_CC3OF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 3 overcapture flag [0] (in _TIM5_SR2)
4281  // reserved [7:4]
4282 
4283  /* TIM5 Event generation register (TIM5_EGR) */
4284  #define _TIM5_UG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Update generation [0] (in _TIM5_EGR)
4285  #define _TIM5_CC1G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 1 generation [0] (in _TIM5_EGR)
4286  #define _TIM5_CC2G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 2 generation [0] (in _TIM5_EGR)
4287  #define _TIM5_CC3G ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 3 generation [0] (in _TIM5_EGR)
4288  // reserved [5:4]
4289  #define _TIM5_TG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Trigger generation [0] (in _TIM5_EGR)
4290  // reserved [7]
4291 
4292  /* TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM5_CCMR1). Output mode */
4293  #define _TIM5_CC1S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Compare 1 selection [1:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4294  #define _TIM5_CC1S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Compare 1 selection [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4295  #define _TIM5_CC1S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Compare 1 selection [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4296  // reserved [2]
4297  #define _TIM5_OC1PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 1 preload enable [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4298  #define _TIM5_OC1M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 1 mode [2:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4299  #define _TIM5_OC1M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 1 mode [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4300  #define _TIM5_OC1M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 1 mode [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4301  #define _TIM5_OC1M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 1 mode [2] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4302  // reserved [7]
4303 
4304  /* TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 1 (TIM5_CCMR1). Input mode */
4305  // _TIM5_CC1S [1:0] defined above
4306  #define _TIM5_IC1PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 1 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4307  #define _TIM5_IC1PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 1 prescaler [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4308  #define _TIM5_IC1PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 1 prescaler [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4309  #define _TIM5_IC1F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 1 mode [3:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4310  #define _TIM5_IC1F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 1 filter [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4311  #define _TIM5_IC1F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 1 filter [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4312  #define _TIM5_IC1F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 1 filter [2] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4313  #define _TIM5_IC1F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 1 filter [3] (in _TIM5_CCMR1)
4314 
4315  /* TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM5_CCMR2). Output mode */
4316  #define _TIM5_CC2S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Compare 2 selection [1:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4317  #define _TIM5_CC2S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Compare 2 selection [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4318  #define _TIM5_CC2S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Compare 2 selection [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4319  // reserved [2]
4320  #define _TIM5_OC2PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 2 preload enable [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4321  #define _TIM5_OC2M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 2 mode [2:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4322  #define _TIM5_OC2M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 2 mode [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4323  #define _TIM5_OC2M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 2 mode [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4324  #define _TIM5_OC2M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 2 mode [2] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4325  // reserved [7]
4326 
4327  /* TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 2 (TIM5_CCMR2). Input mode */
4328  // _TIM5_CC2S [1:0] defined above
4329  #define _TIM5_IC2PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 2 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4330  #define _TIM5_IC2PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 2 prescaler [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4331  #define _TIM5_IC2PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 2 prescaler [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4332  #define _TIM5_IC2F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 2 mode [3:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4333  #define _TIM5_IC2F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 2 filter [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4334  #define _TIM5_IC2F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 2 filter [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4335  #define _TIM5_IC2F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 2 filter [2] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4336  #define _TIM5_IC2F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 2 filter [3] (in _TIM5_CCMR2)
4337 
4338  /* TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 3 (TIM5_CCMR3). Output mode */
4339  #define _TIM5_CC3S ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Compare 3 selection [1:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4340  #define _TIM5_CC3S0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Compare 3 selection [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4341  #define _TIM5_CC3S1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Compare 3 selection [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4342  // reserved [2]
4343  #define _TIM5_OC3PE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 3 preload enable [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4344  #define _TIM5_OC3M ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 3 mode [2:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4345  #define _TIM5_OC3M0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 3 mode [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4346  #define _TIM5_OC3M1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 3 mode [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4347  #define _TIM5_OC3M2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 3 mode [2] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4348  // reserved [7]
4349 
4350  /* TIM5 Capture/compare mode register 3 (TIM5_CCMR3). Input mode */
4351  // _TIM5_CC3S [1:0] defined above
4352  #define _TIM5_IC3PSC ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 3 prescaler [1:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4353  #define _TIM5_IC3PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 3 prescaler [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4354  #define _TIM5_IC3PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 3 prescaler [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4355  #define _TIM5_IC3F ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 4)) ///< TIM5 Output compare 3 mode [3:0] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4356  #define _TIM5_IC3F0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 3 filter [0] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4357  #define _TIM5_IC3F1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 3 filter [1] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4358  #define _TIM5_IC3F2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 3 filter [2] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4359  #define _TIM5_IC3F3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM5 Input capture 3 filter [3] (in _TIM5_CCMR3)
4360 
4361  /* TIM5 Capture/compare enable register 1 (TIM5_CCER1) */
4362  #define _TIM5_CC1E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 1 output enable [0] (in _TIM5_CCER1)
4363  #define _TIM5_CC1P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 1 output polarity [0] (in _TIM5_CCER1)
4364  // reserved [3:2]
4365  #define _TIM5_CC2E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 2 output enable [0] (in _TIM5_CCER1)
4366  #define _TIM5_CC2P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 2 output polarity [0] (in _TIM5_CCER1)
4367  // reserved [7:6]
4368 
4369  /* TIM5 Capture/compare enable register 2 (TIM5_CCER2) */
4370  #define _TIM5_CC3E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 3 output enable [0] (in _TIM5_CCER2)
4371  #define _TIM5_CC3P ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 Capture/compare 3 output polarity [0] (in _TIM5_CCER2)
4372  // reserved [7:2]
4373 
4374  /* TIM5 prescaler (TIM5_PSCR) */
4375  #define _TIM5_PSC ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< TIM5 clock prescaler [3:0] (in _TIM5_PSCR)
4376  #define _TIM5_PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM5 clock prescaler [0] (in _TIM5_PSCR)
4377  #define _TIM5_PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM5 clock prescaler [1] (in _TIM5_PSCR)
4378  #define _TIM5_PSC2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM5 clock prescaler [2] (in _TIM5_PSCR)
4379  #define _TIM5_PSC3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM5 clock prescaler [3] (in _TIM5_PSCR)
4380  // reserved [7:6]
4381 
4382 #endif // TIM5_AddressBase
4383 
4384 
4385 
4386 //------------------------
4387 // 8-Bit Timer 6 (TIM6)
4388 //------------------------
4389 #if defined(TIM6_AddressBase)
4390 
4391  /** @brief struct for controlling 8-Bit Timer 6 (TIM6) */
4392  typedef struct {
4393 
4394  /** @brief TIM6 Control register (TIM6_CR1) */
4395  struct {
4396  _BITS CEN : 1; ///< Counter enable
4397  _BITS UDIS : 1; ///< Update disable
4398  _BITS URS : 1; ///< Update request source
4399  _BITS OPM : 1; ///< One-pulse mode
4400  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
4401  _BITS ARPE : 1; ///< Auto-reload preload enable
4402  } CR1;
4403 
4404 
4405  /** @brief TIM6 Control register (TIM6_CR2) */
4406  struct {
4407  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
4408  _BITS MMS : 3; ///< Master mode selection
4409  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
4410  } CR2;
4411 
4412 
4413  /** @brief Slave mode control register (TIM6_SMCR) */
4414  struct {
4415  _BITS SMS : 3; ///< Clock/trigger/slave mode selection
4416  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
4417  _BITS TS : 3; ///< Trigger selection
4418  _BITS MSM : 1; ///< Master/slave mode #define _TIM5_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM5 control register 1 reset value
4419 
4420  } SMCR;
4421 
4422 
4423  /** @brief TIM6 Interrupt enable (TIM6_IER) */
4424  struct {
4425  _BITS UIE : 1; ///< Update interrupt enable
4426  _BITS res : 7; ///< Reserved
4427  } IER;
4428 
4429 
4430  /** @brief TIM6 Status register (TIM6_SR) */
4431  struct {
4432  _BITS UIF : 1; ///< Update interrupt flag
4433  _BITS res : 7; ///< Reserved
4434  } SR;
4435 
4436 
4437  /** @brief TIM6 Event Generation (TIM6_EGR) */
4438  struct {
4439  _BITS UG : 1; ///< Update generation
4440  _BITS res : 7; ///< Reserved
4441  } EGR;
4442 
4443 
4444  /** @brief TIM6 8-bit counter register (TIM6_CNTR) */
4445  struct {
4446  _BITS CNT : 8; ///< 8-bit counter
4447  } CNTR;
4448 
4449  /** @brief TIM6 clock prescaler (TIM6_PSCR) */
4450  struct {
4451  _BITS PSC : 3; ///< clock prescaler
4452  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
4453  } PSCR;
4454 
4455 
4456  /** @brief TIM6 8-bit auto-reload register (TIM6_ARR) */
4457  struct {
4458  _BITS ARR : 8; ///< auto-reload value
4459  } ARR;
4460 
4461  } TIM6_t;
4462 
4463  /* Pointer to TIM6 registers */
4464  #define _TIM6 _SFR(TIM6_t, TIM6_AddressBase) ///< TIM6 struct/bit access
4465  #define _TIM6_CR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM6_AddressBase+0x00) ///< TIM6 control register
4466  #define _TIM6_IER _SFR(uint8_t, TIM6_AddressBase+0x01) ///< TIM6 interrupt enable register
4467  #define _TIM6_SR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM6_AddressBase+0x02) ///< TIM6 status register
4468  #define _TIM6_EGR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM6_AddressBase+0x03) ///< TIM6 event generation register
4469  #define _TIM6_CNTR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM6_AddressBase+0x04) ///< TIM6 counter register
4470  #define _TIM6_PSCR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM6_AddressBase+0x05) ///< TIM6 clock prescaler register
4471  #define _TIM6_ARR _SFR(uint8_t, TIM6_AddressBase+0x06) ///< TIM6 auto-reload register
4472 
4473  /* TIM6 Module Reset Values */
4474  #define _TIM6_CR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM6 control register reset value
