4475  #define _TIM6_IER_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM6 interrupt enable register reset value
4476  #define _TIM6_SR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM6 status register reset value
4477  #define _TIM6_EGR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM6 event generation register reset value
4478  #define _TIM6_CNTR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM6 counter register reset value
4479  #define _TIM6_PSCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< TIM6 clock prescaler register reset value
4480  #define _TIM6_ARR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< TIM6 auto-reload register reset value
4481 
4482  /* TIM6 Control register (TIM6_CR1) */
4483  #define _TIM6_CEN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM6 Counter enable [0] (in _TIM6_CR1)
4484  #define _TIM6_UDIS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM6 Update disable [0] (in _TIM6_CR1)
4485  #define _TIM6_URS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM6 Update request source [0] (in _TIM6_CR1)
4486  #define _TIM6_OPM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< TIM6 One-pulse mode [0] (in _TIM6_CR1)
4487  // reserved [6:4]
4488  #define _TIM6_ARPE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< TIM6 Auto-reload preload enable [0] (in _TIM6_CR1)
4489 
4490  /* TIM6 Control register (TIM6_CR2) */
4491  // reserved [3:0]
4492  #define _TIM6_MMS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM6 Master mode selection [2:0] (in _TIM6_CR2)
4493  #define _TIM6_MMS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM6 Master mode selection [0] (in _TIM6_CR2)
4494  #define _TIM6_MMS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM6 Master mode selection [1] (in _TIM6_CR2)
4495  #define _TIM6_MMS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM6 Master mode selection [2] (in _TIM6_CR2)
4496  // reserved [7]
4497 
4498  /* Slave mode control register (TIM6_SMCR) */
4499  #define _TIM6_SMS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 0)) ///< TIM6 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [2:0] (in _TIM6_SMCR)
4500  #define _TIM6_SMS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM6 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [0] (in _TIM6_SMCR)
4501  #define _TIM6_SMS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM6 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [1] (in _TIM6_SMCR)
4502  #define _TIM6_SMS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM6 Clock/trigger/slave mode selection [2] (in _TIM6_SMCR)
4503  // reserved [3]
4504  #define _TIM6_TS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< TIM6 Trigger selection [2:0] (in _TIM6_SMCR)
4505  #define _TIM6_TS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< TIM6 Trigger selection [0] (in _TIM6_SMCR)
4506  #define _TIM6_TS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< TIM6 Trigger selection [1] (in _TIM6_SMCR)
4507  #define _TIM6_TS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< TIM6 Trigger selection [2] (in _TIM6_SMCR)
4508  // reserved [7]
4509 
4510  /* TIM6 Interrupt enable (TIM6_IER) */
4511  #define _TIM6_UIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM6 Update interrupt enable [0] (in _TIM6_IER)
4512  // reserved [7:1]
4513 
4514  /* TIM6 Status register (TIM6_SR) */
4515  #define _TIM6_UIF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM6 Update interrupt flag [0] (in _TIM6_SR)
4516  // reserved [7:1]
4517 
4518  /* TIM6 Event generation register (TIM6_EGR) */
4519  #define _TIM6_UG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM6 Update generation [0] (in _TIM6_EGR)
4520  // reserved [7:1]
4521 
4522  /* TIM6 Prescaler register (TIM6_PSCR) */
4523  #define _TIM6_PSC ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 0)) ///< TIM6 clock prescaler [2:0] (in _TIM6_PSCR)
4524  #define _TIM6_PSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< TIM6 clock prescaler [0] (in _TIM6_PSCR)
4525  #define _TIM6_PSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< TIM6 clock prescaler [1] (in _TIM6_PSCR)
4526  #define _TIM6_PSC2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< TIM6 clock prescaler [2] (in _TIM6_PSCR)
4527  // reserved [7:3]
4528 
4529 #endif // TIM6_AddressBase
4530 
4531 
4532 
4533 //------------------------
4534 // Analog Digital Converter 1 (ADC1)
4535 //------------------------
4536 #if defined(ADC1_AddressBase)
4537 
4538  /** @brief struct containing Analog Digital Converter 1 (ADC1) */
4539  typedef struct {
4540 
4541  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 0 (ADC1_DB0RH) */
4542  struct {
4543  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 0 value [9:8]
4544  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4545  } DB0RH;
4546 
4547  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 0 (ADC1_DB0RL) */
4548  struct {
4549  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 0 value (low)
4550  } DB0RL;
4551 
4552 
4553  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 1 (ADC1_DB1RH) */
4554  struct {
4555  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 1 value [9:8]
4556  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4557  } DB1RH;
4558 
4559 
4560  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 1 (ADC1_DB1RL) */
4561  struct {
4562  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 1 value (low)
4563  } DB1RL;
4564 
4565 
4566  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 2 (ADC1_DB2RH) */
4567  struct {
4568  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 2 value [9:8]
4569  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4570  } DB2RH;
4571 
4572 
4573  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 2 (ADC1_DB2RL) */
4574  struct {
4575  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 2 value (low)
4576  } DB2RL;
4577 
4578 
4579  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 3 (ADC1_DB3RH) */
4580  struct {
4581  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 3 value [9:8]
4582  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4583  } DB3RH;
4584 
4585 
4586  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 3 (ADC1_DB3RL) */
4587  struct {
4588  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 3 value (low)
4589  } DB3RL;
4590 
4591 
4592  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 4 (ADC1_DB4RH) */
4593  struct {
4594  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 4 value [9:8]
4595  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4596  } DB4RH;
4597 
4598 
4599  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 4 (ADC1_DB4RL) */
4600  struct {
4601  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 4 value (low)
4602  } DB4RL;
4603 
4604 
4605  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 5 (ADC1_DB5RH) */
4606  struct {
4607  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 5 value [9:8]
4608  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4609  } DB5RH;
4610 
4611 
4612  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 5 (ADC1_DB5RL) */
4613  struct {
4614  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 5 value (low)
4615  } DB5RL;
4616 
4617 
4618  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 6 (ADC1_DB6RH) */
4619  struct {
4620  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 6 value [9:8]
4621  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4622  } DB6RH;
4623 
4624 
4625  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 6 (ADC1_DB6RL) */
4626  struct {
4627  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 6 value (low)
4628  } DB6RL;
4629 
4630 
4631  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 7 (ADC1_DB7RH) */
4632  struct {
4633  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 7 value [9:8]
4634  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4635  } DB7RH;
4636 
4637 
4638  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 7 (ADC1_DB7RL) */
4639  struct {
4640  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 7 value (low)
4641  } DB7RL;
4642 
4643 
4644  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 8 (ADC1_DB8RH) */
4645  struct {
4646  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 8 value [9:8]
4647  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4648  } DB8RH;
4649 
4650 
4651  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 8 (ADC1_DB8RL) */
4652  struct {
4653  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 8 value (low)
4654  } DB8RL;
4655 
4656 
4657  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 9 (ADC1_DB9RH) */
4658  struct {
4659  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data buffer 9 value [9:8]
4660  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4661  } DB9RH;
4662 
4663 
4664  /** @brief ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 9 (ADC1_DB8RL) */
4665  struct {
4666  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data buffer 9 value (low)
4667  } DB9RL;
4668 
4669 
4670  /** @brief Reserved register (12B) */
4671  uint8_t res[12];
4672 
4673 
4674  /** @brief ADC1 control/status register (ADC1_CSR) */
4675  struct {
4676  _BITS CH : 4; ///< Channel selection bits
4677  _BITS AWDIE : 1; ///< Analog watchdog interrupt enable
4678  _BITS EOCIE : 1; ///< Interrupt enable for EOC
4679  _BITS AWD : 1; ///< Analog Watchdog flag
4680  _BITS EOC : 1; ///< End of conversion
4681  } CSR;
4682 
4683 
4684  /** @brief ADC1 Configuration Register 1 (ADC1_CR1) */
4685  struct {
4686  _BITS ADON : 1; ///< A/D Converter on/off
4687  _BITS CONT : 1; ///< Continuous conversion
4688  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved, always read as 0
4689  _BITS SPSEL : 3; ///< Clock prescaler selection
4690  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved, always read as 0
4691  } CR1;
4692 
4693 
4694  /** @brief ADC1 Configuration Register 2 (ADC1_CR2) */
4695  struct {
4696  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
4697  _BITS SCAN : 1; ///< Scan mode enable
4698  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
4699  _BITS ALIGN : 1; ///< Data alignment
4700  _BITS EXTSEL : 2; ///< External event selection
4701  _BITS EXTTRIG : 1; ///< External trigger enable
4702  _BITS res3 : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
4703  } CR2;
4704 
4705 
4706  /** @brief ADC1 Configuration Register 3 (ADC1_CR3) */
4707  struct {
4708  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
4709  _BITS OVR : 1; ///< Overrun flag
4710  _BITS DBUF : 1; ///< Data buffer enable
4711  } CR3;
4712 
4713 
4714  /** @brief ADC1 (unbuffered) 10-bit measurement result (ADC1_DRH) */
4715  struct {
4716  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data value [9:8]
4717  _BITS res : 6; ///< reserved
4718  } DRH;
4719 
4720 
4721  /** @brief ADC1 (unbuffered) 10-bit measurement result (ADC1_DRL) */
4722  struct {
4723  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data value [7:0]
4724  } DRL;
4725 
4726 
4727  /** @brief ADC1 Schmitt trigger disable register (ADC1_TDRH) */
4728  struct {
4729  _BITS TDH : 8; ///< Schmitt trigger disable [15:8]
4730  } TDRH;
4731 
4732 
4733  /** @brief ADC1 Schmitt trigger disable register (ADC1_TDRL) */
4734  struct {
4735  _BITS TDL : 8; ///< Schmitt trigger disable [7:0]
4736  } TDRL;
4737 
4738 
4739  /** @brief ADC1 watchdog high threshold register (ADC1_HTRH) */
4740  struct {
4741  _BITS HT : 8; ///< watchdog high threshold [9:2]
4742  } HTRH;
4743 
4744 
4745  /** @brief ADC1 watchdog high threshold register (ADC1_HTRL) */
4746  struct {
4747  _BITS HT : 2; ///< watchdog high threshold [1:0]
4748  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved
4749 
4750  } HTRL;
4751 
4752 
4753  /** @brief ADC1 watchdog low threshold register (ADC1_LTRH) */
4754  struct {
4755  _BITS LT : 8; ///< watchdog low threshold [9:2]
4756  } LTRH;
4757 
4758 
4759  /** @brief ADC1 watchdog low threshold register (ADC1_LTRL) */
4760  struct {
4761  _BITS LT : 2; ///< watchdog low threshold [1:0]
4762  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved
4763  } LTRL;
4764 
4765 
4766  /** @brief ADC1 watchdog status register (ADC1_AWSRH) */
4767  struct {
4768  _BITS AWS : 2; ///< watchdog status register [9:8]
4769  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved
4770  } AWSRH;
4771 
4772 
4773  /** @brief ADC1 watchdog status register (ADC1_AWSRL) */
4774  struct {
4775  _BITS AWS : 8; ///< watchdog status register [7:0]
4776  } AWSRL;
4777 
4778 
4779  /** @brief ADC1 watchdog control register (ADC1_AWCRH) */
4780  struct {
4781  _BITS AWEN : 2; ///< watchdog control register [9:8]
4782  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved
4783  } AWCRH;
4784 
4785 
4786  /** @brief ADC1 watchdog control register (ADC1_AWCRL) */
4787  struct {
4788  _BITS AWEN : 8; ///< watchdog control register [7:0]
4789  } AWCRL;
4790 
4791  } ADC1_t;
4792 
4793  /* Pointer to ADC1 registers */
4794  #define _ADC1 _SFR(ADC1_t, ADC1_AddressBase) ///< ADC1 struct/bit access
4795  #define _ADC1_DB0RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x00) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 0
4796  #define _ADC1_DB0RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x01) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 0
4797  #define _ADC1_DB1RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x02) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 1
4798  #define _ADC1_DB1RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x03) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 1
4799  #define _ADC1_DB2RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x04) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 2
4800  #define _ADC1_DB2RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x05) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 2
4801  #define _ADC1_DB3RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x06) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 3
4802  #define _ADC1_DB3RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x07) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 3
4803  #define _ADC1_DB4RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x08) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 4
4804  #define _ADC1_DB4RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x09) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 4
4805  #define _ADC1_DB5RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x0A) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 5
4806  #define _ADC1_DB5RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x0B) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 5
4807  #define _ADC1_DB6RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x0C) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 6
4808  #define _ADC1_DB6RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x0D) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 6
4809  #define _ADC1_DB7RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x0E) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 7
4810  #define _ADC1_DB7RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x0F) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 7
4811  #define _ADC1_DB8RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x10) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 8
4812  #define _ADC1_DB8RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x11) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 8
4813  #define _ADC1_DB9RH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x12) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 9
4814  #define _ADC1_DB9RL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x13) ///< ADC1 10-bit Data Buffer Register 9
4815  // reserved (12B)
4816  #define _ADC1_CSR _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x20) ///< ADC1 control/status register
4817  #define _ADC1_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x21) ///< ADC1 Configuration Register 1
4818  #define _ADC1_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x22) ///< ADC1 Configuration Register 2
4819  #define _ADC1_CR3 _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x23) ///< ADC1 Configuration Register 3
4820  #define _ADC1_DRH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x24) ///< ADC1 (unbuffered) 10-bit measurement result
4821  #define _ADC1_DRL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x25) ///< ADC1 (unbuffered) 10-bit measurement result
4822  #define _ADC1_TDRH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x26) ///< ADC1 Schmitt trigger disable register
4823  #define _ADC1_TDRL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x27) ///< ADC1 Schmitt trigger disable register
4824  #define _ADC1_HTRH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x28) ///< ADC1 watchdog high threshold register
4825  #define _ADC1_HTRL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x29) ///< ADC1 watchdog high threshold register
4826  #define _ADC1_LTRH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x2A) ///< ADC1 watchdog low threshold register
4827  #define _ADC1_LTRL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x2B) ///< ADC1 watchdog low threshold register
4828  #define _ADC1_AWSRH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x2C) ///< ADC1 watchdog status register
4829  #define _ADC1_AWSRL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x2D) ///< ADC1 watchdog status register
4830  #define _ADC1_AWCRH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x2E) ///< ADC1 watchdog control register
4831  #define _ADC1_AWCRL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC1_AddressBase+0x2F) ///< ADC1 watchdog control register
4832 
4833  /* ADC1 Module Reset Values */
4834  #define _ADC1_CSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 control/status register reset value
4835  #define _ADC1_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 Configuration Register 1 reset value
4836  #define _ADC1_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 Configuration Register 2 reset value
4837  #define _ADC1_CR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 Configuration Register 3 reset value
4838  #define _ADC1_TDRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 Schmitt trigger disable register reset value
4839  #define _ADC1_TDRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 Schmitt trigger disable register reset value
4840  #define _ADC1_HTRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< ADC1 watchdog high threshold register reset value
4841  #define _ADC1_HTRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x03) ///< ADC1 watchdog high threshold register reset value
4842  #define _ADC1_LTRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 watchdog low threshold register reset value
4843  #define _ADC1_LTRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 watchdog low threshold register reset value
4844  #define _ADC1_AWCRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 watchdog control register reset value
4845  #define _ADC1_AWCRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC1 watchdog control register reset value
4846 
4847  /* ADC1 control/status register (ADC1_CSR) */
4848  #define _ADC1_CH ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< ADC1 Channel selection bits [3:0] (in _ADC1_CSR)
4849  #define _ADC1_CH0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ADC1 Channel selection bits [0] (in _ADC1_CSR)
4850  #define _ADC1_CH1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ADC1 Channel selection bits [1] (in _ADC1_CSR)
4851  #define _ADC1_CH2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ADC1 Channel selection bits [2] (in _ADC1_CSR)
4852  #define _ADC1_CH3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ADC1 Channel selection bits [3] (in _ADC1_CSR)
4853  #define _ADC1_AWDIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< ADC1 Analog watchdog interrupt enable [0] (in _ADC1_CSR)
4854  #define _ADC1_EOCIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< ADC1 Interrupt enable for EOC [0] (in _ADC1_CSR)
4855  #define _ADC1_AWD ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ADC1 Analog Watchdog flag [0] (in _ADC1_CSR)
4856  #define _ADC1_EOC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< ADC1 End of conversion [0] (in _ADC1_CSR)
4857 
4858  /* ADC1 Configuration Register 1 (ADC1_CR1) */
4859  #define _ADC1_ADON ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ADC1 Conversion on/off [0] (in _ADC1_CR1)
4860  #define _ADC1_CONT ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ADC1 Continuous conversion [0] (in _ADC1_CR1)
4861  // reserved [3:2]
4862  #define _ADC1_SPSEL ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4) ///< ADC1 clock prescaler selection [2:0] (in _ADC1_CR1)
4863  #define _ADC1_SPSEL0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4) ///< ADC1 clock prescaler selection [0] (in _ADC1_CR1)
4864  #define _ADC1_SPSEL1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5) ///< ADC1 clock prescaler selection [1] (in _ADC1_CR1)
4865  #define _ADC1_SPSEL2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6) ///< ADC1 clock prescaler selection [2] (in _ADC1_CR1)
4866  // reserved [7]
4867 
4868  /* ADC1 Configuration Register 2 (ADC1_CR2) */
4869  // reserved [0]
4870  #define _ADC1_SCAN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ADC1 Scan mode enable [0] (in _ADC1_CR2)
4871  // reserved [2]
4872  #define _ADC1_ALIGN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ADC1 Data alignment [0] (in _ADC1_CR2)
4873  #define _ADC1_EXTSEL ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4) ///< ADC1 External event selection [1:0] (in _ADC1_CR2)
4874  #define _ADC1_EXTSEL0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4) ///< ADC1 External event selection [0] (in _ADC1_CR2)
4875  #define _ADC1_EXTSEL1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5) ///< ADC1 External event selection [1] (in _ADC1_CR2)
4876  #define _ADC1_EXTTRIG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ADC1 External trigger enable [0] (in _ADC1_CR2)
4877  // reserved [7]
4878 
4879  /* ADC1 Configuration Register 3 (ADC1_CR3) */
4880  // reserved [5:0]
4881  #define _ADC1_OVR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ADC1 Overrun flag [0] (in _ADC1_CR3)
4882  #define _ADC1_DBUF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< ADC1 Data buffer enable [0] (in _ADC1_CR3)
4883 
4884 #endif // ADC1_AddressBase
4885 
4886 
4887 
4888 //------------------------
4889 // Analog Digital Converter 2 (ADC2)
4890 //------------------------
4891 #if defined(ADC2_AddressBase)
4892 
4893  /** @brief struct containing Analog Digital Converter 2 (ADC2) */
4894  typedef struct {
4895 
4896  /** @brief ADC2 control/status register (ADC2_CSR) */
4897  struct {
4898  _BITS CH : 4; ///< Channel selection bits
4899  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
4900  _BITS EOCIE : 1; ///< Interrupt enable for EOC
4901  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
4902  _BITS EOC : 1; ///< End of conversion
4903  } CSR;
4904 
4905 
4906  /** @brief ADC2 Configuration Register 1 (ADC2_CR1) */
4907  struct {
4908  _BITS ADON : 1; ///< A/D Converter on/off
4909  _BITS CONT : 1; ///< Continuous conversion
4910  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved, always read as 0
4911  _BITS SPSEL : 3; ///< Clock prescaler selection
4912  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved, always read as 0
4913  } CR1;
4914 
4915 
4916  /** @brief ADC2 Configuration Register 2 (ADC2_CR2) */
4917  struct {
4918  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
4919  _BITS ALIGN : 1; ///< Data alignment
4920  _BITS EXTSEL : 2; ///< External event selection
4921  _BITS EXTTRIG : 1; ///< External trigger enable
4922  _BITS res3 : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
4923  } CR2;
4924 
4925 
4926  /** @brief Reserved register (1B) */
4927  uint8_t res[1];
4928 
4929 
4930  /** @brief ADC2 (unbuffered) 10-bit measurement result (ADC2_DRH) */
4931  struct {
4932  _BITS DATA : 2; ///< Data value [9:8]
4933  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved
4934  } DRH;
4935 
4936 
4937  /** @brief ADC2 (unbuffered) 10-bit measurement result (ADC2_DRL) */
4938  struct {
4939  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< Data value [7:0]
4940  } DRL;
4941 
4942 
4943  /** @brief ADC2 Schmitt trigger disable register (ADC2_TDRH) */
4944  struct {
4945  _BITS TDH : 8; ///< Schmitt trigger disable [9:8]
4946  } TDRH;
4947 
4948 
4949  /** @brief ADC2 Schmitt trigger disable register (ADC2_TDRL) */
4950  struct {
4951  _BITS TDL : 8; ///< Schmitt trigger disable [7:0]
4952  } TDRL;
4953 
4954  } ADC2_t;
4955 
4956  /* Pointer to ADC2 registers */
4957  #define _ADC2 _SFR(ADC2_t, ADC2_AddressBase) ///< ADC2 struct/bit access
4958  #define _ADC2_CSR _SFR(uint8_t, ADC2_AddressBase+0x00) ///< ADC2 control/status register
4959  #define _ADC2_CR1 _SFR(uint8_t, ADC2_AddressBase+0x01) ///< ADC2 Configuration Register 1
4960  #define _ADC2_CR2 _SFR(uint8_t, ADC2_AddressBase+0x02) ///< ADC2 Configuration Register 2
4961  // reserved (1B)
4962  #define _ADC2_DRH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC2_AddressBase+0x04) ///< ADC2 (unbuffered) 10-bit measurement result
4963  #define _ADC2_DRL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC2_AddressBase+0x05) ///< ADC2 (unbuffered) 10-bit measurement result
4964  #define _ADC2_TDRH _SFR(uint8_t, ADC2_AddressBase+0x06) ///< ADC2 Schmitt trigger disable register
4965  #define _ADC2_TDRL _SFR(uint8_t, ADC2_AddressBase+0x07) ///< ADC2 Schmitt trigger disable register
4966 
4967  /* ADC2 Module Reset Values */
4968  #define _ADC2_CSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC2 control/status register reset value
4969  #define _ADC2_CR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC2 Configuration Register 1 reset value
4970  #define _ADC2_CR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC2 Configuration Register 2 reset value
4971  #define _ADC2_TDRL_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC2 Schmitt trigger disable register reset value
4972  #define _ADC2_TDRH_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< ADC2 Schmitt trigger disable register reset value
4973 
4974  /* ADC2 control/status register (ADC2_CSR) */
4975  #define _ADC2_CH ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< ADC2 Channel selection bits [3:0] (in _ADC2_CSR)
4976  #define _ADC2_CH0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ADC2 Channel selection bits [0] (in _ADC2_CSR)
4977  #define _ADC2_CH1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ADC2 Channel selection bits [1] (in _ADC2_CSR)
4978  #define _ADC2_CH2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ADC2 Channel selection bits [2] (in _ADC2_CSR)
4979  #define _ADC2_CH3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ADC2 Channel selection bits [3] (in _ADC2_CSR)
4980  // reserved [4]
4981  #define _ADC2_EOCIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< ADC2 Interrupt enable for EOC [0] (in _ADC2_CSR)
4982  // reserved [6]
4983  #define _ADC2_EOC ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< ADC2 End of conversion [0] (in _ADC2_CSR)
4984 
4985  /* ADC2 Configuration Register 1 (ADC2_CR1) */
4986  #define _ADC2_ADON ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ADC2 Conversion on/off [0] (in _ADC2_CR1)
4987  #define _ADC2_CONT ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ADC2 Continuous conversion [0] (in _ADC2_CR1)
4988  // reserved [3:2]
4989  #define _ADC2_SPSEL ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4) ///< ADC2 clock prescaler selection [2:0] (in _ADC2_CR1)
4990  #define _ADC2_SPSEL0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4) ///< ADC2 clock prescaler selection [0] (in _ADC2_CR1)
4991  #define _ADC2_SPSEL1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5) ///< ADC2 clock prescaler selection [1] (in _ADC2_CR1)
4992  #define _ADC2_SPSEL2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6) ///< ADC2 clock prescaler selection [2] (in _ADC2_CR1)
4993  // reserved [7]
4994 
4995  /* ADC2 Configuration Register 2 (ADC2_CR2) */
4996  // reserved [2:0]
4997  #define _ADC2_ALIGN ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ADC2 Data alignment [0] (in _ADC2_CR2)
4998  #define _ADC2_EXTSEL ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4) ///< ADC2 External event selection [1:0] (in _ADC2_CR2)
4999  #define _ADC2_EXTSEL0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4) ///< ADC2 External event selection [0] (in _ADC2_CR2)
5000  #define _ADC2_EXTSEL1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5) ///< ADC2 External event selection [1] (in _ADC2_CR2)
5001  #define _ADC2_EXTTRIG ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ADC2 External trigger enable [0] (in _ADC2_CR2)
5002  // reserved [7]
5003 
5004 #endif // ADC2_AddressBase
5005 
5006 
5007 //------------------------
5008 // Controller Area Network Module (CAN)
5009 //------------------------
5010 #if defined(CAN_AddressBase)
5011 
5012  /** @brief struct for controlling Controller Area Network Module (CAN) */
5013  typedef struct {
5014 
5015  /** @brief CAN master control register (CAN_MCR) */
5016  struct {
5017  _BITS INRQ : 1; ///< Initialization Request
5018  _BITS SLEEP : 1; ///< Sleep Mode Request
5019  _BITS TXFP : 1; ///< Transmit FIFO Priority
5020  _BITS RFLM : 1; ///< Receive FIFO Locked Mode
5021  _BITS NART : 1; ///< No Automatic Retransmission
5022  _BITS AWUM : 1; ///< Automatic Wakeup Mode
5023  _BITS ABOM : 1; ///< Automatic Bus-Off Management
5024  _BITS TTCM : 1; ///< Time Triggered Communication Mode
5025  } MCR;
5026 
5027 
5028  /** @brief CAN master status register (CAN_MSR) */
5029  struct {
5030  _BITS INAK : 1; ///< Initialization Acknowledge
5031  _BITS SLAK : 1; ///< Sleep Acknowledge
5032  _BITS ERRI : 1; ///< Error Interrupt
5033  _BITS WKUI : 1; ///< Wakeup Interrupt
5034  _BITS TX : 1; ///< Transmit
5035  _BITS RX : 1; ///< Receive
5036  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
5037  } MSR;
5038 
5039 
5040  /** @brief CAN transmit status register (CAN_TSR) */
5041  struct {
5042  _BITS RQCP0 : 1; ///< Request Completed for Mailbox 0
5043  _BITS RQCP1 : 1; ///< Request Completed for Mailbox 1
5044  _BITS RQCP2 : 1; ///< Request Completed for Mailbox 2
5045  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5046  _BITS TXOK0 : 1; ///< Transmission ok for Mailbox 0
5047  _BITS TXOK1 : 1; ///< Transmission ok for Mailbox 1
5048  _BITS TXOK2 : 1; ///< Transmission ok for Mailbox 2
5049  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
5050  } TSR;
5051 
5052 
5053  /** @brief CAN transmit priority register (CAN_TPR) */
5054  struct {
5055  _BITS CODE : 2; ///< Mailbox Code
5056  _BITS TME0 : 1; ///< Transmit Mailbox 0 Empty
5057  _BITS TME1 : 1; ///< Transmit Mailbox 1 Empty
5058  _BITS TME2 : 1; ///< Transmit Mailbox 2 Empty
5059  _BITS LOW0 : 1; ///< Lowest Priority Flag for Mailbox 0
5060  _BITS LOW1 : 1; ///< Lowest Priority Flag for Mailbox 1
5061  _BITS LOW2 : 1; ///< Lowest Priority Flag for Mailbox 2
5062  } TPR;
5063 
5064 
5065  /** @brief CAN receive FIFO register (CAN_RFR) */
5066  struct {
5067  _BITS FMP : 2; ///< FIFO Message Pending
5068  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5069  _BITS FULL : 1; ///< FIFO Full
5070  _BITS FOVR : 1; ///< FIFO Overrun
5071  _BITS RFOM : 1; ///< Release FIFO Output Mailbox
5072  _BITS res2 : 2; ///< Reserved
5073  } RFR;
5074 
5075 
5076  /** @brief CAN interrupt enable register (CAN_IER) */
5077  struct {
5078  _BITS TMEIE : 1; ///< Transmit Mailbox Empty Interrupt Enable
5079  _BITS FMPIE : 1; ///< FIFO Message Pending Interrupt Enable
5080  _BITS FFIE : 1; ///< FIFO Full Interrupt Enable
5081  _BITS FOVIE : 1; ///< FIFO Overrun Interrupt Enable
5082  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
5083  _BITS WKUIE : 1; ///< Wakeup Interrupt Enable
5084  } IER;
5085 
5086 
5087  /** @brief CAN diagnosis register (CAN_DGR) */
5088  struct {
5089  _BITS LBKM : 1; ///< Loop back mode
5090  _BITS SILM : 1; ///< Silent mode
5091  _BITS SAMP : 1; ///< Last sample point
5092  _BITS RX : 1; ///< CAN Rx Signal
5093  _BITS TXM2E : 1; ///< TX Mailbox 2 enable
5094  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
5095  } DGR;
5096 
5097 
5098  /** @brief CAN page selection register for paged registers (CAN_PSR) */
5099  struct {
5100  _BITS PS : 3; ///< Page select
5101  _BITS res : 5; ///< Reserved
5102  } PSR;
5103 
5104 
5105 
5106  /** @brief paged CAN registers (selection via CAN_PSR) */
5107  union {
5108 
5109  /** @brief CAN page 0: Tx Mailbox 0 (CAN.PAGE_0) */
5110  struct {
5111 
5112  /** @brief CAN message control/status register (CAN_MCSR) */
5113  struct {
5114  _BITS TXRQ : 1; ///< Transmission mailbox request
5115  _BITS ABRQ : 1; ///< Abort request for mailbox
5116  _BITS RQCP : 1; ///< Request completed
5117  _BITS TXOK : 1; ///< Transmission OK
5118  _BITS ALST : 1; ///< Arbitration lost
5119  _BITS TERR : 1; ///< Transmission error
5120  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
5121  } MCSR;
5122 
5123 
5124  /** @brief CAN mailbox data length control register (CAN_MDLCR) */
5125  struct {
5126  _BITS DLC : 4; ///< Data length code
5127  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
5128  _BITS TGT : 1; ///< Transmit global time
5129  } MDLCR;
5130 
5131 
5132  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 1 (CAN_MIDR1) */
5133  struct {
5134  _BITS ID : 5; ///< STID[10:6] or EXID[28:24]
5135  _BITS RTR : 1; ///< Remote transmission request
5136  _BITS IDE : 1; ///< Extended identifier
5137  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5138  } MIDR1;
5139 
5140 
5141  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 2 (CAN_MIDR2) */
5142  struct {
5143  _BITS EXID : 2; ///< EXID[17:16]
5144  _BITS ID : 6; ///< STID[5:0] or EXID[23:18]
5145  } MIDR2;
5146 
5147 
5148  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 3 (CAN_MIDR3) */
5149  struct {
5150  _BITS EXID : 8; ///< EXID[15:8]
5151  } MIDR3;
5152 
5153 
5154  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 4 (CAN_MIDR4) */
5155  struct {
5156  _BITS EXID : 8; ///< EXID[7:0]
5157  } MIDR4;
5158 
5159 
5160  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 1 (CAN_MDAR1) */
5161  struct {
5162  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5163  } MDAR1;
5164 
5165 
5166  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 2 (CAN_MDAR2) */
5167  struct {
5168  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5169  } MDAR2;
5170 
5171 
5172  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 3 (CAN_MDAR3) */
5173  struct {
5174  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5175  } MDAR3;
5176 
5177 
5178  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 4 (CAN_MDAR4) */
5179  struct {
5180  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5181  } MDAR4;
5182 
5183 
5184  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 5 (CAN_MDAR5) */
5185  struct {
5186  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5187  } MDAR5;
5188 
5189 
5190  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 6 (CAN_MDAR6) */
5191  struct {
5192  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5193  } MDAR6;
5194 
5195 
5196  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 7 (CAN_MDAR7) */
5197  struct {
5198  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5199  } MDAR7;
5200 
5201 
5202  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 8 (CAN_MDAR8) */
5203  struct {
5204  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5205  } MDAR8;
5206 
5207 
5208  /** @brief CAN mailbox time stamp register low byte (CAN_MTSRL) */
5209  struct {
5210  _BITS TIME : 8; ///< Message time stamp [7:0]
5211  } MTSRL;
5212 
5213 
5214  /** @brief CAN mailbox time stamp register high byte (CAN_MTSRH) */
5215  struct {
5216  _BITS TIME : 8; ///< Message time stamp [15:8]
5217  } MTSRH;
5218 
5219  } PAGE_0;
5220 
5221 
5222 
5223  /** @brief CAN page 1: Tx Mailbox 1 (CAN.PAGE_1) */
5224  struct {
5225 
5226  /** @brief CAN message control/status register (CAN_MCSR) */
5227  struct {
5228  _BITS TXRQ : 1; ///< Transmission mailbox request
5229  _BITS ABRQ : 1; ///< Abort request for mailbox
5230  _BITS RQCP : 1; ///< Request completed
5231  _BITS TXOK : 1; ///< Transmission OK
5232  _BITS ALST : 1; ///< Arbitration lost
5233  _BITS TERR : 1; ///< Transmission error
5234  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
5235  } MCSR;
5236 
5237 
5238  /** @brief CAN mailbox data length control register (CAN_MDLCR) */
5239  struct {
5240  _BITS DLC : 4; ///< Data length code
5241  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
5242  _BITS TGT : 1; ///< Transmit global time
5243  } MDLCR;
5244 
5245 
5246  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 1 (CAN_MIDR1) */
5247  struct {
5248  _BITS ID : 5; ///< STID[10:6] or EXID[28:24]
5249  _BITS RTR : 1; ///< Remote transmission request
5250  _BITS IDE : 1; ///< Extended identifier
5251  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5252  } MIDR1;
5253 
5254 
5255  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 2 (CAN_MIDR2) */
5256  struct {
5257  _BITS EXID : 2; ///< EXID[17:16]
5258  _BITS ID : 6; ///< STID[5:0] or EXID[23:18]
5259  } MIDR2;
5260 
5261 
5262  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 3 (CAN_MIDR3) */
5263  struct {
5264  _BITS EXID : 8; ///< EXID[15:8]
5265  } MIDR3;
5266 
5267 
5268  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 4 (CAN_MIDR4) */
5269  struct {
5270  _BITS EXID : 8; ///< EXID[7:0]
5271  } MIDR4;
5272 
5273 
5274  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 1 (CAN_MDAR1) */
5275  struct {
5276  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5277  } MDAR1;
5278 
5279 
5280  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 2 (CAN_MDAR2) */
5281  struct {
5282  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5283  } MDAR2;
5284 
5285 
5286  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 3 (CAN_MDAR3) */
5287  struct {
5288  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5289  } MDAR3;
5290 
5291 
5292  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 4 (CAN_MDAR4) */
5293  struct {
5294  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5295  } MDAR4;
5296 
5297 
5298  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 5 (CAN_MDAR5) */
5299  struct {
5300  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5301  } MDAR5;
5302 
5303

5305  struct {
5306  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5307  } MDAR6;
5308 
5309

5311  struct {
5312  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5313  } MDAR7;
5314 
5315 
5316  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 8 (CAN_MDAR8) */
5317  struct {
5318  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5319  } MDAR8;
5320 
5321 
5322  /** @brief CAN mailbox time stamp register low byte (CAN_MTSRL) */
5323  struct {
5324  _BITS TIME : 8; ///< Message time stamp [7:0]
5325  } MTSRL;
5326 
5327 
5328  /** @brief CAN mailbox time stamp register high byte (CAN_MTSRH) */
5329  struct {
5330  _BITS TIME : 8; ///< Message time stamp [15:8]
5331  } MTSRH;
5332 
5333  } PAGE_1;
5334 
5335 
5336 
5337  /** @brief CAN page 2: Acceptance Filter 0:1 (CAN.PAGE_2) */
5338  struct {
5339 
5340  /** @brief CAN reception filter 0/1 (CAN_F0R1) */
5341  struct {
5342  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 0/1
5343  } F0R1;
5344 
5345  /** @brief CAN reception filter 0/2 (CAN_F0R2) */
5346  struct {
5347  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 0/2
5348  } F0R2;
5349 
5350  /** @brief CAN reception filter 0/3 (CAN_F0R3) */
5351  struct {
5352  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 0/3
5353  } F0R3;
5354 
5355  /** @brief CAN reception filter 0/4 (CAN_F0R4) */
5356  struct {
5357  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 0/4
5358  } F0R4;
5359 
5360  /** @brief CAN reception filter 0/5 (CAN_F0R5) */
5361  struct {
5362  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 0/5
5363  } F0R5;
5364 
5365  /** @brief CAN reception filter 0/6 (CAN_F0R6) */
5366  struct {
5367  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 0/6
5368  } F0R6;
5369 
5370  /** @brief CAN reception filter 0/7 (CAN_F0R7) */
5371  struct {
5372  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 0/7
5373  } F0R7;
5374 
5375  /** @brief CAN reception filter 0/8 (CAN_F0R8) */
5376  struct {
5377  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 0/8
5378  } F0R8;
5379 
5380 
5381  /** @brief CAN reception filter 1/1 (CAN_F1R1) */
5382  struct {
5383  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 1/1
5384  } F1R1;
5385 
5386  /** @brief CAN reception filter 1/2 (CAN_F1R2) */
5387  struct {
5388  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 1/2
5389  } F1R2;
5390 
5391  /** @brief CAN reception filter 1/3 (CAN_F1R3) */
5392  struct {
5393  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 1/3
5394  } F1R3;
5395 
5396  /** @brief CAN reception filter 1/4 (CAN_F1R4) */
5397  struct {
5398  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 1/4
5399  } F1R4;
5400 
5401  /** @brief CAN reception filter 1/5 (CAN_F1R5) */
5402  struct {
5403  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 1/5
5404  } F1R5;
5405 
5406  /** @brief CAN reception filter 1/6 (CAN_F1R6) */
5407  struct {
5408  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 1/6
5409  } F1R6;
5410 
5411  /** @brief CAN reception filter 1/7 (CAN_F1R7) */
5412  struct {
5413  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 1/7
5414  } F1R7;
5415 
5416  /** @brief CAN reception filter 1/8 (CAN_F1R8) */
5417  struct {
5418  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 1/8
5419  } F1R8;
5420 
5421  } PAGE_2;
5422 
5423 
5424 
5425  /** @brief CAN page 3: Acceptance Filter 2:3 (CAN.PAGE_3) */
5426  struct {
5427 
5428  /** @brief CAN reception filter 2/1 (CAN_F2R1) */
5429  struct {
5430  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 2/1
5431  } F2R1;
5432 
5433  /** @brief CAN reception filter 2/2 (CAN_F2R2) */
5434  struct {
5435  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 2/2
5436  } F2R2;
5437 
5438  /** @brief CAN reception filter 2/3 (CAN_F2R3) */
5439  struct {
5440  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 2/3
5441  } F2R3;
5442 
5443  /** @brief CAN reception filter 2/4 (CAN_F2R4) */
5444  struct {
5445  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 2/4
5446  } F2R4;
5447 
5448  /** @brief CAN reception filter 2/5 (CAN_F2R5) */
5449  struct {
5450  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 2/5
5451  } F2R5;
5452 
5453  /** @brief CAN reception filter 2/6 (CAN_F2R6) */
5454  struct {
5455  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 2/6
5456  } F2R6;
5457 
5458  /** @brief CAN reception filter 2/7 (CAN_F2R7) */
5459  struct {
5460  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 2/7
5461  } F2R7;
5462 
5463  /** @brief CAN reception filter 2/8 (CAN_F2R8) */
5464  struct {
5465  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 2/8
5466  } F2R8;
5467 
5468 
5469  /** @brief CAN reception filter 3/1 (CAN_F3R1) */
5470  struct {
5471  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 3/1
5472  } F3R1;
5473 
5474  /** @brief CAN reception filter 3/2 (CAN_F3R2) */
5475  struct {
5476  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 3/2
5477  } F3R2;
5478 
5479  /** @brief CAN reception filter 3/3 (CAN_F3R3) */
5480  struct {
5481  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 3/3
5482  } F3R3;
5483 
5484  /** @brief CAN reception filter 3/4 (CAN_F3R4) */
5485  struct {
5486  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 3/4
5487  } F3R4;
5488 
5489  /** @brief CAN reception filter 3/5 (CAN_F3R5) */
5490  struct {
5491  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 3/5
5492  } F3R5;
5493 
5494  /** @brief CAN reception filter 3/6 (CAN_F3R6) */
5495  struct {
5496  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 3/6
5497  } F3R6;
5498 
5499  /** @brief CAN reception filter 3/7 (CAN_F3R7) */
5500  struct {
5501  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 3/7
5502  } F3R7;
5503 
5504  /** @brief CAN reception filter 3/8 (CAN_F3R8) */
5505  struct {
5506  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 3/8
5507  } F3R8;
5508 
5509  } PAGE_3;
5510 
5511 
5512 
5513  /** @brief CAN page 4: Acceptance Filter 4:5 (CAN.PAGE_4) */
5514  struct {
5515 
5516  /** @brief CAN reception filter 4/1 (CAN_F4R1) */
5517  struct {
5518  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 4/1
5519  } F4R1;
5520 
5521  /** @brief CAN reception filter 4/2 (CAN_F4R2) */
5522  struct {
5523  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 4/2
5524  } F4R2;
5525 
5526  /** @brief CAN reception filter 4/3 (CAN_F4R3) */
5527  struct {
5528  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 4/3
5529  } F4R3;
5530 
5531  /** @brief CAN reception filter 4/4 (CAN_F4R4) */
5532  struct {
5533  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 4/4
5534  } F4R4;
5535 
5536  /** @brief CAN reception filter 4/5 (CAN_F4R5) */
5537  struct {
5538  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 4/5
5539  } F4R5;
5540 
5541  /** @brief CAN reception filter 4/6 (CAN_F4R6) */
5542  struct {
5543  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 4/6
5544  } F4R6;
5545 
5546  /** @brief CAN reception filter 4/7 (CAN_F4R7) */
5547  struct {
5548  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 4/7
5549  } F4R7;
5550 
5551  /** @brief CAN reception filter 4/8 (CAN_F4R8) */
5552  struct {
5553  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 4/8
5554  } F4R8;
5555 
5556 
5557  /** @brief CAN reception filter 5/1 (CAN_F5R1) */
5558  struct {
5559  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 5/1
5560  } F5R1;
5561 
5562  /** @brief CAN reception filter 5/2 (CAN_F5R2) */
5563  struct {
5564  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 5/2
5565  } F5R2;

5568  struct {
5569  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 5/3
5570  } F5R3;
5571

5573  struct {
5574  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 5/4
5575  } F5R4;

5578  struct {
5579  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 5/5
5580  } F5R5;

5584  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 5/6
5585  } F5R6;
5586
