5588  struct {
5589  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 5/7
5590  } F5R7;
5591 
5592  /** @brief CAN reception filter 5/8 (CAN_F5R8) */
5593  struct {
5594  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN reception filter 5/8
5595  } F5R8;
5596 
5597  } PAGE_4;
5598 
5599 
5600 
5601  /** @brief CAN page 5: Tx Mailbox 2 (CAN.PAGE_5) */
5602  struct {
5603 
5604  /** @brief CAN message control/status register (CAN_MCSR) */
5605  struct {
5606  _BITS TXRQ : 1; ///< Transmission mailbox request
5607  _BITS ABRQ : 1; ///< Abort request for mailbox
5608  _BITS RQCP : 1; ///< Request completed
5609  _BITS TXOK : 1; ///< Transmission OK
5610  _BITS ALST : 1; ///< Arbitration lost
5611  _BITS TERR : 1; ///< Transmission error
5612  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved
5613  } MCSR;
5614 
5615 
5616  /** @brief CAN mailbox data length control register (CAN_MDLCR) */
5617  struct {
5618  _BITS DLC : 4; ///< Data length code
5619  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
5620  _BITS TGT : 1; ///< Transmit global time
5621  } MDLCR;
5622 
5623 
5624  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 1 (CAN_MIDR1) */
5625  struct {
5626  _BITS ID : 5; ///< STID[10:6] or EXID[28:24]
5627  _BITS RTR : 1; ///< Remote transmission request
5628  _BITS IDE : 1; ///< Extended identifier
5629  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5630  } MIDR1;
5631 
5632 
5633  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 2 (CAN_MIDR2) */
5634  struct {
5635  _BITS EXID : 2; ///< EXID[17:16]
5636  _BITS ID : 6; ///< STID[5:0] or EXID[23:18]
5637  } MIDR2;
5638 
5639 
5640  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 3 (CAN_MIDR3) */
5641  struct {
5642  _BITS EXID : 8; ///< EXID[15:8]
5643  } MIDR3;
5644 
5645 
5646  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 4 (CAN_MIDR4) */
5647  struct {
5648  _BITS EXID : 8; ///< EXID[7:0]
5649  } MIDR4;
5650 
5651 
5652  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 1 (CAN_MDAR1) */
5653  struct {
5654  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5655  } MDAR1;
5656 
5657 
5658  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 2 (CAN_MDAR2) */
5659  struct {
5660  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5661  } MDAR2;
5662 
5663 
5664  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 3 (CAN_MDAR3) */
5665  struct {
5666  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5667  } MDAR3;
5668 
5669 
5670  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 4 (CAN_MDAR4) */
5671  struct {
5672  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5673  } MDAR4;
5674 
5675 
5676  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 5 (CAN_MDAR5) */
5677  struct {
5678  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5679  } MDAR5;
5680 
5681 
5682  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 6 (CAN_MDAR6) */
5683  struct {
5684  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5685  } MDAR6;
5686 
5687 
5688  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 7 (CAN_MDAR7) */
5689  struct {
5690  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5691  } MDAR7;
5692 
5693 
5694  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 8 (CAN_MDAR8) */
5695  struct {
5696  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< data[7:0]
5697  } MDAR8;
5698 
5699 
5700  /** @brief CAN mailbox time stamp register low byte (CAN_MTSRL) */
5701  struct {
5702  _BITS TIME : 8; ///< Message time stamp [7:0]
5703  } MTSRL;
5704 
5705 
5706  /** @brief CAN mailbox time stamp register high byte (CAN_MTSRH) */
5707  struct {
5708  _BITS TIME : 8; ///< Message time stamp [15:8]
5709  } MTSRH;
5710 
5711  } PAGE_5;
5712 
5713 
5714 
5715  /** @brief CAN page 6: Configuration/Diagnostics (CAN.PAGE_6) */
5716  struct {
5717 
5718  /** @brief CAN error status register (CAN_ESR) */
5719  struct {
5720  _BITS EWGF : 1; ///< Error warning flag
5721  _BITS EPVF : 1; ///< Error passive flag
5722  _BITS BOFF : 1; ///< Bus off flag
5723  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5724  _BITS LEC : 3; ///< Last error code
5725  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
5726  } ESR;
5727 
5728 
5729  /** @brief CAN error interrupt enable register (CAN_EIER) */
5730  struct {
5731  _BITS EWGIE : 1; ///< Error warning interrupt enable
5732  _BITS EPVIE : 1; ///< Error passive interrupt enable
5733  _BITS BOFIE : 1; ///< Bus-Off interrupt enable
5734  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5735  _BITS LECIE : 1; ///< Last error code interrupt enable
5736  _BITS res2 : 2; ///< Reserved
5737  _BITS ERRIE : 1; ///< Error interrupt enable
5738  } EIER;
5739 
5740 
5741  /** @brief CAN transmit error counter register (CAN_TECR) */
5742  struct {
5743  _BITS TEC : 8; ///< Transmit error counter
5744  } TECR;
5745 
5746 
5747  /** @brief CAN receive error counter register (CAN_RECR) */
5748  struct {
5749  _BITS REC : 8; ///< Receive error counter
5750  } RECR;
5751 
5752 
5753  /** @brief CAN bit timing register 1 (CAN_BTR1) */
5754  struct {
5755  _BITS BRP : 6; ///< Baud rate prescaler
5756  _BITS SJW : 2; ///< Resynchronization jump width
5757  } BTR1;
5758 
5759 
5760  /** @brief CAN bit timing register 2 (CAN_BTR2) */
5761  struct {
5762  _BITS BS1 : 4; ///< Bit segment 1
5763  _BITS BS2 : 3; ///< Bit segment 2
5764  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved, must be kept cleared
5765  } BTR2;
5766 
5767 
5768  /** @brief Reserved registers (2B) */
5769  uint8_t res[2];
5770 
5771 
5772  /** @brief CAN filter mode register 1 (CAN_FMR1) */
5773  struct {
5774  _BITS FML0 : 1; ///< Filter 0 mode low
5775  _BITS FMH0 : 1; ///< Filter 0 mode high
5776  _BITS FML1 : 1; ///< Filter 1 mode low
5777  _BITS FMH1 : 1; ///< Filter 1 mode high
5778  _BITS FML2 : 1; ///< Filter 2 mode low
5779  _BITS FMH2 : 1; ///< Filter 2 mode high
5780  _BITS FML3 : 1; ///< Filter 3 mode low
5781  _BITS FMH3 : 1; ///< Filter 3 mode high
5782  } FMR1;
5783 
5784 
5785  /** @brief CAN filter mode register 2 (CAN_FMR2) */
5786  struct {
5787  _BITS FML4 : 1; ///< Filter 4 mode low
5788  _BITS FMH4 : 1; ///< Filter 4 mode high
5789  _BITS FML5 : 1; ///< Filter 5 mode low
5790  _BITS FMH5 : 1; ///< Filter 5 mode high
5791  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
5792  } FMR2;
5793 
5794 
5795  /** @brief CAN filter configuration register 1 (CAN_FCR1) */
5796  struct {
5797  _BITS FACT0 : 1; ///< Filter 0 active
5798  _BITS FSC0 : 2; ///< Filter 0 scale configuration
5799  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5800  _BITS FACT1 : 1; ///< Filter 1 active
5801  _BITS FSC1 : 2; ///< Filter 1 scale configuration
5802  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserved
5803  } FCR1;
5804 
5805 
5806  /** @brief CAN filter configuration register 2 (CAN_FCR2) */
5807  struct {
5808  _BITS FACT2 : 1; ///< Filter 2 active
5809  _BITS FSC2 : 2; ///< Filter 2 scale configuration
5810  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5811  _BITS FACT3 : 1; ///< Filter 3 active
5812  _BITS FSC3 : 2; ///< Filter 3 scale configuration
5813  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserve
5814  } FCR2;
5815 
5816 
5817  /** @brief CAN filter configuration register 3 (CAN_FCR3) */
5818  struct {
5819  _BITS FACT4 : 1; ///< Filter 4 active
5820  _BITS FSC4 : 2; ///< Filter 4 scale configuration
5821  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5822  _BITS FACT5 : 1; ///< Filter 5 active
5823  _BITS FSC5 : 2; ///< Filter 5 scale configuration
5824  _BITS res2 : 1; ///< Reserve
5825  } FCR3;
5826 
5827 
5828  /** @brief Reserved registers (3B) */
5829  _BITS res2[3];
5830 
5831  } PAGE_6;
5832 
5833 
5834 
5835  /** @brief CAN page 7: Receive FIFO (CAN.PAGE_7) */
5836  struct {
5837 
5838  /** @brief CAN mailbox filter match index register (CAN_MFMIR) */
5839  struct {
5840  _BITS FMI : 8; ///< Filter match index
5841  } MFMIR;
5842 
5843 
5844  /** @brief CAN mailbox data length control register (CAN_MDLCR) */
5845  struct {
5846  _BITS DLC : 4; ///< Data length code
5847  _BITS res : 3; ///< Reserved
5848  _BITS TGT : 1; ///< Transmit global time
5849  } MDLCR;
5850 
5851 
5852  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 1 (CAN_MIDR1)*/
5853  struct {
5854  _BITS ID : 5; ///< STID[10:6] or EXID[28:24]
5855  _BITS RTR : 1; ///< Remote transmission request
5856  _BITS IDE : 1; ///< Extended identifier
5857  _BITS res : 1; ///< Reserved
5858  } MIDR1;
5859 
5860 
5861  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 2 (CAN_MIDR2) */
5862  struct {
5863  _BITS EXID : 2; ///< EXID[17:16]
5864  _BITS ID : 6; ///< STID[5:0] or EXID[23:18]
5865  } MIDR2;
5866 
5867 
5868  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 3 (CAN_MIDR3) */
5869  struct {
5870  _BITS EXID : 8; ///< EXID[15:8]
5871  } MIDR3;
5872 
5873 
5874  /** @brief CAN mailbox identifier register 4 (CAN_MIDR4) */
5875  struct {
5876  _BITS EXID : 8; ///< EXID[7:0]
5877  } MIDR4;
5878 
5879 
5880  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 1 (CAN_MDAR1) */
5881  struct {
5882  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN mailbox data register 1
5883  } MDAR1;
5884 
5885 
5886  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 2 (CAN_MDAR2) */
5887  struct {
5888  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN mailbox data register 2
5889  } MDAR2;
5890 
5891 
5892  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 3 (CAN_MDAR3) */
5893  struct {
5894  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN mailbox data register 3
5895  } MDAR3;
5896 
5897 
5898  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 4 (CAN_MDAR4) */
5899  struct {
5900  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN mailbox data register 4
5901  } MDAR4;
5902 
5903 
5904  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 5 (CAN_MDAR5) */
5905  struct {
5906  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN mailbox data register 5
5907  } MDAR5;
5908 
5909 
5910  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 6 (CAN_MDAR6) */
5911  struct {
5912  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN mailbox data register 6
5913  } MDAR6;
5914 
5915 
5916  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 7 (CAN_MDAR7) */
5917  struct {
5918  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN mailbox data register 7
5919  } MDAR7;
5920 
5921 
5922  /** @brief CAN mailbox data register 8 (CAN_MDAR8) */
5923  struct {
5924  _BITS DATA : 8; ///< CAN mailbox data register 8
5925  } MDAR8;
5926 
5927 
5928  /** @brief CAN mailbox time stamp register low byte (CAN_MTSRL) */
5929  struct {
5930  _BITS TIME : 8; ///< Message time stamp [7:0]
5931  } MTSRL;
5932 
5933 
5934  /** @brief CAN mailbox time stamp register high byte (CAN_MTSRH) */
5935  struct {
5936  _BITS TIME : 8; ///< Message time stamp [15:8]
5937  } MTSRH;
5938 
5939  } PAGE_7;
5940 
5941  } Page;
5942 
5943  } CAN_t;
5944 
5945  /* Pointer to CAN registers */
5946  #define _CAN _SFR(CAN_t, CAN_AddressBase) ///< CAN struct/bit access
5947  #define _CAN_MCR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x00) ///< CAN master control register
5948  #define _CAN_MSR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x01) ///< CAN master status register
5949  #define _CAN_TSR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x02) ///< CAN transmit status register
5950  #define _CAN_TPR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x03) ///< CAN transmit priority register
5951  #define _CAN_RFR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x04) ///< CAN receive FIFO register
5952  #define _CAN_IER _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x05) ///< CAN interrupt enable register
5953  #define _CAN_DGR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x06) ///< CAN diagnosis register
5954  #define _CAN_PSR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x07) ///< CAN page selection for below paged registers
5955 
5956  // CAN page 0,1,5: Tx Mailbox 0,1,2 (via _CAN_PSR)
5957  #define _CAN_MCSR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x00) ///< CAN message control/status register (page 0,1,5)
5958  #define _CAN_MDLCR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x01) ///< CAN mailbox data length control register (page 0,1,5,7)
5959  #define _CAN_MIDR1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x02) ///< CAN mailbox identifier register 1 (page 0,1,5,7)
5960  #define _CAN_MIDR2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x03) ///< CAN mailbox identifier register 2 (page 0,1,5,7)
5961  #define _CAN_MIDR3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x04) ///< CAN mailbox identifier register 3 (page 0,1,5,7)
5962  #define _CAN_MIDR4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x05) ///< CAN mailbox identifier register 4 (page 0,1,5,7)
5963  #define _CAN_MDAR1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x06) ///< CAN mailbox data register 1 (page 0,1,5,7) */
5964  #define _CAN_MDAR2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x07) ///< CAN mailbox data register 2 (page 0,1,5,7) */
5965  #define _CAN_MDAR3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x08) ///< CAN mailbox data register 3 (page 0,1,5,7) */
5966  #define _CAN_MDAR4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x09) ///< CAN mailbox data register 4 (page 0,1,5,7) */
5967  #define _CAN_MDAR5 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0A) ///< CAN mailbox data register 5 (page 0,1,5,7) */
5968  #define _CAN_MDAR6 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0B) ///< CAN mailbox data register 6 (page 0,1,5,7) */
5969  #define _CAN_MDAR7 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0C) ///< CAN mailbox data register 7 (page 0,1,5,7) */
5970  #define _CAN_MDAR8 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0D) ///< CAN mailbox data register 8 (page 0,1,5,7) */
5971  #define _CAN_MTSRL _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0E) ///< CAN mailbox time stamp register low byte (page 0,1,5,7) */
5972  #define _CAN_MTSRH _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0F) ///< CAN mailbox time stamp register high byte (page 0,1,5,7) */
5973 
5974  // CAN page 1: Tx Mailbox 1 (via _CAN_PSR). Already defined for page 0
5975 
5976  // CAN page 2: Acceptance Filter 0:1 (via _CAN_PSR)
5977  #define _CAN_F0R1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x00) ///< CAN acceptance filter 0/1 (page 2)
5978  #define _CAN_F0R2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x01) ///< CAN acceptance filter 0/2 (page 2)
5979  #define _CAN_F0R3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x02) ///< CAN acceptance filter 0/3 (page 2)
5980  #define _CAN_F0R4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x03) ///< CAN acceptance filter 0/4 (page 2)
5981  #define _CAN_F0R5 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x04) ///< CAN acceptance filter 0/5 (page 2)
5982  #define _CAN_F0R6 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x05) ///< CAN acceptance filter 0/6 (page 2)
5983  #define _CAN_F0R7 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x06) ///< CAN acceptance filter 0/7 (page 2)
5984  #define _CAN_F0R8 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x07) ///< CAN acceptance filter 0/8 (page 2)
5985  #define _CAN_F1R1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x08) ///< CAN acceptance filter 1/1 (page 2)
5986  #define _CAN_F1R2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x09) ///< CAN acceptance filter 1/2 (page 2)
5987  #define _CAN_F1R3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0A) ///< CAN acceptance filter 1/3 (page 2)
5988  #define _CAN_F1R4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0B) ///< CAN acceptance filter 1/4 (page 2)
5989  #define _CAN_F1R5 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0C) ///< CAN acceptance filter 1/5 (page 2)
5990  #define _CAN_F1R6 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0D) ///< CAN acceptance filter 1/6 (page 2)
5991  #define _CAN_F1R7 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0E) ///< CAN acceptance filter 1/7 (page 2)
5992  #define _CAN_F1R8 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0F) ///< CAN acceptance filter 1/8 (page 2)
5993 
5994  // CAN page 3: Acceptance Filter 2:3 (via _CAN_PSR)
5995  #define _CAN_F2R1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x00) ///< CAN acceptance filter 2/1 (page 3)
5996  #define _CAN_F2R2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x01) ///< CAN acceptance filter 2/2 (page 3)
5997  #define _CAN_F2R3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x02) ///< CAN acceptance filter 2/3 (page 3)
5998  #define _CAN_F2R4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x03) ///< CAN acceptance filter 2/4 (page 3)
5999  #define _CAN_F2R5 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x04) ///< CAN acceptance filter 2/5 (page 3)
6000  #define _CAN_F2R6 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x05) ///< CAN acceptance filter 2/6 (page 3)
6001  #define _CAN_F2R7 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x06) ///< CAN acceptance filter 2/7 (page 3)
6002  #define _CAN_F2R8 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x07) ///< CAN acceptance filter 2/8 (page 3)
6003  #define _CAN_F3R1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x08) ///< CAN acceptance filter 3/1 (page 3)
6004  #define _CAN_F3R2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x09) ///< CAN acceptance filter 3/2 (page 3)
6005  #define _CAN_F3R3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0A) ///< CAN acceptance filter 3/3 (page 3)
6006  #define _CAN_F3R4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0B) ///< CAN acceptance filter 3/4 (page 3)
6007  #define _CAN_F3R5 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0C) ///< CAN acceptance filter 3/5 (page 3)
6008  #define _CAN_F3R6 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0D) ///< CAN acceptance filter 3/6 (page 3)
6009  #define _CAN_F3R7 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0E) ///< CAN acceptance filter 3/7 (page 3)
6010  #define _CAN_F3R8 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0F) ///< CAN acceptance filter 3/8 (page 3)
6011 
6012  // CAN page 4: Acceptance Filter 4:5 (via _CAN_PSR)
6013  #define _CAN_F4R1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x00) ///< CAN acceptance filter 4/1 (page 4)
6014  #define _CAN_F4R2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x01) ///< CAN acceptance filter 4/2 (page 4)
6015  #define _CAN_F4R3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x02) ///< CAN acceptance filter 4/3 (page 4)
6016  #define _CAN_F4R4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x03) ///< CAN acceptance filter 4/4 (page 4)
6017  #define _CAN_F4R5 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x04) ///< CAN acceptance filter 4/5 (page 4)
6018  #define _CAN_F4R6 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x05) ///< CAN acceptance filter 4/6 (page 4)
6019  #define _CAN_F4R7 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x06) ///< CAN acceptance filter 4/7 (page 4)
6020  #define _CAN_F4R8 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x07) ///< CAN acceptance filter 4/8 (page 4)
6021  #define _CAN_F5R1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x08) ///< CAN acceptance filter 5/1 (page 4)
6022  #define _CAN_F5R2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x09) ///< CAN acceptance filter 5/2 (page 4)
6023  #define _CAN_F5R3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0A) ///< CAN acceptance filter 5/3 (page 4)
6024  #define _CAN_F5R4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0B) ///< CAN acceptance filter 5/4 (page 4)
6025  #define _CAN_F5R5 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0C) ///< CAN acceptance filter 5/5 (page 4)
6026  #define _CAN_F5R6 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0D) ///< CAN acceptance filter 5/6 (page 4)
6027  #define _CAN_F5R7 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0E) ///< CAN acceptance filter 5/7 (page 4)
6028  #define _CAN_F5R8 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0F) ///< CAN acceptance filter 5/8 (page 4)
6029 
6030  // CAN page 5: Tx Mailbox 2 (via _CAN_PSR). Already defined for page 0
6031 
6032  // CAN page 6: Configuration/Diagnostics (via _CAN_PSR)
6033  #define _CAN_ESR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x00) ///< CAN error status register (page 6)
6034  #define _CAN_EIER _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x01) ///< CAN error interrupt enable register (page 6)
6035  #define _CAN_TECR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x02) ///< CAN transmit error counter register (page 6)
6036  #define _CAN_RECR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x03) ///< CAN receive error counter register (page 6)
6037  #define _CAN_BTR1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x04) ///< CAN bit timing register 1 (page 6)
6038  #define _CAN_BTR2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x05) ///< CAN bit timing register 2 (page 6)
6039  // reserved 2B
6040  #define _CAN_FMR1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x08) ///< CAN filter mode register 1 (page 6)
6041  #define _CAN_FMR2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x09) ///< CAN filter mode register 2 (page 6)
6042  #define _CAN_FCR1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0A) ///< CAN filter configuration register 1 (page 6)
6043  #define _CAN_FCR2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0B) ///< CAN filter configuration register 2 (page 6)
6044  #define _CAN_FCR3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0C) ///< CAN filter configuration register 3 (page 6)
6045  // reserved 3B
6046 
6047  // CAN page 7: Receive FIFO (via _CAN_PSR)
6048  #define _CAN_MFMIR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x00) ///< CAN mailbox filter match index register (page 7)
6049  //#define _CAN_MDLCR _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x01) ///< CAN mailbox data length control register (page 0,1,5,7)
6050  //#define _CAN_MIDR1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x02) ///< CAN mailbox identifier register 1 (page 0,1,5,7)
6051  //#define _CAN_MIDR2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x03) ///< CAN mailbox identifier register 2 (page 0,1,5,7)
6052  //#define _CAN_MIDR3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x04) ///< CAN mailbox identifier register 3 (page 0,1,5,7)
6053  //#define _CAN_MIDR4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x05) ///< CAN mailbox identifier register 4 (page 0,1,5,7)
6054  //#define _CAN_MDAR1 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x06) ///< CAN mailbox data register 1 (page 0,1,5,7)
6055  //#define _CAN_MDAR2 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x07) ///< CAN mailbox data register 2 (page 0,1,5,7)
6056  //#define _CAN_MDAR3 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x08) ///< CAN mailbox data register 3 (page 0,1,5,7)
6057  //#define _CAN_MDAR4 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x09) ///< CAN mailbox data register 4 (page 0,1,5,7)
6058  //#define _CAN_MDAR5 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0A) ///< CAN mailbox data register 5 (page 0,1,5,7)
6059  //#define _CAN_MDAR6 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0B) ///< CAN mailbox data register 6 (page 0,1,5,7)
6060  //#define _CAN_MDAR7 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0C) ///< CAN mailbox data register 7 (page 0,1,5,7)
6061  //#define _CAN_MDAR8 _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x08+0x0D) ///< CAN mailbox data register 8 (page 0,1,5,7)
6062  //#define _CAN_MTSRL _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x0A+0x0E) ///< CAN mailbox time stamp register low byte (page 0,1,5,7) */
6063  //#define _CAN_MTSRH _SFR(uint8_t, CAN_AddressBase+0x0A+0x0F) ///< CAN mailbox time stamp register high byte (page 0,1,5,7) */
6064 
6065  /* CAN Module Reset Values */
6066  #define _CAN_MCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x02) ///< CAN master control register reset value
6067  #define _CAN_MSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x02) ///< CAN master status register reset value
6068  #define _CAN_TSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN transmit status register reset value
6069  #define _CAN_TPR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x0C) ///< CAN transmit priority register reset value
6070  #define _CAN_RFR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN receive FIFO register reset value
6071  #define _CAN_IER_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN interrupt enable register reset value
6072  #define _CAN_DGR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x0C) ///< CAN diagnosis register reset value
6073  #define _CAN_PSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN page selection reset value
6074 
6075  #define _CAN_MCSR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN message control/status register (page 0,1,5) reset value
6076  #define _CAN_MDLCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN mailbox data length control register (page 0,1,5,7) reset value
6077  #define _CAN_ESR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN error status register (page 6) reset value
6078  #define _CAN_EIER_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN error interrupt enable register (page 6) reset value
6079  #define _CAN_TECR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN transmit error counter register (page 6) reset value
6080  #define _CAN_RECR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN receive error counter register (page 6) reset value
6081  #define _CAN_BTR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x40) ///< CAN bit timing register 1 (page 6) reset value
6082  #define _CAN_BTR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x23) ///< CAN bit timing register 2 (page 6) reset value
6083  #define _CAN_FMR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN filter mode register 1 (page 6) reset value
6084  #define _CAN_FMR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN filter mode register 2 (page 6) reset value
6085  #define _CAN_FCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN filter configuration register reset value
6086  #define _CAN_MFMIR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x00) ///< CAN mailbox filter match index register reset value
6087 
6088  /* CAN master control register (CAN_MCR) */
6089  #define _CAN_INRQ ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Channel Initialization Request [0] (in _CAN_MCR)
6090  #define _CAN_SLEEP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Channel Sleep Mode Request [0] (in _CAN_MCR)
6091  #define _CAN_TXFP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Channel Transmit FIFO Priority [0] (in _CAN_MCR)
6092  #define _CAN_RFLM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Channel Receive FIFO Locked Mode [0] (in _CAN_MCR)
6093  #define _CAN_NART ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Channel No Automatic Retransmission [0] (in _CAN_MCR)
6094  #define _CAN_AWUM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Channel Automatic Wakeup Mode [0] (in _CAN_MCR)
6095  #define _CAN_ABOM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Channel Automatic Bus-Off Management [0] (in _CAN_MCR)
6096  #define _CAN_TTCM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< CAN Channel Time Triggered Communication Mode [0] (in _CAN_MCR)
6097 
6098  /* CAN master status register (CAN_MSR) */
6099  #define _CAN_INAK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Initialization Acknowledge [0] (in _CAN_MSR)
6100  #define _CAN_SLAK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Sleep Acknowledge [0] (in _CAN_MSR)
6101  #define _CAN_ERRI ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Error Interrupt [0] (in _CAN_MSR)
6102  #define _CAN_WKUI ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Wakeup Interrupt [0] (in _CAN_MSR)
6103  #define _CAN_TX ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Transmit [0] (in _CAN_MSR)
6104  #define _CAN_RX ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Receive [0] (in _CAN_MSR)
6105  // reserved [7:6]
6106 
6107  /* CAN transmit status register (CAN_TSR) */
6108  #define _CAN_RQCP0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Request Completed for Mailbox 0 [0] (in _CAN_TSR)
6109  #define _CAN_RQCP1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Request Completed for Mailbox 1 [0] (in _CAN_TSR)
6110  #define _CAN_RQCP2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Request Completed for Mailbox 2 [0] (in _CAN_TSR)
6111  // reserved [3]
6112  #define _CAN_TXOK0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Transmission ok for Mailbox 0 [0] (in _CAN_TSR)
6113  #define _CAN_TXOK1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Transmission ok for Mailbox 1 [0] (in _CAN_TSR)
6114  #define _CAN_TXOK2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Transmission ok for Mailbox 2 [0] (in _CAN_TSR)
6115  // reserved [7]
6116 
6117  /* CAN transmit priority register (CAN_TPR) */
6118  #define _CAN_CODE ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< CAN Mailbox Code [1:0] (in _CAN_TPR)
6119  #define _CAN_CODE0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Mailbox Code [0] (in _CAN_TPR)
6120  #define _CAN_CODE1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Mailbox Code [1] (in _CAN_TPR)
6121  #define _CAN_TME0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Transmit Mailbox 0 Empty [0] (in _CAN_TPR)
6122  #define _CAN_TME1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Transmit Mailbox 1 Empty [0] (in _CAN_TPR)
6123  #define _CAN_TME2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Transmit Mailbox 2 Empty [0] (in _CAN_TPR)
6124  #define _CAN_LOW0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Lowest Priority Flag for Mailbox 0 [0] (in _CAN_TPR)
6125  #define _CAN_LOW1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Lowest Priority Flag for Mailbox 1 [0] (in _CAN_TPR)
6126  #define _CAN_LOW2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< CAN Lowest Priority Flag for Mailbox 2 [0] (in _CAN_TPR)
6127 
6128  /* CAN receive FIFO register (CAN_RFR) */
6129  #define _CAN_FMP ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< CAN FIFO Message Pending [1:0] (in _CAN_RFR)
6130  #define _CAN_FMP0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN FIFO Message Pending [0] (in _CAN_RFR)
6131  #define _CAN_FMP1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN FIFO Message Pending [1] (in _CAN_RFR)
6132  // reserved [2]
6133  #define _CAN_FULL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN FIFO Full [0] (in _CAN_RFR)
6134  #define _CAN_FOVR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN FIFO Overrun [0] (in _CAN_RFR)
6135  #define _CAN_RFOM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Release FIFO Output Mailbox [0] (in _CAN_RFR)
6136  // reserved [7:6]
6137 
6138  /* CAN interrupt enable register (CAN_IER) */
6139  #define _CAN_TMEIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Transmit Mailbox Empty Interrupt Enable [0] (in _CAN_IER)
6140  #define _CAN_FMPIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN FIFO Message Pending Interrupt Enable [0] (in _CAN_IER)
6141  #define _CAN_FFIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN FIFO Full Interrupt Enable [0] (in _CAN_IER)
6142  #define _CAN_FOVIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN FIFO Overrun Interrupt Enable [0] (in _CAN_IER)
6143  // reserved [6:4]
6144  #define _CAN_WKUIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< CAN Wakeup Interrupt Enable [0] (in _CAN_IER)
6145 
6146  /* CAN diagnosis register (CAN_DGR) */
6147  #define _CAN_LBKM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Loop back mode [0] (in _CAN_DGR)
6148  #define _CAN_SILM ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Silent mode [0] (in _CAN_DGR)
6149  #define _CAN_SAMP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Last sample point [0] (in _CAN_DGR)
6150  #define _CAN_RXS ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Rx Signal (=pin status) [0] (in _CAN_DGR)
6151  #define _CAN_TXM2E ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN TX Mailbox 2 enable [0] (in _CAN_DGR)
6152  // reserved [7:5]
6153 
6154  /* CAN page selection register for paged registers (CAN_PSR) */
6155  #define _CAN_PS ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 0)) ///< CAN Page select [2:0] (in _CAN_PSR)
6156  #define _CAN_PS0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Page select [0] (in _CAN_PSR)
6157  #define _CAN_PS1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Page select [1] (in _CAN_PSR)
6158  #define _CAN_PS2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Page select [2] (in _CAN_PSR)
6159  // reserved [7:3]
6160 
6161  /* CAN message control/status register (CAN_MCSR, page 0,1,5) */
6162  #define _CAN_TXRQ ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Transmission mailbox request [0] (in _CAN_MCSR, page 0,1,5)
6163  #define _CAN_ABRQ ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Abort request for mailbox [0] (in _CAN_MCSR, page 0,1,5)
6164  #define _CAN_RQCP ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Request completed [0] (in _CAN_MCSR, page 0,1,5)
6165  #define _CAN_TXOK ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Transmission OK [0] (in _CAN_MCSR, page 0,1,5)
6166  #define _CAN_ALST ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Arbitration lost [0] (in _CAN_MCSR, page 0,1,5)
6167  #define _CAN_TERR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Transmission error [0] (in _CAN_MCSR, page 0,1,5)
6168  // reserved [7:6]
6169 
6170  /* CAN mailbox data length control register (CAN_MDLCR, page 0,1,5,7) */
6171  #define _CAN_DLC ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< CAN Data length code [3:0] (in _CAN_MDLCR, page 0,1,5,7)
6172  #define _CAN_DLC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Data length code [0] (in _CAN_MDLCR, page 0,1,5,7)
6173  #define _CAN_DLC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Data length code [1] (in _CAN_MDLCR, page 0,1,5,7)
6174  #define _CAN_DLC2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Data length code [2] (in _CAN_MDLCR, page 0,1,5,7)
6175  #define _CAN_DLC3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Data length code [3] (in _CAN_MDLCR, page 0,1,5,7)
6176  // reserved [6:4]
6177  #define _CAN_TGT ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< CAN Transmit global time [0] (in _CAN_MDLCR, page 0,1,5,7)
6178 
6179  /* CAN mailbox identifier register 1 (CAN_MIDR1, page 0,1,5) */
6180  // skip ID [4:0], as it depends on addressing mode
6181  #define _CAN_RTR ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Remote transmission request [0] (in _CAN_MIDR1, page 0,1,5)
6182  #define _CAN_IDE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Extended identifier [0] (in _CAN_MIDR1, page 0,1,5)
6183  // reserved [7]
6184 
6185  /* CAN error status register (CAN_ESR, page 6) */
6186  #define _CAN_EWGF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Error warning flag [0] (in _CAN_ESR, page 6)
6187  #define _CAN_EPVF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Error passive flag [0] (in _CAN_ESR, page 6)
6188  #define _CAN_BOFF ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Bus off flag [0] (in _CAN_ESR, page 6)
6189  // reserved [3]
6190  #define _CAN_LEC ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< CAN Last error code [2:0] (in _CAN_ESR, page 6)
6191  #define _CAN_LEC0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Last error code [0] (in _CAN_ESR, page 6)
6192  #define _CAN_LEC1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Last error code [1] (in _CAN_ESR, page 6)
6193  #define _CAN_LEC2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Last error code [3] (in _CAN_ESR, page 6)
6194  // reserved [7]
6195 
6196  /* CAN error interrupt enable register (CAN_EIER, page 6) */
6197  #define _CAN_EWGIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Error warning interrupt enable [0] (in _CAN_EIER, page 6)
6198  #define _CAN_EPVIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Error passive interrupt enable [0] (in _CAN_EIER, page 6)
6199  #define _CAN_BOFIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Bus-Off interrupt enable [0] (in _CAN_EIER, page 6)
6200  // reserved [3]
6201  #define _CAN_LECIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Last error code interrupt enable [0] (in _CAN_EIER, page 6)
6202  // reserved [6:5]
6203  #define _CAN_ERRIE ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Error interrupt enable [0] (in _CAN_EIER, page 6)
6204  // reserved [7]
6205 
6206  /* CAN bit timing register 1 (CAN_BTR1, page 6) */
6207  #define _CAN_BRP ((uint8_t) (0x3F << 0)) ///< CAN Baud rate prescaler [5:0] (in _CAN_BTR1, page 6)
6208  #define _CAN_BRP0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Baud rate prescaler [0] (in _CAN_BTR1, page 6)
6209  #define _CAN_BRP1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Baud rate prescaler [1] (in _CAN_BTR1, page 6)
6210  #define _CAN_BRP2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Baud rate prescaler [2] (in _CAN_BTR1, page 6)
6211  #define _CAN_BRP3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Baud rate prescaler [3] (in _CAN_BTR1, page 6)
6212  #define _CAN_BRP4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Baud rate prescaler [4] (in _CAN_BTR1, page 6)
6213  #define _CAN_BRP5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Baud rate prescaler [5] (in _CAN_BTR1, page 6)
6214  #define _CAN_SJW ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 6)) ///< CAN Resynchronization jump width [1:0] (in _CAN_EIER, page 6)
6215  #define _CAN_SJW0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Resynchronization jump width [0] (in _CAN_EIER, page 6)
6216  #define _CAN_SJW1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< CAN Resynchronization jump width [1] (in _CAN_EIER, page 6)
6217 
6218  /* CAN bit timing register 2 (CAN_BTR2, page 6) */
6219  #define _CAN_BS1 ((uint8_t) (0x0F << 0)) ///< CAN Bit segment 1 [3:0] (in _CAN_BTR2, page 6)
6220  #define _CAN_BS10 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Bit segment 1 [0] (in _CAN_BTR2, page 6)
6221  #define _CAN_BS11 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Bit segment 1 [1] (in _CAN_BTR2, page 6)
6222  #define _CAN_BS12 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Bit segment 1 [2] (in _CAN_BTR2, page 6)
6223  #define _CAN_BS13 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Bit segment 1 [3] (in _CAN_BTR2, page 6)
6224  #define _CAN_BS2 ((uint8_t) (0x07 << 4)) ///< CAN Bit segment 2 [2:0] (in _CAN_BTR2, page 6)
6225  #define _CAN_BS20 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Bit segment 2 [0] (in _CAN_BTR2, page 6)
6226  #define _CAN_BS21 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Bit segment 2 [1] (in _CAN_BTR2, page 6)
6227  #define _CAN_BS22 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Bit segment 2 [2] (in _CAN_BTR2, page 6)
6228  // reserved [7]
6229 
6230  /* CAN filter mode register 1 (CAN_FMR1, page 6) */
6231  #define _CAN_FML0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Filter 0 mode low [0] (in _CAN_FMR1, page 6)
6232  #define _CAN_FMH0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Filter 0 mode high [0] (in _CAN_FMR1, page 6)
6233  #define _CAN_FML1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Filter 1 mode low [0] (in _CAN_FMR1, page 6)
6234  #define _CAN_FMH1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Filter 1 mode high [0] (in _CAN_FMR1, page 6)
6235  #define _CAN_FML2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Filter 2 mode low [0] (in _CAN_FMR1, page 6)
6236  #define _CAN_FMH2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Filter 2 mode high [0] (in _CAN_FMR1, page 6)
6237  #define _CAN_FML3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Filter 3 mode low [0] (in _CAN_FMR1, page 6)
6238  #define _CAN_FMH3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< CAN Filter 3 mode high [0] (in _CAN_FMR1, page 6)
6239 
6240  /* CAN filter mode register 2 (CAN_FMR2, page 6) */
6241  #define _CAN_FML4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Filter 4 mode low [0] (in _CAN_FMR2, page 6)
6242  #define _CAN_FMH4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Filter 4 mode high [0] (in _CAN_FMR2, page 6)
6243  #define _CAN_FML5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Filter 5 mode low [0] (in _CAN_FMR2, page 6)
6244  #define _CAN_FMH5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< CAN Filter 5 mode high [0] (in _CAN_FMR2, page 6)
6245  // reserved [7:4]
6246 
6247  /* CAN filter configuration register 1 (CAN_FCR1, page 6) */
6248  #define _CAN_FACT0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Filter 0 active [0] (in _CAN_FCR1, page 6)
6249  #define _CAN_FSC0 ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 1)) ///< CAN Filter 0 scale configuration [1:0] (in _CAN_FCR1, page 6)
6250  #define _CAN_FSC00 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Filter 0 scale configuration [0] (in _CAN_FCR1, page 6)
6251  #define _CAN_FSC01 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Filter 0 scale configuration [1] (in _CAN_FCR1, page 6)
6252  // reserved [3]
6253  #define _CAN_FACT1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Filter 1 active [0] (in _CAN_FCR1, page 6)
6254  #define _CAN_FSC1 ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 5)) ///< CAN Filter 1 scale configuration [1:0] (in _CAN_FCR1, page 6)
6255  #define _CAN_FSC10 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Filter 1 scale configuration [0] (in _CAN_FCR1, page 6)
6256  #define _CAN_FSC11 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Filter 1 scale configuration [1] (in _CAN_FCR1, page 6)
6257  // reserved [7]
6258 
6259  /* CAN filter configuration register 2 (CAN_FCR2, page 6) */
6260  #define _CAN_FACT2 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Filter 2 active [0] (in _CAN_FCR2, page 6)
6261  #define _CAN_FSC2 ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 1)) ///< CAN Filter 2 scale configuration [1:0] (in _CAN_FCR2, page 6)
6262  #define _CAN_FSC20 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Filter 2 scale configuration [0] (in _CAN_FCR2, page 6)
6263  #define _CAN_FSC21 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Filter 2 scale configuration [1] (in _CAN_FCR2, page 6)
6264  // reserved [3]
6265  #define _CAN_FACT3 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Filter 3 active [0] (in _CAN_FCR2, page 6)
6266  #define _CAN_FSC3 ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 5)) ///< CAN Filter 3 scale configuration [1:0] (in _CAN_FCR2, page 6)
6267  #define _CAN_FSC30 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Filter 3 scale configuration [0] (in _CAN_FCR2, page 6)
6268  #define _CAN_FSC31 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Filter 3 scale configuration [1] (in _CAN_FCR2, page 6)
6269  // reserved [7]
6270 
6271  /* CAN filter configuration register 3 (CAN_FCR3, page 6) */
6272  #define _CAN_FACT4 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< CAN Filter 4 active [0] (in _CAN_FCR3, page 6)
6273  #define _CAN_FSC4 ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 1)) ///< CAN Filter 4 scale configuration [1:0] (in _CAN_FCR3, page 6)
6274  #define _CAN_FSC40 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< CAN Filter 4 scale configuration [0] (in _CAN_FCR3, page 6)
6275  #define _CAN_FSC41 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< CAN Filter 4 scale configuration [1] (in _CAN_FCR3, page 6)
6276  // reserved [3]
6277  #define _CAN_FACT5 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< CAN Filter 5 active [0] (in _CAN_FCR2, page 6)
6278  #define _CAN_FSC5 ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 5)) ///< CAN Filter 5 scale configuration [1:0] (in _CAN_FCR3, page 6)
6279  #define _CAN_FSC50 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< CAN Filter 5 scale configuration [0] (in _CAN_FCR3, page 6)
6280  #define _CAN_FSC51 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< CAN Filter 5 scale configuration [1] (in _CAN_FCR3, page 6)
6281  // reserved [7]
6282 
6283 #endif // CAN_AddressBase
6284 
6285 
6286 
6287 //------------------------
6288 // Global Configuration (CFG)
6289 //------------------------
6290 #if defined(CFG_AddressBase)
6291 
6292  /** @brief struct for Global Configuration registers (CFG) */
6293  typedef struct {
6294 
6295  /** @brief Global configuration register (CFG_GCR) */
6296  struct {
6297  _BITS SWD : 1; ///< SWIM disable
6298  _BITS AL : 1; ///< Activation level
6299  _BITS res : 6; ///< Reserved
6300  } GCR;
6301 
6302  } CFG_t;
6303 
6304  /* Pointer to CFG registers */
6305  #define _CFG _SFR(CFG_t, CFG_AddressBase) ///< CFG struct/bit access
6306  #define _CFG_GCR _SFR(uint8_t, CFG_AddressBase+0x00) ///< Global configuration register (CFG_GCR)
6307 
6308  /* CFG Module Reset Values */
6309  #define _CFG_GCR_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t)0x00)
6310 
6311  /* Global configuration register (CFG_GCR) */
6312  #define _CFG_SWD ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< SWIM disable [0]
6313  #define _CFG_AL ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< Activation level [0]
6314  // reserved [7:2]
6315 
6316 #endif // CFG_AddressBase
6317 
6318 
6319 
6320 //------------------------
6321 // Interrupt Priority Module (ITC)
6322 //------------------------
6323 #if defined(ITC_AddressBase)
6324 
6325  /** @brief struct for setting interrupt Priority (ITC) */
6326  typedef struct {
6327 
6328  /** @brief interrupt priority register 1 (ITC_SPR1) */
6329  struct {
6330  _BITS res : 2; ///< Reserved (TLI always highest prio)
6331  _BITS VECT1SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 1
6332  _BITS VECT2SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 2
6333  _BITS VECT3SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 3
6334  } SPR1;
6335 
6336 
6337  /** @brief interrupt priority register 2 (ITC_SPR2) */
6338  struct {
6339  _BITS VECT4SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 4
6340  _BITS VECT5SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 5
6341  _BITS VECT6SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 6
6342  _BITS VECT7SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 7
6343  } SPR2;
6344 
6345 
6346  /** @brief interrupt priority register 3 (ITC_SPR3) */
6347  struct {
6348  _BITS VECT8SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 8
6349  _BITS VECT9SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 9
6350  _BITS VECT10SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 10
6351  _BITS VECT11SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 11
6352  } SPR3;
6353 
6354 
6355  /** @brief interrupt priority register 4 (ITC_SPR4) */
6356  struct {
6357  _BITS VECT12SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 12
6358  _BITS VECT13SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 13
6359  _BITS VECT14SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 14
6360  _BITS VECT15SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 15
6361  } SPR4;
6362 
6363 
6364  /** @brief interrupt priority register 5 (ITC_SPR5) */
6365  struct {
6366  _BITS VECT16SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 16
6367  _BITS VECT17SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 17
6368  _BITS VECT18SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 18
6369  _BITS VECT19SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 19
6370  } SPR5;
6371 
6372 
6373  /** @brief interrupt priority register 6 (ITC_SPR6) */
6374  struct {
6375  _BITS VECT20SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 20
6376  _BITS VECT21SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 21
6377  _BITS VECT22SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 22
6378  _BITS VECT23SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 23
6379  } SPR6;
6380 
6381 
6382  /** @brief interrupt priority register 7 (ITC_SPR7) */
6383  struct {
6384  _BITS VECT24SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 24
6385  _BITS VECT25SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 25
6386  _BITS VECT26SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 26
6387  _BITS VECT27SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 27
6388  } SPR7;
6389 
6390 
6391  /** @brief interrupt priority register 8 (ITC_SPR8) */
6392  struct {
6393  _BITS VECT28SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 28
6394  _BITS VECT29SPR : 2; ///< interrupt priority vector 29
6395  _BITS res : 4; ///< Reserved
6396  } SPR8;
6397 
6398  } ITC_t;
6399 
6400  /* Pointer to ITC registers */
6401  #define _ITC _SFR(ITC_t, ITC_AddressBase) ///< ITC struct/bit access
6402  #define _ITC_SPR1 _SFR(uint8_t, ITC_AddressBase+0x00) ///< Interrupt priority register 1/8
6403  #define _ITC_SPR2 _SFR(uint8_t, ITC_AddressBase+0x01) ///< Interrupt priority register 2/8
6404  #define _ITC_SPR3 _SFR(uint8_t, ITC_AddressBase+0x02) ///< Interrupt priority register 3/8
6405  #define _ITC_SPR4 _SFR(uint8_t, ITC_AddressBase+0x03) ///< Interrupt priority register 4/8
6406  #define _ITC_SPR5 _SFR(uint8_t, ITC_AddressBase+0x04) ///< Interrupt priority register 5/8
6407  #define _ITC_SPR6 _SFR(uint8_t, ITC_AddressBase+0x05) ///< Interrupt priority register 6/8
6408  #define _ITC_SPR7 _SFR(uint8_t, ITC_AddressBase+0x06) ///< Interrupt priority register 7/8
6409  #define _ITC_SPR8 _SFR(uint8_t, ITC_AddressBase+0x07) ///< Interrupt priority register 8/8
6410 
6411  /* ITC Module Reset Values */
6412  #define _ITC_SPR1_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Interrupt priority register 1/8 reset value
6413  #define _ITC_SPR2_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Interrupt priority register 2/8 reset value
6414  #define _ITC_SPR3_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Interrupt priority register 3/8 reset value
6415  #define _ITC_SPR4_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Interrupt priority register 4/8 reset value
6416  #define _ITC_SPR5_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Interrupt priority register 5/8 reset value
6417  #define _ITC_SPR6_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Interrupt priority register 6/8 reset value
6418  #define _ITC_SPR7_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0xFF) ///< Interrupt priority register 7/8 reset value
6419  #define _ITC_SPR8_RESET_VALUE ((uint8_t) 0x0F) ///< Interrupt priority register 8/8 reset value
6420 
6421  /* Software priority register 1 (ITC_SPR1) */
6422  // reserved [1:0]
6423  #define _ITC_VECT1SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 1 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR1)
6424  #define _ITC_VECT1SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 1 [0] (in _ITC_SPR1)
6425  #define _ITC_VECT1SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 1 [1] (in _ITC_SPR1)
6426  #define _ITC_VECT2SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 2 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR1)
6427  #define _ITC_VECT2SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 2 [0] (in _ITC_SPR1)
6428  #define _ITC_VECT2SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 2 [1] (in _ITC_SPR1)
6429  #define _ITC_VECT3SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 3 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR1)
6430  #define _ITC_VECT3SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 3 [0] (in _ITC_SPR1)
6431  #define _ITC_VECT3SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 3 [1] (in _ITC_SPR1)
6432 
6433  /* Software priority register 2 (ITC_SPR2) */
6434  #define _ITC_VECT4SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 4 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6435  #define _ITC_VECT4SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 4 [0] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6436  #define _ITC_VECT4SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 4 [1] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6437  #define _ITC_VECT5SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 5 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6438  #define _ITC_VECT5SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 5 [0] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6439  #define _ITC_VECT5SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 5 [1] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6440  #define _ITC_VECT6SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 6 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6441  #define _ITC_VECT6SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 6 [0] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6442  #define _ITC_VECT6SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 6 [1] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6443  #define _ITC_VECT7SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 7 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6444  #define _ITC_VECT7SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 7 [0] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6445  #define _ITC_VECT7SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 7 [1] (in _ITC_SPR2)
6446 
6447  /* Software priority register 3 (ITC_SPR3) */
6448  #define _ITC_VECT8SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 8 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6449  #define _ITC_VECT8SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 8 [0] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6450  #define _ITC_VECT8SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 8 [1] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6451  #define _ITC_VECT9SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 9 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6452  #define _ITC_VECT9SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 9 [0] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6453  #define _ITC_VECT9SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 9 [1] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6454  #define _ITC_VECT10SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 10 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6455  #define _ITC_VECT10SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 10 [0] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6456  #define _ITC_VECT10SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 10 [1] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6457  #define _ITC_VECT11SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 11 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6458  #define _ITC_VECT11SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 11 [0] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6459  #define _ITC_VECT11SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 11 [1] (in _ITC_SPR3)
6460 
6461  /* Software priority register 4 (ITC_SPR4) */
6462  #define _ITC_VECT12SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 12 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6463  #define _ITC_VECT12SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 12 [0] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6464  #define _ITC_VECT12SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 12 [1] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6465  #define _ITC_VECT13SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 13 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6466  #define _ITC_VECT13SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 13 [0] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6467  #define _ITC_VECT13SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 13 [1] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6468  #define _ITC_VECT14SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 14 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6469  #define _ITC_VECT14SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 14 [0] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6470  #define _ITC_VECT14SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 14 [1] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6471  #define _ITC_VECT15SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 15 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6472  #define _ITC_VECT15SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 15 [0] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6473  #define _ITC_VECT15SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 15 [1] (in _ITC_SPR4)
6474 
6475  /* Software priority register 5 (ITC_SPR5) */
6476  #define _ITC_VECT16SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 16 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6477  #define _ITC_VECT16SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 16 [0] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6478  #define _ITC_VECT16SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 16 [1] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6479  #define _ITC_VECT17SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 17 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6480  #define _ITC_VECT17SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 17 [0] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6481  #define _ITC_VECT17SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 17 [1] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6482  #define _ITC_VECT18SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 18 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6483  #define _ITC_VECT18SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 18 [0] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6484  #define _ITC_VECT18SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 18 [1] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6485  #define _ITC_VECT19SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 19 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6486  #define _ITC_VECT19SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 19 [0] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6487  #define _ITC_VECT19SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 19 [1] (in _ITC_SPR5)
6488 
6489  /* Software priority register 6 (ITC_SPR6) */
6490  #define _ITC_VECT20SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 20 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6491  #define _ITC_VECT20SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 20 [0] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6492  #define _ITC_VECT20SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 20 [1] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6493  #define _ITC_VECT21SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 21 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6494  #define _ITC_VECT21SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 21 [0] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6495  #define _ITC_VECT21SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 21 [1] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6496  #define _ITC_VECT22SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 22 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6497  #define _ITC_VECT22SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 22 [0] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6498  #define _ITC_VECT22SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 5)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 22 [1] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6499  #define _ITC_VECT23SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 23 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6500  #define _ITC_VECT23SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 6)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 23 [0] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6501  #define _ITC_VECT23SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 7)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 23 [1] (in _ITC_SPR6)
6502 
6503  /* Software priority register 7 (ITC_SPR7) */
6504  #define _ITC_VECT24SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 24 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR7)
6505  #define _ITC_VECT24SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 24 [0] (in _ITC_SPR7)
6506  #define _ITC_VECT24SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 24 [1] (in _ITC_SPR7)

6508  #define _ITC_VECT25SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 25 [0] (in _ITC_SPR7)
6509  #define _ITC_VECT25SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 25 [1] (in _ITC_SPR7)
6510  #define _ITC_VECT26SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 26 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR7)
6511  #define _ITC_VECT26SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 4)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 26 [0] (in _ITC_SPR7)

6516 
6517  /* Software priority register 8 (ITC_SPR8) */
6518  #define _ITC_VECT28SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 28 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR8)
6519  #define _ITC_VECT28SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 0)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 28 [0] (in _ITC_SPR8)
6520  #define _ITC_VECT28SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 1)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 28 [1] (in _ITC_SPR8)
6521  #define _ITC_VECT29SPR ((uint8_t) (0x03 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 29 [1:0] (in _ITC_SPR8)
6522  #define _ITC_VECT29SPR0 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 2)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 29 [0] (in _ITC_SPR8)
6523  #define _ITC_VECT29SPR1 ((uint8_t) (0x01 << 3)) ///< ITC interrupt priority vector 29 [1] (in _ITC_SPR8)
6524  // reserved [7:4]
